28b5(mdo sde): dper na/ gsad par bya ba'i mis mthong na/ ngo mtshar gyi sems mi skyed pa de bzhin du/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer yang / bud med de dag mthong na/ 
28b6(mdo sde): mtshar du mi 'dzin to// grong khyer de la yang grogs dang lhan cig ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin to// lo bcu po de dag gi bar du bdag nam zhig na/ mi mdza' ba'i tshogs rnam pa 'di lta bu'i nang nas thar bar
28b7(mdo sde): 'gyur snyam pa dang / bdag nam zhig na bag yod pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / des bdag thar bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa de lta bu'i sems 'jug pa ma gtogs par/ nam yang gzugs kyi mtshan ma
28b8(mdo sde): bzung bar ma gyur te/ sgra'i mtshan ma dang // dri'i'o mtshan ma dang / ro'i mtshan dang / reg gi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur to// de nas bu mo de dag gis rgyal po 'od zer ldan lha gzhon nu
29a1(mdo sde): malal to// dgyes par ma mdzad// dgyes dgur ma spyod de zhes smras so// kham po gsum pa ste/ ba ma'o// yul la'
29a2(mdo sde): skyong de nas/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan/ rgyal po brgyad khri dang lhan cig tu/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams 'od zer ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ gdong las mchi ma 'dzag cing lus 'dar te/ 
29a3(mdo sde): mya ngan gyi sa la skyel to// des las langs nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigasu bcad de smras pa// bu cag rin chen dam pa nga la ltos shing smos// nga ni mya ngan
29a4(mdo sde): gzer te khyim na'ang sa la skye la// su yis khyod mi dga' byas de myur nga la smros// de 'dir de'u re chad pa/ chen pos gcad par bya'o// khyod kyi ched du ngas 'dir
29a5(mdo sde): yid kyis gang smras pa// lha'i khyim ltar nyams dag 'grong khyer dang ltos shig/ 'di la yan lag ma tshang yod de myur smos// brgya byin lta bu'i 'byor pa de ring khyod la
29a6(mdo sde): bstan/ pad+ma'i mag can mig mdzes mya ngan nyam thag pa// lha'i bu mo lta bu'i bud med tshegs smra ltos// mya ngan thul te de dag rnams dang de ring rtsas// ci phyir zug rngus zug bzhin lus dman sems
29a7(mdo sde): shing 'dug/ de dag rab dga' tshul mkhas dbyangs kyis yan lag snyan// glu dbyangs pheg rdobs dus kyi rnam par nges par shes// khyod dga' dus la deng bab mya ngan ma byed cig/ pad+ma
29a8(mdo sde): rnyis pa lta bur tsa phyir deng lus dman// me tog 'bras bu yal ga mang ba rgyas skyed mos tshal// sna tshogs steng bzhag lha yi sna chog shing rta 'dra// soms shog khyod gyon chod 'don thog
29b1(mdo sde): ma yin/ radaga' ba'i dus la babs kyis deng 'dir bu dgar gyis// khyod kyi khrus ched rdzing 'di lha rnams kyi yang 'dra// u pal ngag dang pad+ma dag gi tshal gyis gang // pad+ma rnams kyang bung
29b2(mdo sde): ba rgyas pa mchog gis brgyan// de la bu soms su zhig 'di la dga' mi byed// ngang pa rma byan tse lu byug ri skegs dang // ka la bing ka shing shang te'u dang kun la// yid 'ong sgra ldan gangs nye spos
29b3(mdo sde): ngad ldang 'dra ba// thos nas mi gang 'di la dga' ba thob mi 'gyur// gzhal med khang dag mu tog drar bcas nor bu gtsug/ gser dang baiDUR+Yas spras rnam rgyal khang nga 'dra// rin chen khri
29b4(mdo sde): mchog dam pa rnams kyang rab bting ba// gser dril dgaser ka ta la'i 'phreng ba sgra snyan pa// zab cing brtan dab mchog gi sil snyan sgra sgrags pa// khyod kyi ched du
29b5(mdo sde): srang rnams su yang sbyin rgya che// bu mo stong dag klu mchu gastan pa'i sgra 'byin pa// dga' tshal lha'i bu mo rnams kyi 'dra ba sgrog/ mtho ris 'dra ba'i gnas yid 'ong la ci
29b6(mdo sde): byir rnam par g.yo ba sems kyis dga' mi byed// gzhon nu khyod kyi rtse grogs lha yi bu 'dra ba// bu po de dag rnams dang lhan cig rtsed mo gyis// khyod kyi pha dang ma yang mchims rnangs
29b7(mdo sde): shing 'dug/ skye bo 'di la sdug bsngal snying rje med dam ci// 'dus byas yid byung 'dod pa'i longs spyod don mi gnyar// yon tan bsag pa srid pa'i skyon mthong des smras pa// 'khor ba'i
29b8(mdo sde): dra bar chud pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas// bar pa don gnyer ba la smras pa yab gson cig/ lho gcig sus kyang bdag la ma dga' ba bgyis mi mchis// bdag ni da ltar 'dod pa
30a1(mdo sde): yon tan mos ma lags// nyon mongs gang dag ngan 'gro'i g.yang sar ltung byed pa// sdug pa thams cad dgra dang mtshungs te rjes mi srung // mi mkhas
30a2(mdo sde): bus pa skye bo bud med de dag dga'// bdud kyi zhags pa yon tan 'tshang ba g.yang sa che// rtag tu 'phags pa'i skye bos de dag de ltar smad// sems dmyal ngan 'gro mya ngan rtsa ba ci phyir bstan/ 
30a3(mdo sde): bud med 'di dag lpags pa'i gzugs kyis dga' ba tsam// bdag ni rus rgyas 'khrul 'khor mi gtsang don mi gnyer// khrag dang gcin dang mi gtsang ba dang dri ma 'jog/ gsal bar dur khrod
30a4(mdo sde): 'dra la ji ltar dga' bar bgyi// glu dang gar dang rol me'i dbyangs sgra gzung mi bgyid // dga' ba rmi lam 'dra ba mi mkhas rdzogs par bgyid// kun tu rtog pa srid gyur/ 
30a5(mdo sde): mi mkhas 'dir brlag gis// tsa phyir byas pa'i skye bo lta bur/ nyon mongs khol// shing lcug 'di dag thams cadadagun gyi dus byung na// dgon dung shing ltar 'gyur te dag
30a6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ma lags// mi rtag 'di yis dpal rnams thams cad bshig gyur te/ srog g.yor gyur kyang gti mug gis ni bag med 'gyur// sems ni rgya mtsho lta bur tshim par byed mi nus// 
30a7(mdo sde): srid pa rab tu 'phel la dga' bas par zhing 'dong // 'dod rgyus phan tshun gsad pa'i 'gro la bltas nas su// 'dir na ji ltar lhun po rlung gis mi g.yo bzhin// rgyal po khyod dang pha dang lhan
30a8(mdo sde): cig skyes pa dang // gnyen gyis skye bo chung ma ngan song bdag skyes min// bdag cag thams cad rtsa rtse'i zil pa 'dra ba ste// sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur bag yod mdzod// mi
30b1(mdo sde): dbang dar la bab pa me rtag cir mi rung // srog kyang ri yi chu ltar myur 'gro car mi rung // 'dus byas 'di zad klog sbyin 'dra ste cir ma rung // rgyal po mkhas la sring gsum 'dod la chag pa ngan/ 
30b2(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis ni bdag la bag yod 'gyur gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' yul la chags pa min zhes bskul// 'jig rten pan pa'i snying brtses sangs rgyas 'dir 'gyur bgyi// rgyal po
30b3(mdo sde): bag med spyod la byang chub yod ma lags// rgyal po gang zhig 'dod pas g.yen spyo sems 'khol pa// de ni bsod nams chung zad dga' zhing mtho ris ldog/ 'tshe ba shin tu rgyas pa nam yang
30b4(mdo sde): spyad mi bgyi// skon par bcug pa'i bya ltar dbugs byin 'gyur// khams rnams sbrul dang 'dra zhing phung po ga nashed ma 'dra// zag dang bcas pa'i sems ni don med grong
30b5(mdo sde): stong mtshungs// rgyal po 'di na dug sdong me tog rgyas 'dra lu sa// chu bo rnams kyi bdas na bdag 'dir dgag/ rab tu gsal nas 'bar ba nam mkha' lta bu dang / 'gro ba ngan
30b6(mdo sde): zhugs 'gro ba 'di la bdag bltas nas/ rgyal po de reng 'dir ni de dag dgrol ba dang // gnyid log sad par bgyi dang nad pa gso ba dang // zug rngurtsa nas gdon dang lam log bzlog pa'i phyir/ 
30b7(mdo sde): bdag gis zhi ba'i chos kyi glu ni myur du sbyar// stong chen du ni bcings pa rnam grol rab bsgrags nas// legs par bshad pas ring nas dbul ba tshim par bgyi// ngan 'gro'i lam du lhung po dag kyang
30b8(mdo sde): gdon par bgyi// long ba mig sbyin srad pa'i khri shing bskams par bgyi// rnam grol mchog phyir shes rab 'od zer mar mer byas// de'i sa srid gsum gar la lta ba 'dra mthong 'gyur// 
31a1(mdo sde): byams dang snying rje pha rol phyin pa sprin// sems can de 'brug lhag mthong klog gi 'phreng ba dang // byang chub yan lag bde bsil char rgyun dra ba yis// 'gro ba yun ring
31a2(mdo sde): dus nas gdung ba bsil bar bgyi// rgyal po bdag ni de dran gyur nas 'dir mchis te// bdag ni 'dus byas kun la 'dod pa smon ma mchis// byang chub don gnyer sems can ched du 'dir spyad bgyi// 
31a3(mdo sde): gcig tu nges te bdag ni srid la dga' ma mchis// rgyal po 'di na shes bzhin su zhig dgra khrod gnas// blo dang ldan pa su zhig 'jigs bcas lam du 'gro// mig dang ldan pa su zhig 'dzin
31a4(mdo sde): g.yang sar ltung // byang chub lam shes nas ni su zhig bag da med 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad rgyun 'gro bdag na rgyun bzlog pa// rgyal po tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi
31a5(mdo sde): nus/ lhun po rtse nas rgya mtsho'i nang du mchod sgro yi// bdag 'dir 'dod pa rnams kyis yid dag de lta min// rgyal bo dam pa rang gnyen thabs gcig myur du bzhud// yul
31a6(mdo sde): 'khor dga' ba thams cad 'jig rten kun la stsol// gang dag bsam pa ji bzhin blangs nas mchi bar 'gyur// yab bdag bag med rgyal srid bye ba 'tshal ma lags// bud med tshegs kyi
31a7(mdo sde): nang du gnas pas byang chub dang // grub bde zhi ba bla med gnas ni thob mi nus// dgon par dgyes pas rgyal bas byang chub brnyes pas na// bdag ni ri dang nags khrod mchis te gnas par gyi// 
31a8(mdo sde): yul 'khor skyong do nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer// khang bzangs kyi nang du 'dug bzhin du// yid byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis bud med de dag dang lhan cig 'chag cing
31b1(mdo sde): de spyod lam gsum gyis gnas so// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'greng ba dang 'gro ba dang 'dug pa ste// rmugs pa dang gnyid yongs su spangs so// khang pa'i steng du song ste/ sa brgyad
31b2(mdo sde): la gnas nas/ de nam gyi gung la babang 'dus kyi tshe/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing // bar snang las 'gro ba dang / chos dang dge
31b3(mdo sde): 'dun gyi bsngags pa brgya cher brjod cing 'gro ba thos so// thos nas kyang yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ mtsham zag cing / skye
31b4(mdo sde): bskyas te thal mo sbyar nas/ lha rnams la tshigs su bcad da smras pa// lha rnams sdug bsngal bdag la thugs rje bskyod nas ni// gal te skyo mi mdzad na cung zhig
31b5(mdo sde): zhu bar bgyi// suM yi yon tan rjod cing bde bar 'di nasabazhud// tshig 'dra thos nas bdag 'dir yid ni bde bar gyur// yul 'khor skyong de nas lnga de dag gis/ rgyal
31b6(mdo sde): bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcangad bas slar smras pa// gzhon nu khyod kyis sangs rgyas thos par ma gyur tam// don grub blo zhes bya ste skyabs med rnams kyi skyabs// de
31b7(mdo sde): bzhin spyod mkhas bsod nams shes rab ston mchog/ de yi dge 'dun khrag khrig stobs bcu bsam gtan pa// bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis smras pa// bdag ni rgyal ba lta 'tshal de yi
31b8(mdo sde): gzugs ci 'dra// de yi kha dog ci 'dra thams cad bka' stsol cig/ ji ltar spyad na sems can kun mgon gcig 'gyur ba// byang chub spyod pa ci 'dra bdag ni yongs su 'dra// de nas
32a1(mdo sde): lha de dag gis/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa// de yi gtsug tor ri yi rul gser mdzes bzhin// dbu skra 'jam
32a2(mdo sde): zhing mdzes la g.yas su 'khyil ba ste// de yi mdzod spu mkha' la nyi ma lam me lta// nor bu shel ltar rnam par dag cing g.yas su 'khyil// spyan dag bung ba'i tshogs dang ud dpal sngon po
32a3(mdo sde): 'dra ram dbang seng ge'i 'gram pa rang byung ba yis smos/ sems can lhan cig 'od zer bye ba mtha' yas 'gyed // stong gsum rgyas par 'gengs shing ngan 'gro rnams kyang skams// de
32a4(mdo sde): yi tshims ni rab dkar kha bdud ltar dag/ bzhi bcu mnyam zhing thag bzang rmad byung legs par grub// rgyal dab dam pa mchog de'i tshems kyi mche ba bzhi// de yi ljags
32a5(mdo sde): ni rabs yangs rang gzhal gdang khebs// rgyal ba de gsung ni ri mchog 'dra ba'i don// shin tu tshim byeda'abrel cing gya gyu med pa ste// tshangs sbyangs shin tu rig
32a6(mdo sde): bsil snyan stong 'dra ba// yid gnyis 'dzem pa 'dod pa rnams ni tshim byed pa// rgyal ba'i gsung ni lha yi sgra skad tshim byed pa// yon tan sna tshogs tshang ba byang chub yan lago 'thun// chos
32a7(mdo sde): kyi 'phreng ba yid 'ong brgya stong rab brgyus pa// sil snyan dga' ba bsgrags palha klu nyams dga' ba// mi tsika la bing ka khu byug ngur ba dang // rma bya ngang ba sgra snyan kun la ka'i sgra// tshangs
32a8(mdo sde): pa'i sgra dbyangs ma tsang byangs kyi yan lag 'dra// mkhrul sdig med don rnams thams cad rtogs byed pa// rmad byung shal ltar 'jam zhing mkhas pa'i yid 'ong ba// skul 'dul ba 'gyur
32b1(mdo sde): basbyong bdagar 'gyur ba// gzhan gyi spyod dang 'thun pa zhus na tshim byed pa// chos kyi dbang phyug de yi gsung gi yan lag 'di// ston pa'i mgul mdzes dung dang 'dra zhing dpung mgo zlum// dbyug
32b2(mdo sde): pa lta bu phyag ring de yi bdun yang mtho// phyag mdzes sna tshog so sor mo rnams ni ring zhing zlum// rgyal ba de yi sku ni btse ma'i gser gyi mdog/ ba spu g.yas su 'khyil cing gyen du re re skyes// 
32b3(mdo sde): lte ba mtho dag zab cing gsang sbubs rta yi 'dra// rang byung e ne'i byin pa glang po'i sna 'dra'i brla// zhabs mthil mdzes par bris pa bkra shes 'khor lo'i mtshan// glang po'i dbang po'i
32b4(mdo sde): 'gros stabs seng ge'i rtsal gyi stabs// khyu mchog bsgyu nges pa'i stabs can dbang po'i mchod sdong rgyas// mkha' lus me tog char phab me tog gdugs su gyur// gshegs
32b5(mdo sde): pa'i rjes 'gro 'di dag de rmad byung chos// rgyal ba rnyed dang mo/ rnyed bde dang sdug bsngal dang // grags dang ma grags de bzhin bstong dang smad pa yis// pad+ma chu ltar thams
32b6(mdo sde): cad du yang gos pa med// mi yi seng ge de 'dra mtshungs pa'i sems can med// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu be sod nams kyi 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa thos
32b7(mdo sde): shing / chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa thos nas// tshim zhing mgul yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste// dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu
32b8(mdo sde): gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'ang snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ci 'dra ba dang / de'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / des mngon gsum du byas
33a1(mdo sde): nga'i chos ci 'dra ba dang // de'i slob ma phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang // ji ltar 'khor ba yang ba dang phrad pa dang // byas pa mi gzo ba dang / ji ltar 'khor ba na byis
33a2(mdo sde): pa so so'i skye bo dag byas pa mi bzo ba dang / ji ltar khyim gyi gnas nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa dag nyes pa mang ba dang / ji ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis bag med pa spangs pa dang / 
33a3(mdo sde): ji ltar ma rig pa'i mun gnag rmongs pa dang / ji ltar 'du byed rnams tshogs par dka' ba dang / ji ltar sems gdul dka' ba dang / ji ltar ming dang gzugs zab pa dang / ji ltar skye mched
33a4(mdo sde): drug dbugs 'byin pa med pa dang / ji ltar reg pa yongs sum shes te/ sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa dang / ltar tshor ba nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar srid pa'i 'ching
33a5(mdo sde): bdam pa dang / ji ltar nye bar len pa las 'byung bar dka' ba dang / ji ltar sred pa'i sred pa 'phags pa ma yi/ na pa dang / ji ltar srid pa yod na/ skye ba rgyun gcad
33a6(mdo sde): dkara' ba dang / de ltar rga ba rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa dang / ji ltar nad kyi rnam par 'dzag par byed pa dang / ji ltar 'chi ba rjes su ma srun pa dang / dza ltar 'jug par bri ba chung ba dang / 
33a7(mdo sde): lhar sbed pa mtho 'grub pa nyis dmigs mang po dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs par bston pa nyams dga' ba stir 'angam nus te/ 'dod pa kha la po tsan mongs pa/ sems tha ba can/ 
33a8(mdo sde): ya pa yadag gi/ byas pa ju pa/ tshul na pa yi pa sems dang ldan pa/ 'a' la dgas pa mas ldan pa/ skyes bum ma dzun pa / 
33b1(mdo sde): bde 'gro lam yang rnam par snang bar mi nus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par lhag la 'gyur snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du sem/ 
33b2(mdo sde): te/ bdag sgo nas byung na no// nye du'i tshogs kyis bar chad byas su 'ong gis bdag khang stong 'di nas thur du mchong ngo snyam mo// yul 'khor sbyang de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams
33b3(mdo sde): kyi'od zer/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo ga la ba de logs su phyogs te/ khang bde nas mchongs nas tshig 'di skad du gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de
33b4(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen cing / thams cad gzigs she na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bdag la dgongs su gsol// / zhes kyang smras so// yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin
33b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blos phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste 'od phyung nas/ 'od des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la
33b6(mdo sde): reg go/ 'od de las kyang pad+ma 'dab ma brgya stong yod pa shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam byung bar gyur to// pad+ma de las kyang 'od zer brgya stong byung ste/ snang ba chen por gyur nas/ snang ba
33b7(mdo sde): des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khyab par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer pad+ma de dpal 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
33b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo de gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes lan gsum ched du
34a1(mdo sde): brjod do// yul 'khor skyod de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo ngas 'od de btud pa dang / gzhon nu de sdong po bcad pa bzhin du skyel ba bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs/ 
34a2(mdo sde): pa'i zhabs kyi drung du babs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan brgya stong du phyag 'tshal to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
34a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa don grub blo la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag ni ring nas na ste ring nas 'dod// tshegs ches sman pa'i rgyal po khyod rnyed do// ji ltar bde gshegs bstan la gnas nas ni/ 
34a4(mdo sde): bdag gis thob 'gyur mgon po bstan du gsol// 'dren pa bdag gi bag mchis thos pa ni// mtshan mo bar snang lha las thos lags te// thos nas skyo ste bdag ni
34a5(mdo sde): 'dir mchis na// mi rnams bag mchis 'gyur ba ji lta bu/ lam nyams pa la de ring ston gyur cig/ ljongs par/ gyur pa'i mig du der gyur cig/ dad pa'i 'byung gnas
34a6(mdo sde): gso mdzad thugs rje ldan// g.yang sa chen po 'di las bdag phyung shig/ dngul po gyur pa dag ni bsdu bar mdzod// mgon pa bcings bdag ni dang sbrel mdzod// som nyi bcas pa'i
34a7(mdo sde): ming gnyis gcad du gsol// byang chub lam la spyod pa bdag lung ston// chus khyer bdag la 'gram ni bstan du gsol// mun pa bdag la sgron ma mdzad du gsol// rmar gyur pa dag la
34a8(mdo sde): rna med mdzad du gsol// sman po'i rgyal po bdag gi zug rngu byung // khyod kying na grong ga las bdag par mdzod// srid par dmigs pa 'dzin pa gcang du gsol// yan lag brgyad par
34b1(mdo sde): yam gyi lam chen gyis// mya ngan chu chen pha rol bsgral du gsol// srog ni zang pa'i chos can tshe yang drung // dge ba bar chad mang po 'byung ba ste// bsod nams rnam smin ring por mi thogs 'grug/ 
34b2(mdo sde): bdag gis dal ba gdong rnyed cig nges gsungs// byang chub sems dnga'aji ltar bag mtshas 'gyur// ji ltar byang chub spyod pa mchog spyad na// 'gro ba srid pa'i 'tshang las thar 'gyur ba/ 
34b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten mgon po de dag bdag lung stan// yul 'khar skyong de nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blos/ rgyal po gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ 
34b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya cher yang dag par bstan to// rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis/ thos nas rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob bo// 
34b5(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa lnga yong thob ste/ na mkha' la gnas nas// / me tog rnams mngon par sprul te/ de bzhin/ gshegs pa de la gtor/ mngon par gtor to// 
34b6(mdo sde): yul 'khor skyong de nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi'ang zer bar snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blong la tshigs su bcad pas mngon
34b7(mdo sde): par bstod par// mtshan mchog ldan pa dri med zla ba'i zhal// gser mdog 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdul bral khyod 'dra srid pa gsum ma mchis// mnyam med mkhyen can khyod
34b8(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i dbu skra 'jam mdzes snum zhing bzang // khyod kyi gtsug tor 'di na ri rgyal bzhin// gtsug tor mi mthong khyod dang mtshungs ma mtshas// thub pa khyod
35a1(mdo sde): kyi smin mtshams mdzod spu mdzes// kun nga zla ba kha bdung ltar dkar// thugs rje gang gis 'gro ba 'di gzigs pa// spyan mchog bzang po u pal sngon po 'dra// 
35a2(mdo sde): rgyal ba dri med spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// ljags yangs srab la zangs kyi mdog 'dra ba// de yis rang gi zhal gyi gdong yang khebs// chos gsung bas ni 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid// 'jam
35a3(mdo sde): snum gsung ldan khyod lo phyag 'tshal lo// tshems bzang shin tu brtan pa rdo rje 'dra// bcu dang sum cu snyoms shing thags bzang ba// 'dzum pa mdzad nas 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid// bden
35a4(mdo sde): gtam snyan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba khyod kyi ga thugs dang mtshungs ma mchis// 'od kyi zhing brgya dgarakyang snang bar bgyid// 'jig rten na ni tshangs dbang skyong
35a5(mdo sde): de dag/ bcom ldan khyod kyis 'od kyis zil du rlag/ e ni'i byin pa mnyam med bcom ldan 'das// glang por rgyal po rma bya seng ge'i stabs// bcom ldan gnya'
35a6(mdo sde): shing gang du gzigs shing gshegs// sa dang ri dang dam pa g.yo bar mdzad// bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan gyis rgyas pa ste/ khyod kyi lpags pa 'jam zhing gser mdog 'dra// 'gro
35a7(mdo sde): pa gzugs 'di lta bas ngoms mi 'gyur// khyod ni mtshungs pa ma mchis gzugs dang ldan// khyod sngon bskal pa brgyar ni dka' thub spyang // khyod gtong dul dang sbyin pa kun la dgyes/ 
35a8(mdo sde): sems can kun la thugs rjes byams thugs ldan// mchog tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod ni sbyin dang tshul khrims rtag tu dgyes// khyod ni bzod dang brtson 'grus dgyes
35b1(mdo sde): rab brtan// khyod ni bsam gtan shes rab 'od gzi mngar// mtshungs med ye shes mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod ni smra ba ngan pa'i tshogs can 'joms// khyod ni seng ge lta bur 'khor
35b2(mdo sde): du sgrogs// khyod ni sman pa'i rgyal po dri gsum sal// mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshol lo// thub pa sku gsung thugs ni rnam par dag/ pad+ma chu ltar srid pa gsum mi gos// 
35b3(mdo sde): khyod ni tshangs dbyings ka la bad ka'i skad // srid gsum pha rol gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyi 'gro 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang // gar la lnga dang rmi lam 'dra ba dang // bdag med
35b4(mdo sde): sems can med cing srog 'gro med// chos rnams smig rgyu chu zla 'dra bar mkhyen// stong pa zhi pa skye ba med pa'i tshul// ma shes pas na 'gro ba 'khyam 'gyur te/ 
35b5(mdo sde): thug rje thabs tshul rigs pa brgya dag gis// de dag rnams/ ni mdzudzad par mdzad pa lags// 'dod chags la/ sogs nad mang rgya dag gis// skrag par gyur pa'i 'gro
35b6(mdo sde): la rtag gzigs te// bde gshegs sems can brgya dag yongs 'grel cing // zla mang sman pa lta bu rnam par rgyu// skye dang rga dang 'chi dang mya ngan non// sdug dang bral ba dang smre sngags
35b7(mdo sde): 'don pa brgyas// rtag tu na ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni// thub pa thugs rjes yongs su 'grel cing rgyu// dud 'gro yi dgas dmyal ba'i 'gro rnams su// 'gro kun shing rta'i ngang lo bzhin du 'khom
35b8(mdo sde): glen pa dmigs su ma mchis mgon ma mchis// de la lam gyi dam pa ston pa mdzad// gtso bo mtshungs pa med pas gang bstan pa// 'phags lam de nyid gang dag sngon chad kyi// chos
36a1(mdo sde): kyi dbang phyug 'gro ba 'don mdzad pa// rgyal ba de dag rnams kyi rab tu gsungs// 'jam zhing mnyen la yang du 'ong ba'i mchog/ tshangs la lhag par mchog tu/ 
36a2(mdo sde): dga' bgyid pa// dri rnga mi tsi lha'i bu mo mchog/ sgra de zil gyis mnan nas gsung ba mdzad// bden dang drang ba mi bzang thabs tshul gyis// yongs sbyangs yon tan mtha' yas ldan
36a3(mdo sde): pa'i gsung // de thos sems can khrag khrig phrag brgya dag/ theg pa gsum gyis ni bar mchi bar bgyid// khyod la mchod pas lha yi bde ba ni// rnam pa mang dang de bzhin mi yi thob// mi
36a4(mdo sde): yi bdag po 'gro la phan bgyid pa// phyug cing nor che 'byor pa da chen por 'gyur// mtshungs med khyed la dad pa skyed pa ni// gling bzhi'i bdag po 'khor los sgyur ba'i mchog/ 'gro
36a5(mdo sde): la dge ba bcu po kun 'byed pa// rin chen rab bzang bdun ldan thob par 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod la mchod pa bgyi/ sa pas ni// tshangs pa brgya byin 'jig rten bdag po dang / 
36a6(mdo sde): yongs su dga' ldan lho yi bdag po dang // gzhan 'phrul pa dang 'thab bral rab dgar 'gyur// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnam mang sel mdzad pa// mnyam med khyod la mchod dang mthong ba dang // 
36a7(mdo sde): zos pa'ang de ltar 'bras bu mchis lags te// gnas mchog rga shi med par thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan lam la mkhas shing lam mkhyen pa// 'jig rten 'di ni ngan pa'i lam las bzlog/ 
36a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'gro ba dag ni 'phags pa'i lam// bde bzhi pa rdul dang bral la 'god// bsod nams gter khyod bsod nams don gnyer ba'i// bsod nams bgyi ba rtag tu ma bas te// byang chub
36b1(mdo sde): dam pa ma thob par du na// bskal pa bye ba mang bor bas mi 'gyur// gzhan 'phrul 'dra brtag tu dga' bgyid pa// yongs su dag tsang mdzes pa thob par 'gyur// dam pa'i nang du lus dang ngag yang
36b2(mdo sde): kyis/  sems can dag ni rnam par dag par 'gyur// rgyal ba mchod pa'am yis 'di la sogs// yon tan rnam pa du ma 'thob par 'gyur// mtho ris thar pa mi yis bde ba dang // 'gro ba
36b3(mdo sde): kun gyis bsod nams gter thob 'gyur// khyod kyi brjod dang grags pa rgya chen po// phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing mang brgyar yang mchis// rgyal ba khyod kyi bsngags pa'i 'phreng ba ni// bde bar
36b4(mdo sde): gshegs rnams 'khor tu rtag par sgrogs// rim nad bral zhing 'gro ba thar mdzad pa// mthong na dga' ba thugs rje mchog ldan pa// bcom ldan dbang po zhi bzhi dgyes pa/ 
36b5(mdo sde): mi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis rgyal/ ba khyod kyis gsungs thos nas// mngon par shes pa/ lnga thob mkha' la gnas// dpa' bo bde gshegs mtshung
36b6(mdo sde): par bdag 'gyur te// dri med chos ni 'gro la rnam par dbye// lha dang mi dang klus mchong bde bar gshegs// yon tan kun gyi mthar phyin deng bstod pas// bsod nams rgya chen gang bsgrubs
36b7(mdo sde): gyur pa 'das// 'gro ba sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par shog/ yul 'khor skyong de nas mtshan mo de'i nam nangs pa dang / rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzhon nu'i bud med kyi 'khor du ba'i sgra thos so// 
36b8(mdo sde): thos nas kyang myu ba myur bar rings pa'i gzugs kyi grong khyer dga' mchog ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so// khyed ci'i phyir ngu de dag gis smras pa/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod/ 
37a1(mdo sde): kyi 'od ze ma gad ba'i slang du'o// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od bar ldan gzhon nu phyir// shing bcang ba sgyel ba ltar sa la sbrel te/ langs nas ngu zhing / grong
37a2(mdo sde): khyer der lan stong du yongs su btsal to// yul 'khor skyong de nas/ grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa des/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu ni de
37a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la lta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ shar phyogs logs su song ngo // yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'ong
37a4(mdo sde): zer ldan gzhon nu btsal ba'i phyir/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang srog chags bye ba khrag khrog rgya stong phrag brgya cu rtsa bzhi da dang lhan cig tu/ shar gyi phyogs cha ga la ba der song ste/ 
37a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs/ pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo gal ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
37a6(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/ 
37a7(mdo sde): srid gsum khyod mtshungs ma mchis lhag pa ga la mchis// sems can dam pa lha dbang lha min rgyal pos bkur// skye bo khyod kyi gzugs la lta bas ngoms mi 'gyur// yon tan
37a8(mdo sde): ye shes rgya mtsho dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba khyod sku sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rab dga'// lhun po rin chen mchog gis spras ltar yongs su dag/ rgyal ba sdug cing 'jam pa
37b1(mdo sde): gser gyi kha dog 'dra// blta sdug gzugs mnga' thub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshalo// bskal pa bye brgya bsam gyis mi khyab brtul zhugs spyad// bskal pa bye ba brgya mang sangs rgyas sti stang mdzad/ 
37b2(mdo sde): sngon chad mchod sbyin brgya phrag bsam gyis mi khyab mdzad// de na khyod sku bzang zhing shin tu mdzes pa lags// sbyin dang tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin shes rab dang // bzod dang brtson 'grus
37b3(mdo sde): bsam gtan thobs kyis khyod gzugs sbyangs// khyod kyi spyan sngar brgya byin tshangs 'od gsal ma lags// chu shel nor bu glog gi 'od kyang mdzes ma lags// 'gro ba'i don du yid du mchi ba'i gzugs/ 
37b4(mdo sde): kyang ston// chu zla 'dra zhing sgyu ma 'dra bar gda' ba lags//  rang gi phyogs rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i sku yang gda'// bde gshegs rnams kyi sku'i tshad ni gda' ma lags// khyod
37b5(mdo sde): ni dga' ldan dga' zhig na yang bzhugs par gda'// 'cha 'pho mdzod cing rab dkar glang por gyur nas ni/ dnga'abo yum gyi lhums su gshegs par gda' ba mdzad/ 
37b6(mdo sde): thub chen nam mkha'i lta bur thams cad rjes su zhugs// bcom ldan phyogs 'gar bltam par ston pa'ang mdzad pa ste// sa 'ga' dag tu gom pa bdun 'dor gda' ba mdzad// nga ni
37b7(mdo sde): lha mir bcas 'gro nang gtso shin tu lha// 'gro ba sdug bsngal mtsho la gdon ces gsung yang phyung // thub khyong chos gang la yang the tsam ma mnga' yang // yi ge shes pas
37b8(mdo sde): slong ltar 'jig rten dag na gda'// bsam gtan ting 'dzin spyod yul zhi ba brnyes gyur kyang // kha cig tu ni bud med nang na bzhugs par dga'// yab dang yum dang sras dang bud med
38a1(mdo sde): rnams kyang btang // gnyen rnams mya ngan non te rnam par rgyal zhing du// sems can dam pa bye ba brgya lhas yongs bskor nas// nags gnas gcig po nas 'byung
38a2(mdo sde): bar gda' ba'ang mdzad// khyod ni bdud bzhi pham par mdzad nas yun ring yang // zhing na bdud 'dul bar yang gda' ba ston par mdzad// sngon chad 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab yongs skor
38a3(mdo sde): kyang khyod ni thugs rjes 'khor lo bskor bar gda' ba mdzad// rtag tu rtag lta 'du shes ldan par 'gro gzigs nas// mya ngan bzla zhes 'khor gyi nang du tshig tu gsung // rtag tu 'am
38a4(mdo sde): bar dga' ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni// khyod ni zhi ba bas ngal gyur mya ngan 'das pa gsung // khyod kyi bsod nams ye shes shes rab thabs mtshungs med// thub
38a5(mdo sde): ba khyod sku 'od kyi zhing sangs rgyas par 'gengs// phyogs rnams dag na 'dren pa khyod kyi bsngags pa gsung // kun tu spyod yul thub pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// 
38a6(mdo sde): chos nyid ma lus brnyed par gyur la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can kun gyi bgyi bar sgyu ma ltar gda' yang // thub pa khyod ni gang du bzhud pa'am byon ma lags// sgyu ma'i chos tshul
38a7(mdo sde): gnas la mngon par phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i don du gang gis byang chub mchog thob pa// lam mchog mi yi dpa' bo khyod legs gsung // bdag gis chos nyid 'di ni myur du
38a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nas// mi dpa' 'gro ba'i don du chos nyid bshad par bgyi// mi dang 'thub pa kun mkhyen rims bral ba// srid gsum mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa ga la zhig/ bdag
38b1(mdo sde): gis 'dir bstod bsod nams mtha' yas gang bsgrubs des// 'jig rten byang chub bla med zhi mchog thob par shog/ yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo ngas/ rgyal po
38b2(mdo sde): 'od zer ldan de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ ci nas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba/ de lta de ltar chos bstan to// yul
38b3(mdo sde): 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sang
38b4(mdo sde): bdag gis grong khyer du gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la thugs rtse bar dgongs te/ 
38b5(mdo sde): cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo // yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer/ gyis pha ma de gnyis dang / grogs de dag dang / bud
38b6(mdo sde): med de dag la smras pa/ khyed cag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig/ ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan to// ma chags de bzhin gshegs pa dbul du rung bar gyis
38b7(mdo sde): shig de dag gis sgra skad cig tu rjes su yi rang ngo // yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis/ ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te/ ma
38b8(mdo sde): chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo// ro bro ba bkod pa lnga brgya pa'i zhal zas de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la gsol to// dge slong de dag tham/ 
39a1(mdo sde): cad kyi phyir/ rin po che sna bdun gyis g.yog pa'i gtsug lag khang nor bu'i 'chags bshams pa/ steng du rin po che'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa/ g.yas g.yon du me tog
39a2(mdo sde): gi shing ljon pa legs par yongs su grub par byas pa/ me tog pad+ma dkar po'i rdzing gis mdzes par byas pas/ ras bcos bu mu gnyis dri ma med pa/ brgya stong bting ba'i mal bshams
39a3(mdo sde): pa dge slong re re la gos kha na ma tho ba med pa gang byin pa de pyid nyin mi sbyin gyi/ nyin gcig bzhin gos gzhan dang gzhan sbyin par 'gyur ba byas so// de lo bye ba phrag gsum gyi bar du rmugs
39a4(mdo sde): dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur/ bdag la dga' ba ma byas// sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i phyir/ gzhan yid la dam pas so// bar skabs der 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa
39a5(mdo sde): dang gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par ma gyur/ rgyal srid la srid par ma gyur te/ lus dang srog la yang mi blta na/ 
39a6(mdo sde): dngos po gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bar skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyisang gsungs pa de thams cad kun tu bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan gnyis su ma zhus so// bar
39a7(mdo sde): skabs der khrus ma byas 'bru mar gyis lus ma bskus// rkang pa ma rkus/ ngal ba'i 'du shes ma skyed do// zan za ba dang / bshang gtso byed pa ma gtogs par nam yang 'dug par gyur to// gang gi
39a8(mdo sde): che bzhin gshegs pa de yangs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/ tsan dan dmar po'i zhugs la zhen pa byas so// gang du de bzhin gshegs pa de zhugs la bzhen pa'i sa phyogs de nyid du 'dzam bu
39b1(mdo sde): gling thams cad pa'i me tog thams cad dang / 'phreng ba thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / rol me'i sgra thams cad kyis lo brgya stong du ring bsrel la mchod pa bas par gyur pa nas/ rgyu dang
39b2(mdo sde): rkyen thams cad bstsogs te/ phyis mchod rten bye ba phrag brgya cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du byas so// mchod rten de dag la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che'i dra bas g.yogs so// mu tig gi dra ba'i bla
39b3(mdo sde): re dag bres so// mchod rten re re la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs lnga brgya phul lo// mchod rten thams cad la sil snyan brgya stong phul lo// 'dzam bu gling 'khor yug me tog gi shing ljon pa bskrun
39b4(mdo sde): to/ mchod rten re re la yang mar me'i rdza bo brgya stong nas maradame bus so// mar me'i rje bo re re nas kyang spos kyi 'bru mar drug curtsa bzhi pa stong gi mar ma bus so// spos dang
39b5(mdo sde): 'phreng ba dang / byug pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod par byas so// tshul de lta bu lo bye ba'i bar du mchod pabyas te/ phyis rab tu byung ngo // de rab tu byung nas chos
39b6(mdo sde): gos gsum par gyur cing / rtag tu bsod snyoms spyod pa dang / rtag tu cog pu pa ste/ nam yang blos ma bab bo// nam yang rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to// de zang
39b7(mdo sde): zang med pa'i sems kyi lo bye ba phrag bzhi'i bar du chos kyi sbyin pa byin te/ des gzhan la tha na legs so zhes pa ba tsam la yang re bar ma gyur na/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti lta smos kyang ci dgos
39b8(mdo sde): dechos nyan pa'am// chos bshad pas kyang ngal bar ma gyur to// de la lha rnams kyang bsnyen bkur byed do// yul gyi ma thams cad dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / nang ma
40a1(mdo sde): thams cad dang / grogs pa thams cad kyang de rjes su brlabs te rab byung // yul la khar skyong de nas gnas gcang ma 'dus kya 'burnams 'di sam du sems
40a2(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis rjes su slob cing / yul gyi mi thams cad rab tu byung gis bdag cag gis de la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byas na/ dkon mchog gsum la rim gro byas par 'gyur
40a3(mdo sde): snyam mo// de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan 'das nas kyang / dam pa'i chos lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du gnas te/ dge slong bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis thams cad yongs su
40a4(mdo sde): bzung ngo // tshul 'di lta bus sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong nga phrag dgu cu rtsa bzhi la/ rnam pa de lta bu'i mtshodad pa byas so// yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal
40a5(mdo sde): po'od ze zhes bya bar gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam/ du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tsom za'am/ yidaganyis su gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi lta'o// de
40a6(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po bsod nams kyi 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu
40a7(mdo sde): gzhon nu bsod nams 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tsom za'am/ yid gnyis su gyur na/ khyod kyi de ltar mi blta'o// 
40a8(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer ces bya bar gyur to// grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrug par gyur to// 
40b1(mdo sde): yul 'khor skyong de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'dod pas/ lhag pa'i bsam/ 
40b2(mdo sde): pas sgrub pa dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa yongs su spangs pa dang / bag yod pa'i spyod pas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// ngas bya dka' ba mngon
40b3(mdo sde): bar 'du bya ba de lta bus/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob po// de lta bas na de dag mi brtson pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti dang / tshigs su bcad pa lhur len/ 
40b4(mdo sde): pa dang shes kyi khe la chags pa dang / nga rgyal gyis bco dam pa dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus nyon mongs dag sha zang / ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus bstan pa las ring du gyur pa dang / 
40b5(mdo sde): dge sbyong sun par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod dang / lus dang ngag dang sems mi drang ba dang / ltas lta ba dang / khas 'che ba nor
40b6(mdo sde): pa dang / rang gi dam bcas pa las nyams pa dang / gos dang zas dang mal cha dang / na ba'i ched kyi sman dang / yo byad kyi mtshan ma la chags pa dang / ngo tsha mi shes pa dang / khrel
40b7(mdo sde): med pa dang / cho ga nyams pa dang / dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la 'jug pa dang / spyod yul dang bral ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las ring du gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
40b8(mdo sde): theg pa dang bral ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang bral bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de lta bas na/ rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos nas sdig pa'i gshes gnyen rig
41a1(mdo sde): pa med pa rnyed pa don du gnyer ba dang / mi bstan par shes par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// stobs/ 
41a2(mdo sde): bcu mnga' ba'i spyod pa dpag med na// snying ni 'thob dang shes kyi khel song // byang chub yon tan brgyas khebs bor nas ni// de dag 'thob phyir gzhan gyi khyim la dga'// khwa 'dra sdang ba
41a3(mdo sde): khrel dang mos blo dral// shes kyi khe phyir bdud kyi dbang du song // nyon mongs rag lus sred pa'i 'gro bar gzhol// bdag gis yon tan ldan zhes de skad ste// lus ni dgon na dran pa grong
41a4(mdo sde): khyer bu/ 'thob phyir de dag rnam par rtogs ngas spyod/ gnam dang sa ltar thar las rang ba ste// de 'dra'ide dadag sbrul ltar ring du sbyang // de dag sangs rgyas ches
41a5(mdo sde): dang de bzhin du// dge 'dun yon tan rgyas gang dag 'am yin// mtho ris bor nas ngan pa'i lam du song / sdug pas phongs nas srid pa'i 'gro bar 'khyam// nga yi spyod
41a6(mdo sde): banye bar bstan pa 'ang thos nas/ yang dag lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgrub pas 'di la sbyor// bskal pa bye ba mang pos rnyed dka' dal rnyed kyis// de lta ji skad bstan pa'i chos nyid 'dir brjon gyis/ 
41a7(mdo sde): gang zhig theg mchog byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod// de yis rgyal po de yi yon tan dran par bya// bsams te yang dag ji bzhin tshul bzhin gnas par bya// de nas bde gshegs
41a8(mdo sde): rnams kyi byang chub chags mad 'grub// yon tan 'di dag rtogs pas 'phags pa'i rigs la bsten// rang gis 'dir ni kun tu shes pa bskyed par bya// bstan pa yon tan snying po
41b1(mdo sde): 'di 'dra ma spang shig/ byis pa lta bur 'gro ba lngan 'khyam pa ste// 'dir ni ri dang dgon pa phug tu gnas par bya// der gnas nas ni bdag mi bsnyems shing gzhan mi spong // sngon chag sangs// 
41b2(mdo sde): rgyas bye ba phrag brgya gnyis ma byas// rjes su dran nas rtag par rgyun tu bdag la spyos// lus dang srog la sred pa ma chags spang bar bya// gus pa drag po bskyed nas chos la brtson par gyis// 
41b3(mdo sde): nga yi mdo 'di bsgrub pa bshad pa 'dir gnas na// de dag rnams kyi phyi nas byang chub rnyed mo dka'// gang dag rgyal ba'i theg pa 'di la dga' brtson pa// thos nas phyir ning yid ni 'jug
41b4(mdo sde): par bya ba'i rigs// de lta bas na bstan la mos pa bskyed dpor bya// rnam par rgyu ba'i tshe na phyis 'gyod gyur ta re/ da yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' gang dag pha rol
41b5(mdo sde): tu phyin pa lnga la spyod pa/ yang gang zhig bdag 'di la bslab bo// bdag sdom pa 'di la gnas par bya'o// snyam du chos kyi rnamo grangs 'di la nan tan gyis sgrub na/ 
41b6(mdo sde): bsod nams phung ba de bsod nams kyi phung po 'di gnan/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / de brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / 
41b7(mdo sde): dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sngon sems ma skyed pa'i lha dang mi dang lha ma
41b8(mdo sde): yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu khrag khrag phrag gsum cu/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub las phyir/ 
42a1(mdo sde): mi ldog par gyur to// dge slong bdun stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad/ 
42a2(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa
42a3(mdo sde): yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong de lta bas na/ khyod kyi rnam grangs 'di dam bcas pa don yod pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ skyes
42a4(mdo sde): bu dam pa rnam par rol pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i// spyod pa rnam par nges pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ don yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom
42a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang / lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar btsas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang te bcom
42a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// 
42a7(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / dAn shel dang / mu ne bar ma dang / shu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas/ gtan la phab pa/ 
42a8(mdo sde): shelag stong ste/ bam po gsum dang / sho log brgya// 6// rgya gar skad du/ a mtha pa na thA mahA mAn sUH/ bod skad du/ 
42b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdagra gis thos pa dus
42b2(mdo sde): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sku shi na/ chu klung gser ldan gyi 'gram gyad kyi nye 'khor/ shing sa la zung gi tshal na bzhugs te/ de na bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad
42b3(mdo sde): nus/ bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ dpyid zla tha chung nya'i nang par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus dang nye bar gyur pa na/ sems can thams cad kyi rang rang gi yul gyi skad du/ shin tu
42b4(mdo sde): zur phyin par brda' sprod pa'i tshig rnams kyis srid pa'i rtse ma dman cad go bar mdzad de/ deng de bzhin gshegadas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
42b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse ba can/ 'jig rten thams cad skyob pa/ sems can thams cad la sgra can zin dang 'dra bar gzigs pa/ skyabs chen po'i gnas
42b6(mdo sde): dang bzhi por gyur pa/ thub pa chen po/ yongs su mya ngan las 'dara' bar 'gyur ro// zhes bka' stsal to// sems can thams cad kyi zhu ba lung bstan pa tha ma la/ de lta bu'i gsung rnams
42b7(mdo sde): byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi zhal nas/ 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / shel gyi kha dog dang / 
42b8(mdo sde): ji'i snying po'i kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du/ sems can dmyal ba dang / 
43a1(mdo sde): dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can de dag la phog nas/ de'i mod la nyon mongs pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral te/ nyes sdig thams
43a2(mdo sde): cad kyi rgyun chad par gyur to// de nas mya ngan chen pos non te/ tshig mthun par kye ma khebs so// khebs so zhes kyang mdzer to// kyi hud kyi hud ces kyang skad cher 'bod cing / lag pa
43a3(mdo sde): brkyang bas kyang mgo bo la rdob par byed de/ 'dar zhing shin tu ngu'o// de'i tshe sa chen po nags tshal dang bcas/ raM dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho'i mthas gtug pa yang rab tu g.yos te/ sems
43a4(mdo sde): can de dag kyang gcig la gcig 'dzin cing / 'di skad du/ grogs po dag rings/ grogs po dag rings/ gyang yul gyi grong khyer ku shir 'dod 'dong ngo // de bzhin gshegs
43a5(mdo sde): pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs pa las bzlog la/ bsgrim mi dag sa par bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par yang
43a6(mdo sde): bzhugs par gsol ba gdab bo zhes 'dzer to// gcig la gcig 'jus nas 'di skad du kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro// kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro// kye ma sems can rnams
43a7(mdo sde): kyi bsod nams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa zang ngo // las mi bzad pa ni byung ngo // tshe dang ldan pa dag myur cig/ tshe dang ldan pa dag myur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs
43a8(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas dang kyi lung cem 'di la/ sangs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// kye ma 'jig rten snying bar 'gyur ro// kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa ma
43b1(mdo sde): bzhugs na/ dadag cag mgon med pa dang / rtsalag med pa dang / 'ongs par ji ltar mi 'gyur zhing / bdag cag gabe tsom dang / som ta dang ci yod pa de dang de dag zhu bar bya'o// zhes kyang 'ang
43b2(mdo sde): to/ nganyan thos chen po 'di dag kyang de na 'khod de/ 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan ka t+ya ya na chen po dang / gnas brtan bkul dang / gnas brtan nye dga' bo dang / de dag la sogs pa gzhan
43b3(mdo sde): dag kyang de na 'khod de/ de dag la 'od zer gyis dog nas/ 'ang rab tu 'dar dam dam rab tu dam ngam/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ brtags rab tu brtags/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ung / khams
43b4(mdo sde): rab tu 'khams/ rmugs rab tu rmugs/ rengs rab tu rengs te/ de la sogs pa dag tu gyur nas chas sa// de'i tshe dge slong sa ya phrag brgyad so shing zos nas phyir byung ste/ 
43b5(mdo sde): gnas brtan de dag la/ 'od zer gyi snang ba de bganas shin rangs par la dang bkrus te/ gcig la gcig 'jus sa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras de dag thams
43b6(mdo sde): cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ dbang thob pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ cang shes pa/ gtso bo chen po/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis rang gi don thob pa/ tsan dan chen po lta bu'i g.yog 'khor
43b7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ seng ge chen po lta bu'i g.yog 'khor ldan pa sha stag ste/ de la sogs pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa de dag thams cad snga dro nyi ma shar kar/ yan lag thams
43b8(mdo sde): cad kyi spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs/ mig ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tsher ba dang ldan nas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa
44a1(mdo sde): dang bde ba dang / snying rtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gdon du theg pa chen po'i mchog gsang ba stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos kyi
44a2(mdo sde): ske'i chul bshad par bya ba'i byar/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der ring ste/ lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum
44a3(mdo sde): bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe ko ta kaur bu mo rab bzangs ma la sogs pa dge slong ma bye ba 'bum
44a4(mdo sde): phrag drug thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ dadabang thob pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur dbor ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ gtso mo chen mo// chen po
44a5(mdo sde): stong pa nyid kyis rang gi don thob pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ ko ta ka'i bu mo dge slong ma rab bzangs ma dang / dge slong ma nye dga' mo dang / dge slong ma rgya mtsho'i blo gros dang / 
44a6(mdo sde): de dag la sogs pa dge slong ma bye ba 'bum phrag drug/ snga dro nyi ma 'char kar yan lag thams cad kyi baspu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs/ mig ni mchim khrag lta bus gang
44a7(mdo sde): ste/ mchog tu sdu tshor ba dang ldan nas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du/ theg pa chen po'i
44a8(mdo sde): mchog tu gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dang ste/ lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das
44b1(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod ngo // 
44b2(mdo sde): 'khor de na dge slong ma 'khod pa rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa' mi mchogs bcu thob pa sha stag ste/ gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir bud mod kyi gzugs dang / bud med kyi dbyibs dang
44b3(mdo sde): sha dang / khrag dang / rgyus pa mang po dang / rus pa'i lus 'chang ba/ rtag tu chad pa bzhi bsgom pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi cho 'phrul chen po'i don byed nus pa sha
44b4(mdo sde): stag go// gzhan yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos da byin la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dga'i klung gi bye ma rnyed thams cad kyang mi mchog sa bcu thob
44b5(mdo sde): pa thabs kyis lus 'chang po sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mchos byin dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi
44b6(mdo sde): zad pa dang / de dag la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang theg pa chen po thos par 'dod pa/ theg pa chen po la zhugs pa/ theg pa chen pos bkres
44b7(mdo sde): pa theg pa chen po la sred pa/ theg pa chen po ser sna med pa/ 'dzag rten thams cad dang 'thun par byed nus pa sha stag dang / bdag cag rgal nas/ gzhan bsgral bar bya'o snyam ste/ 
44b8(mdo sde): sngon gyi bskal pa bye ba snyed du/ tshul khrims kyi bgrod pa'i dam bca' ba legs par blangs pa 'dzin pa'i spyad pa spyod ba sha stag dang / de bzhin du bdag cag grol nas gzhan grol bar bya'o snyam pa
45a1(mdo sde): dang de bzhin du dkon gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o snyam pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o// snyam pa dang / go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o snyam du sems
45a2(mdo sde): pa sha stag dang / de bzhin du yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa dang / bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du/ sems can thams cad la snyoms par lta ba sha stag ste/ de dag thams cad snga
45a3(mdo sde): dro nyim 'char kar yan lag thams cad kyi baspu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs mig ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas/ sems
45a4(mdo sde): can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang snying brtse pa'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba sang gi don du theg pa da chen po'i mchog tu gsung ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa/ 
45a5(mdo sde): dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
45a6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe bslab pa'i
45a7(mdo sde): gzhi lnga blangs shing / tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang / yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge bsnyen 'od dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ dge bsnyen gang ga'i rlung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed
45a8(mdo sde): thams cad kyang zung dang zung du shes par 'dod pa sha stag ste/ sdug bsngal ba dang / bde ba dang / rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / bdag yod pa dang / bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang
45b1(mdo sde): stong pa ma yin pa dang / de kho na dang / de kho na ma yin pa dang / skyabs dang / skyabs ma yin pa dang sems can dang / sems can med pa dang / brtan pa dang / brtan pa ma yin pa dang / zhi ba dang / 
45b2(mdo sde): zhi ba ma yin pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / ther zug dang / ther zug ma yin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin
45b3(mdo sde): pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang / khyad padu 'phags pa shes par 'dod pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen 'od dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / dge bsnyen rab sbyin la
45b4(mdo sde): sogs pa/ dge bsnyen theg pa chen po thos par 'dod pa thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o// snyam du dam dbacas shing / tshul khrims blangs pa/ theg pa chen pos
45b5(mdo sde): skom la/ ngoms nas kyang gzhan skom pa dag ngoms parabya'o// snyam du dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen po la sred pa/ theg pa chen po la ser sna med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad
45b6(mdo sde): dang 'thun par byed nus pa sha stag dang / bdag cag rgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o// bdag cag grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o// 
45b7(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo brnyer bar bya'o// snyam du rlob par 'dod pa/ go cha chen po bags pa/ bslab pa rnams la sems gus pa dang / de bzhin du yon tan grangs med pa dang ldan pa/ bu gcig pa la byang
45b8(mdo sde): ban du/ mamam can thams cad lo stong rje nga ldan pa gastag ste/ rangs kyang nyim 'chags/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga du shugs pa la zhen pa byor mis na na dang / sa karba/ 
46a1(mdo sde): dang thang shing gi mchog dang / tsan+dan sa mchog pa'i bud shing rnams dang / yam sreg shing dri bsung dang ldan pa/ yon tan lnga stong lnga stong khyer te 'ongs so// de la yam sreg/ 
46a2(mdo sde): shing sA re zhing yang / gser gyi skad rin po che sna bdun rigs bdun dang ldan pas/ spras pa dkris pa/ ri mo la bris pa kho na bzhin du 'dug par/ rang bzhin gyis gzhon sha can legs par bcos pa
46a3(mdo sde): shastag ste/ sna re zhing yang 'od rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i phung po chen po/ mdog sngo ba dang / bar bar kha cig tu mdog dkar/ kha cig tu sngo sku/ kha cig tu rtsa dmar/ kha cig tu ser ba/ mig du
46a4(mdo sde): sdug par byas pa sha stag go// bam po re re'i g.yogs me'i phyar bu yang rin po che sna bdun las bas pa sha stag go de la tshangs mthe gu mang po re re zhing yang / ldong ros kyi mdzeg
46a5(mdo sde): lte bu dang / zar mi'i me tog gi mdog lta bu dang / sngon du dang / ser po rnams kyis bar bar du spel ba sha stag go/ de la tshangs ma'i the gu mang po re re zhing yang gser thags kyi
46a6(mdo sde): mchog rnam par dag pa yul mang por grags pa dag gis sbal pa sha stag go/ de la yam sreg shing sna re re zhing yang / spos dri bsrung zhim po dang / me tog phreng dang / gur kum gyi phye ma dang
46a7(mdo sde): ldan par byas pa/ gsar theg kyis g.yog pa/ dar snas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis shubs sngon po dang / ser po dang / sngo skya dang / dkar po dang / gcod ka lta bu dag gi nang du
46a8(mdo sde): bcug po/ yul ka ling ka ri ras dang / zar ma'i ras dang / zab dar dang / rgya dar gyi mchog rnams kyis dkris pa/ me tog mang pos brgyan pa/ byug pa dri bsrung zhim po dag gis drug
46b1(mdo sde): ba shastag go// yam sreg shing rtswa 'tsho shang mang tshan pa che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyis mdzes par byas pa/ kha cig du ston pa dang / dkar po dang / rabalag kha dag dang / ma tshul pa dag pas
46b2(mdo sde): lhag pa'i 'od gsal ba dang ldan pa sha stag go/ shing rta de dag gi gnya' shing rnams kyang / rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa dang / dpe med pa/ rta cang shes mgyogs pa dag dang sbyar ba sha stag go// 
46b3(mdo sde): rta de dag kyang rlung gi shugs pas mgyogs pa/ sdug chu skyar gyi mdog dang / ldong ros kyi mdog dang / sprin gyi mdog can sha stag ste/ thabs de 'dra ba'i shing rta re re'i mdun logs dang / rgyab
46b4(mdo sde): logs su rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ste/ rgyal mtshan thams cad kyang rin po che las byas pa/ gser gyi drabs g.yog pa sha stag go// rgyal mtshan gyi mdun logs su
46b5(mdo sde): yang / gdugs rtsibs dang / rtsa ba nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od can las byas pa/ mu tig gi chun po sbyangs pa sha stag khyer ro// gdugs re re'i mdun logs su yang / 
46b6(mdo sde): gser gyi me tog ku mud dang / ud pal dang / pad+ma dkar po sdong bu be DUR+Ya las byas po/ ze ba rdo rje las byas pa/ bung ba mang po skad 'byin pa/ dri bsung zhim po dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ 
46b7(mdo sde): 'od dang ldan pa/ che ba mang ba sha stag dang / lnga ldi chen po sha stag khyer ro// lnga lnga chen po rnams kyi mdun du yang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs kyi spyod pa/ ri mo bros pa chen po
46b8(mdo sde): dag thogs so// ri mo'i gzugs re re'i blo g.yon nas kyang / zlos gar gyi gar thabs yul dbus nas byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ gar thabs byed pa de'i nang nasil snyan rin po che las byas
47a1(mdo sde): pa'i rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang / rnga zlum dang / spa wang dang / gling bu dang / bairbang rgyud cig pa dang / rnga bo che dang / dung la sogs pa dag rdung zhing 'bud do// gar thabs/ 
47a2(mdo sde): kyi sil snyan de dag las kyang / kye ma 'dzag rten stong par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pa rjod cing gdung gdung skad du dbyangs len to// gar thabs kyi sil snyan re re'i mdun du yang me tog dri zhim po
47a3(mdo sde): sna tshogs rnam par 'tsher ba rnams kyi phye mas/ rin po che'i skon bu legs bcos pa gzhon sha can dag bkang ba sha stag dang / de ma yin pa'i skon bu ma blta na sdug pa/ gur kum gyi phye mas
47a4(mdo sde): bkang ba mang po sha stag thogs so// de dag gi mdun du yang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa/ khyab par 'gyur ba'i zhal zas dag khyer
47a5(mdo sde): zhing 'dong ngo // zhal zas de dag kyang / bud shing tsan ngan dmar po dang / a ka ru dang / thang shing gi me chung dus bcos pa dang / gang ga'i klung gi chus bcos pa sha stag
47a6(mdo sde): ste skyur ba dang / lan cha'i ro dang / mngar ba dang / bska ba dang / tsha ba dang / kha ba'i ro dang ldan pa/ mdang skyed pa/ phan par 'gyur ba sha stag go/ sa la zung gi drung gi nyen 'khor
47a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyang gser gyi bye ma 'jam pos bkram ste/ ga bu sha'i ras dang / snam bu dang / bcos snam dang / dreru rngog dang / ka ling ka'i ras dang / zab dang 'jam zhing mdog dkar/ 
47a8(mdo sde): pa rnams kyang bting ngo // grub pa'i gnas de'i gzhi dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis khor khor yug kyang gur kum gyis byugs so// bcom ldan 'das dge slogi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i seng ge'i/ 
47b1(mdo sde): khri chen po gser las byas pa rin po che sna bdun gyis spras shing snang bar byas pa/ ri rab ltar che zhing 'phang mtho ba dag kyang bshams so// g.yogs ma de dag gi rkyen du 'tshal ba sha stag gis
47b2(mdo sde): g.yogs te/ gser gyi dril bu gsar ka s+tha si l-i li'i 'khrol shang gi/ sgra 'byung ba'i dra ba can gyi yol ba rnams kyis ni bskor/ rgya dang spu sdug yug khyim chen po'i bla ri rnams ni bres// gdugs/ 
47b3(mdo sde): dkar po rnams kyis na nyin mtshan bsgribs/ rnga yab dkar po rnams kyis ni g.yangs/ rgyab rten glang po che'i mche ba la chu srin ma kar rten pa'i kha nas/ zla ba nya ba'i 'od zer ltar dkar ba'i mu tig
47b4(mdo sde): gi chun po 'byung zhing / sbyangs pa dang ldan pa rnams na bcas/ sa phyogs rnams ni me tog dri zhim po/ sil mas gtor to// dge bsnyen dag re re nas kyang 'di snyam du sems
47b5(mdo sde): te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad la zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas sbyin no// skom 'dod pa rnams la na/ skom sbyin no// mgo bo dang mig la sogs pa yan
47b6(mdo sde): lag dang nying lag thams cad 'dod pa rnams la yang / ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyin no// dbul po dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa rnams la yang / 'dod pa dang / dug dang
47b7(mdo sde): gnod pa dang / ma brtags pa'i sbyin pa rnams ma gtogs par/ gang dang gang dag ci dang ci 'dod pa/ de dang de dag chog par sbyar ro snyam du sems kyi/ gzhan ni ci yang mi sems so// 
47b8(mdo sde): de bzhin du dge bsnyen gyi sde tshan/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa/ de dag thams cad kyis bsam pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gis bshos gsol te/ yongs su
48a1(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi bshos gsol te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam ste/ so so nas de 'ba'
48a2(mdo sde): shig snying la sems shing / yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgyu skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs/ mig ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan
48a3(mdo sde): nas/ rang rang gi mchod pa'i yo byad bud shing dang / yam sreg shing dang / shing rta dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / ba dan rnams dang chas te/ zhal zas kyi mchog gis sbyar ba'i snod
48a4(mdo sde): rnams thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste dalhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo dbos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la spos dang / 
48a5(mdo sde): me tog 'phreng dang / phye ma dang / phye ma zhi bu dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bla ra rgya chen po dag gis mchod nas/ lan 'bum bskor ba
48a6(mdo sde): byas te/ mig nas mtsho ma rgyun mi chad par char bzhin du phab nas/ bdag la sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa mang po byed cing / kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro// kye ma 'jig rten stong par 'gyur
48a7(mdo sde): ro// zhes de skad du skad chen po 'don te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs drung na/ srog chags shi shu ma ra bzhin du 'gre ldog cing / gsol ba 'debs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
48a8(mdo sde): gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pas bdag gis sbyar ba'i bshos gsol bar ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das la thugs brtse ba'i slad du sbyin pa tha ma de bzhin gshegs
48b1(mdo sde): pas bzhes su gsol zhes gsol ba 'debs so// bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa bzhin du cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum du de skad ces gsol kyang / lan
48b2(mdo sde): gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas dge bsnyen gyi tshogs de dag re thag chad de/ cang mi zer bar 'khod nas/ bu cig pa shi nas dur khrod du bor ma thag pa'i
48b3(mdo sde): pha ma 'gre ldog pa bzhin du shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur to// de bzhin du dge bsnyen de dag thams cad mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur pa las langs te/ rang gi mchod pa'i yo byad rnams bsdus
48b4(mdo sde): nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe bslab dpa'i gzhi lnga blangs shing tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang / yon tan dang ldan pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi gces pa'i dge
48b5(mdo sde): bsnyen ma tshong dpon gyi bu mo 'tsho ba'i dpal la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed thams cad kyangabud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can bye ba phrag mang po nges
48b6(mdo sde): par sgrol ba/ khyim gyi gnas la smod pa sha stag ste/ lus 'di ni nyes pa'i khams brgya bcu rtsa bzhi las lhag pas bsdus pa'o// lus 'di ni srin bu'i rigs bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i zas so// 
48b7(mdo sde): lus 'di ni rgyal po'i khri mon du brubs pa'i dri mnam pa'o// lus 'di ni khyi ro rul pa'i dri bas kyang lhag par sbags pa'o// lus 'di ni sgo dgu nas mi gtsang ba 'dzag pa'o// lus 'di ni sha
48b8(mdo sde): dang chub dang / rus pa dang / khrag dang / pags zhal zhal can/ rka lag gi phyi sgo dang / ra ba dang / ba ga ma can/ mig gi skar khung can/ mgo bo'i yang thog can/ yid rgyal
49a1(mdo sde): po lta bu'i pho brang grong khyer lta bu'o// lus 'di ni mkhas pa thams cad kyis spangs shing byis pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug
49a2(mdo sde): la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa bye ba snyed kyi srin pos bsten pa/ 'dam bu dang / e ran 'da' dang / dbu ba dang / chu shing lta bur snying po med pa/ glog dang / ri gzar po'i 'bab chu'i dpa'
49a3(mdo sde): rlabs ltar shin tu mi brtan po'o// sgyu ma dang mig rgyu dang / brag cha dang / zla ba'i gzugs bstan ltar slu bar byed pa/ rlung shugs drag pos rnam par dkrug pa'i chu'i shugs kyis brkos
49a4(mdo sde): pa'i 'gram gyi sdong po ltar g.yang sa na 'dug pa'i chos can/ spyang ki dang / wa dang / bya rgod dang bya rog rnams kyi zas yin na/ su zhig 'di lta bu 'chang
49a5(mdo sde): bal dga' bar byed/ rgya mtsho'i chu thams cad skra'i rtsemos blangs te ba lang gi rmig rjes su krugs par ni nus srid kyi/ lus nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis gzir ba 'di snying
49a6(mdo sde): po med pa dang / mi gtsang ba ni tshig tsam gyis bstan par mi nus so// chen po 'di rgya shugs gi 'bras bu'i rus pa'i 'bru tsam sha stag du byas pa'am// yungs 'bru tsam 'am/ rdul
49a7(mdo sde): phra rab kyi rdul tsam sha stag tu byas pas ni zad par 'gyur yang srid kyi/ lus 'di yod kyi bar du 'di'i nyes dmigs ni mthar thug par mi 'gyur te/ de bas na dam pa'i chos srung ba'i phyir 'di mche/ 
49a8(mdo sde): ma bzhin du dor bar bya'o snyam ste/ 'di ltar dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad chen po stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgoms pas sems bsgom pa sha stag ste/ 
49b1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen ma 'tsho ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / dge bsnyen ma dpal 'breng zhes bya ba dang / dge bsnyen mas ga zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa thams cad kyang / theg pa chen po thos par
49b2(mdo sde): 'dod la/ thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o// snyam du dam bcas pa/ bsrung ba lhur len pa/ bud med kyi lus ngan no snyam du smod pa dang / lus snying po med do snyam du smod pa
49b3(mdo sde): so so nas shas cher sgom pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo gzhig go snyam du sems pa sha stag dang / theg pa chen pos skom la/ ngom nas gzhan sgom pa dag ngom par bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa sha
49b4(mdo sde): stag dang / theg pa chen po la sred pa/ theg pa chen po la daser sna med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang / 'thun par slob par 'dod pa dang / grol nas gzhan grol bar bya'o// 
49b5(mdo sde): rgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskorabar bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod pa sha stag dang / go cha chen po
49b6(mdo sde): bgos pa/ bslab pa rnams la brtul zhugs brtan pa dang / de bzhin du yon tan du ma dang ldan pa dang / bu cig pa la bya ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de
49b7(mdo sde): dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar shin tu rings par gcig la gcig 'jus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhin po'i phyir/ yam sreg shing dge bsnyen pa rnams kyi nyes 'gyur khyer ba
49b8(mdo sde): las bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ bu shi ba bzhin du mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te/ ngus nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe li tsa byi gnon
50a1(mdo sde): nu gtsang ma dri ma med pa'i snying po la sogs pa yangs pa can na gnas pa'i li tsi byi gzhon nu/ grong khyer gyi nang na gnas pa dang / phyi rol na gnas pa dang bcas pa rnams dang 'dzam
50a2(mdo sde): bu'i gling na gnas pa'i rgyal phran/ blon po dang bcas pa gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed/ thams cad kyang dam pa'i chos srung ba la mkhas pa/ tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang / yon tan dang ldan
50a3(mdo sde): pa dam pa'i chos sun 'byin cing rtags can 'tshal ba rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa sha stag la/ de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta bur 'dod te/ bdag cag gi nor dang / 'bru'i tshogs dang
50a4(mdo sde): mdzod dang / bang ba'i tshe gos gang yin pa de dag thams cad da ni/ bdud rtsi mi zad par bya ba dang / bdud rtsi gnas par bya ba'i phyir yin gyis/ bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos
50a5(mdo sde): la nan tan bya'o// dam pa'i chos la sun 'byin cing / log par lta ba rnams kyi lho gcad par bya'o// zhesalegs par dam bcas pa/ tshul khrims 'chal pa/ tshul
50a6(mdo sde): khrims mi gnas pa rnams ni gos dkar po gyon du bcug ste/ khyim pa'i las byed du gzhug go snyam du brtul ba/ dam pa'i chos lhug pa la ni bla ma bzhin du rim gro bya'o// snyam du dam bcas
50a7(mdo sde): pa/ dge 'dun la phan pa dang / bde bar gnas pa bya ba ni yongs su rdzogs par byas tang des chog go snyam du sems pa dang / theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la/ thos nas kyang gzhan dag la
50a8(mdo sde): bstan par bya'o// snyam du yi dam bcas pa la brtan pa dang / de la sogs pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ li tsa byi gzhon nu gtsang ma dri ma med pa'i snying po
50b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba dang / bsgrib pa dag pa zhes bya ba dang / gang gi chu dri ma med pas byin pa zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa'i la tse byiganon nu de dag kyang gcig la gcig 'jus te/ re res kyang / gdung zhugs la
50b2(mdo sde): zhen pa'i bung shing thang shing gi mchog dang / tsan dan dang / a ka ru rnams dang / yam sreg shing bye ba phrag brgya cu rtsa bani dang / mchod pa snga ma'i nyes 'gyur rnams khyer nas/ mchod pa rnams
50b3(mdo sde): bsgrags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du dong ngo // li tsa byi gzhon nu re re la yang / glang po che brgyad khri bzhi stong dang rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / nor bu chu
50b4(mdo sde): shel brgyad khri bzhi stong dang chas so// glang po che re re'i mdun du yang che la 'os pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dar gyi bla re chen po rnams thogs so// 
50b5(mdo sde): gdugs rnams kyi nang na thung ngu gang yin pa de la yang kho ra khor yug du dpag tshad gcig yod do// dar/ gyi bla re chen po rnams kyi nang na chung ngu gang yin pa de la yang / 
50b6(mdo sde): chu zheng du dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis yod/ rgyal mtshan rnams kyi nang na thung ngu gang yin pa de la yang / 'phang du dpag tshad brgya yod do// ba dan rnams kyi nang na thung ngu gang yin pa des kyang
50b7(mdo sde): dpag tshad stong du phyin to// de ltar de dag mchod pa rnam pa dang / chas te bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad du dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ zhal
50b8(mdo sde): zas phul ba las/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung ste/ ma bzhes nas/ mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re thag chad nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus ta la bdun gyi srid tsam
51a1(mdo sde): du 'phags te 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe 'dzam bu gling pa'i blon po dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag gang ga lnga'i bye ma snyed thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la dad pa/ tshul
51a2(mdo sde): khrims dang / cho ga dang / yon tan rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa/ dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ khyim bdag gi rgyal po rnam par snang byed ces
51a3(mdo sde): bya ba dang 'gro ba skyong zhes bya ba dang / chos skyong zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa dag kyang / de'i tshe der lhags te/ de dag thams cad kyis kyang rang rang gi mchod pas/ mchod pa lnga ma rnams
51a4(mdo sde): zil gyis mnan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po'i tshogs kyi mchod nas// zhal zas ma bzhe nges pa'i phyir mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te/ re thag
51a5(mdo sde): chad nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus/ ta la/ bdun gyi srid tsam du 'phags te 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra ma gtogs par/ yangs pa
51a6(mdo sde): can gyi rgyal po zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po/ grong khyer gyi nang na gnas pa dang / phyi rol na gnas pa'i g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pa/ 'dzam bu gling thams cad kyi grong khyer dang / ri
51a7(mdo sde): khrod kyi grong dang / yul po che dang / kha lungs kyi rgyal po gang ga'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te/ lhags so// rgyal po de rnams re re la yang
51a8(mdo sde): dmag 'a khrug yas phrag bco brgyad bco brgyad yod do// de dag la glang po che rtag tu 'gram pa nas rdul 'dzag pa dang / rta rlung gi shugs pas lhag par 'grogs ba dag kyang yod do// de dag
51b1(mdo sde): gi mchod pa'i yo byad gang yin pa de dag kyang / mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma de dag las nyis 'gyur gyis ches bzang la ches mang ste/ de lta bu'i mchod pa'i phul dag khyer nas/ dpung gi tshogs yan
51b2(mdo sde): lag bzhi dang btsa ste lhags so// de dag gi mchod pa de rnams kyi nang na/ gdugs thung ngu gang yin pa de yang / dpag tshad brgyad cu chu zheng gang bar 'dug go/ ba dan gyi nang na chung ngu gang yin pas
51b3(mdo sde): kyang dpag tshad brgya stong du phyin no// rgyal mtshan phal pa gang yin pa de la yang 'phang du dpag tshad sum cu yod do// de ltar yangs pa can gyi rgyal po zla ba dri ma med pa'i rgyal po dang / gnyi 'od ces
51b4(mdo sde): bya ba dang de la sogs pa rgyal po rnams nyi ma 'char dkar lhags te/ de dag kyang dam pa'i chos sun 'byin cing rtags can 'chal pa rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa/ mthus kyang
51b5(mdo sde): sems can rnams dam pa'i chos la 'god par byed pa dang / bdag cag gi nor dang 'bru'i tshogs dang / mdzod dang 'bru'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag ni dam pa'i chos gnas par
51b6(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir ro// snyam du sems pa sha stag dang / bdag cag dam pa'i chos la nan tan bya'o// dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams kyi lha ni drung nas gcad do zhes dam bcas pa brtan por byas pa
51b7(mdo sde): sha stag dang / theg pa chen po 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la snying brtse ba sha stag ste/ de dag gi mchod pa rnams kyis/ yangs pa can nas grong khyer ku sha'i bar thams cad kun tu gang
51b8(mdo sde): bar gyur to// de dag gi gdugs kyi grib ma 'dab chags su 'dug pas ni/ nyi ma'i 'od kyis mi phog go/ de dag gis kha zas kyi dri bsung gis ni dpag tshad bzhir khyab par gyur te/ de dag gis
52a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rang rang gis sbyar ba'i zhal zas bzhes par lan gsum gyi bar du gsol ba btab kyang / zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste/ langs nas
52a2(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo ma gtogs par/ yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo/ 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ma la sogs pa/ 'dzam
52a3(mdo sde): bu gling pa'i rgyal po dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi chung ma gang ga'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu lhags te/ de dag thams cad kyang bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems
52a4(mdo sde): can mang po nges par sgrol ba/ rtag tu lus bsgom pa dang da ldan pa/ chen po stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med da pa dang / smon pa med pas sems rnam par dag pa sha stag
52a5(mdo sde): ste/ 'di lta ste/ yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo/ 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ma zhes bya ba dang / btsun mo bri yang ku zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa thams cad
52a6(mdo sde): kyang sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du/ snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ gcig la gcig 'jus nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i phyir/ yam
52a7(mdo sde): sreg shing rnams khyer te/ mchod pa snga ma thams cad rang rang gi mchod pa rnams kyis zil gyis mnan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la nyis 'gyur du mchod pa byas te/ de dag gi mchod pa'i yo byad
52a8(mdo sde): rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs rnams kyi 'phang dang / chu zheng gi tshad kyang snga ma'i nyis 'gyur bas lhag go// kha zas rnams kyi dri bsrung can ni dpag tshad brgyad du khyab par gyur
52b1(mdo sde): te/  bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ zhal zla ba zhes par gsol ba btab kyang / zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byed cing / skra 'bal la/ rang rang gi rgyan rnams 'thor
52b2(mdo sde): zhing skad mi snyan pas ngus te/ bu gcig pa shi ba bzhin du mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus/ sa la zung gi drung nyid du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang
52b3(mdo sde): de'i tshe/ lha mig yangs shes bya ba la sogs pa/ lha'i tshogs gang+ga'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed dang / lhan cig tu lhags na/ lha de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag ltos/ grogs
52b4(mdo sde): po dag ltos// mi rnams kyi mchod pa'i yo byad mchog tu khyad du 'phags la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang bkur sti
52b5(mdo sde): thams mchod par 'dod de/ mi rnams kyi zhal zas kyi tha ma pa zhes pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs/ kyis grog po dag bdag cag gis kyang / de bzhin gshegs
52b6(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la so so nas mchod pa bya zhing / tha ma'i dus su zhal zas dbul bar bya na/ ji ltar bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas/ de bzhin gshegs pas
52b7(mdo sde): gsol te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs par mdzad cig go/ grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni shin tu dkon no// de bas kyang zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phun
52b8(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa ni ches dkon no// kye ma bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das na ni/ 'jig rten stong par 'gyur ro// zhes smras so// lha de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po zos par 'dod
53a1(mdo sde): la thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan to snyam du dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen pos skom pa/ ngoms nas kyang gzhan skom pa rnams ngoms par bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa/ theg
53a2(mdo sde): ba chen po la ser sna med pa/ theg pa chen po la phrag dog dang / dus che ba dang / 'chab pa dang / sgyu med pa/ theg pa chen po sun 'byin pa'i sems can rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa/ dam pa'i chos
53a3(mdo sde): bsrung ba'i tshul khrims blangs pa/ 'jig rten dang 'thun par slob par 'dod pa/ bdag cag rgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o// bdag cag grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo
53a4(mdo sde): bskor bar bya'o// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod pa/ go cha chen po bgos pa/ bslab pa rnams la dam bcas pa brtan pa dang / de bzhin du
53a5(mdo sde): yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ bu cig pa la bya ba bzhi na du 'jig rten thams cad la snying rjes lta ba sha stag ste/ de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar/ ston pa yongs su mya ngan las
53a6(mdo sde): 'da' ba'i gdung zhugs la bzhin pa'i phyir/ bud shing dang yam sreg shing rnams khyer te/ de dag kyang snga mas phul ba'i yam sreg shing gi nyis 'gyur bas bzang ba'i lha rdzas dri bsung dang ldan pa/ 
53a7(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba mi la dkon pa sha stag go/ shing rta yang rta'i mchog mgyogs pa dag dang sbyar ba/ dar la dkar pos g.yogs pa/ gzugs dang dbyibs/ ri mor bri bar mi nus pa/ dril bu g.yer kha'i
53a8(mdo sde): dra ba can gyi yol bas bskor ba/ dang yug khyim chen po'i bla re rgya chen po/ rtsa ba ri mo can dag la btsug pa dang / gar thabs dang / rol mo yid du 'ong ba rnams kyi mdun du drangs pa/ khabs
53b1(mdo sde): rnam pa mang bdag dang / seng ge khra ba DUn rgyan rten gyi ma na du 'od kyi sna yang byas pa/ skangs dran gser las byas padag kyang bshams pa dang / sa phyogs kyang me tog dra bsrung rnam po sna tshogs kyis
53b2(mdo sde): mdzes par byas la me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing bkod pa/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi'i phyi bzhin 'drang ba sha stag ste/ so so nas mchi ma khrag lto bu mi thub cing / mchog tu sdug bsngal bas
53b3(mdo sde): gdungs nas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba dang / snying rtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog du gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam
53b4(mdo sde): pasna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom da ldan 'das kyi thang du dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs ngal mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mchod pa dang / bskur stir
53b5(mdo sde): mchog rnams mang po dag byas te/ bskor po yang byas nasabacom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnams kyi phyir rang rang gi bla gos sa la bting ste/ rang rang gi rgyan rnams phog cing gtor nas/ 
53b6(mdo sde): rang rang gi skra 'bal zhing / skad mi snyan pas ngu ste/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis sbyar ba'i bshos gsol te/ yongs su mya ngan
53b7(mdo sde): las 'da' bar mdzad du gsol zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes te/ cang mi gsung nas/ de dag re thag chad de langs nas/ phyogs gcig
53b8(mdo sde): tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ klu'i rgyal po phyogs bzhin gnas pa/ klu'i rgyal po ni rgyas kyi bu dang / dga' bo dang / nyi dga' bo la sogs pa/ klu'i rgyal po gang go'i klung dgu
54a1(mdo sde): bye ma snyed shin tu rings par/ nyi ma 'char kar lha rnams kyi mchod pa las kyang nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa'i mchod pa yo byad/ rang rang gi 'byor pa dang mtsham bdag khyer nas/ @
54a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi thangad du dong ste/ phyag 'tshal nas zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang bsam pa bzhin du ma grub nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ rnam thos kyi bu la so// 
54a3(mdo sde): pa gnod sbyin gyi bdag po g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa/ gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed cig la gcig 'jus nas/ rang rang gi mchod pa rnams kyis/ klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi mchod pa snga ma zil gyis
54a4(mdo sde): mnan nas tshogs chen po dang chas te lhags nas/ bcom da ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas bzhes par/ degasol ba btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal zas ma
54a5(mdo sde): bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste/ langs nas/ phyogs gtu ga tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ nam mkha' ldi gi bdag po dgra'i mdza' bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa/ na mkha' rdzing
54a6(mdo sde): gi rgyal po gang+gA'i klung nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyis rang rang gi mchod pas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po snga ma dag gi mchod pa rnams zil gyis mnan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas pa zhes
