54a7(mdo sde): par gsol ba btab kyang / zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste/ langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ dri za'i bdag po mis byin gyi bu la sogs pa/ dri za'i bdag
54a8(mdo sde): po gang+ka'i klung sum cu'i bye ma snyed kyis/ mchod pa thams cad pas kyang ches mchog tu gyur pa'i mchod pa rnams khyer te 'ongs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te/ rol mo snyan dgu/ 
54b1(mdo sde): byas nas/ phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas/ de dag kyang yid mi dga' bar 'gyur te/ langs nas phyogs gcig
54b2(mdo sde): tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po legs mthong la sogs pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed lhags te/ snga ma rnams kyi mchod pa de dag bsdom pas kyang
54b3(mdo sde): de dag re re'i mchod pa ches khyad par 'phags par gyur te/ de dag kyang / shA ma bzhes/ yid mi dga' bar gyur te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po
54b4(mdo sde): legs mthong chen po la sogs pa/ lto 'phye chen po'i bdagadapo gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis/ mchod pa snga da ma'i nyis 'gyur khyer ba las/ snga ma bzhin du zhal zas ma bzhes
54b5(mdo sde): nas yid mi dga' ste phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ lha ma yin gyi bdag po bde mchog rigs la sogs pa/ lha ma yin gyi bdag po gang ga'i klung drug bcu'i
54b6(mdo sde): bye ma snyed/ lus tshe nong snang ba chen po dang ldan pa/ lha ma yin gyi bsam pa sha stag gis/ mchod pa snga ma nyis 'gyur gyis mchod pa dag khyer te 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal
54b7(mdo sde): nas zhal zas ma bzhes te/ yid ma dga' bar gyur nas langs te/ shing sa la zung ga drung du/ rang rang gi gzi byin gyis snang bar byas te 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ skyon byed ma'i bu
54b8(mdo sde): bdag po gang ga'i chung ma med pa rjes byin la sogs pa/ sbyin byed ma'i bug ng+gA krung bdun bcu'i bye ma snyed/ lus che zhing snang ba chen po dang ldan pa/ sbyin byed ma'i bu'i bsam pa med pa sha stag nis
55a1(mdo sde): mchod pa snga ma thams cad las/ mchod pa nyis 'gyur bas bzang ba dag khyer ba las/ snga ma bzhin du zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ yid mi dga' bar gyur te/ shings
55a2(mdo sde): la zung gi drung du rang rang gi gzi brjid kyis snang bar byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ srin po'i bdag po 'jigs byed la sogs pa/ srin de'i bdag po gad+hi krung
55a3(mdo sde): brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed srin po'i bsam pa med pa sha stag gis gzi brjid chen po'i tshogs kyis/ sa la zung gi drung snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu
55a4(mdo sde): 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ 'bras bu'i shing gi bangadag bo dri sil la sogs pa/ 'bras bu'i shing gi bdag pogang+ga'i klung dgu cu'i brim snyed kyis/ sdo ma'i mchod pa thams
55a5(mdo sde): cad pas nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyis lhag pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs khyer nas/ khu drug po rgyags pa rnams dang / bung ba rnams skad 'byin pa dang / ldan pa'i me tog 'tshe ba'i
55a6(mdo sde): khri shing mang po'i dogs pa dang / lo ma kha 'bus pa rnams kyisas phyogs brgyan te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po/ sgyu 'phrul chen po la sog
55a7(mdo sde): bang rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po gang+gA klung stong gi bye ma snyed kyis mchod bsnga ma nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa'i mchod padag khyer nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod // gzhan yang de'i tshe lha mo 'dod
55a8(mdo sde): dgur sgyur po'i gzugs can legs maming ma la sogs pa/ gang+gA krung byem snyed kyis/ yangs bcan gyi rgyal ba'i btsun mo mchod dang nyis 'gyur bas lhag padag khyer te/ ra rang gargya rnam
55b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngangs la srungs nas phyogs gcig tu la khong ngo // gzhan yang de ni/ lnga'i bu mo ma b+ha dang / ur+tha sha la sogs pa/ lnga bu mo gang gA klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyengaH
55b2(mdo sde): bsnga ma'i nyis 'gyur nyes 'gyur bas chos lhag por mang zhing / sba ba dag gis bdun du drangs te/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ 'byung po'i tshegos pa
55b3(mdo sde): bsangs ltar 'khor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa/ gang ga klung bye ba phrag stong gi bye ma snyed/ sngam bzhi du byags gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ 'jig rten skyong ba ban lnga'i bug
55b4(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma phrag 'bum dang ljon cig tu mchod pa snga ma'i nyasa'agyur nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa dag khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ 
55b5(mdo sde): snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de tshe/ rlung lha bani/ rlung gtong ba'i lha/ gang ga'i klung bye ba phrag 'bum dang lhan cig tu/ dus ma yin par yang shing
55b6(mdo sde): ljon pa dang / khri shing dang / shing gel pa dang / nags rnams dang / snye ma dang / me tog gi khri shing dang / byi ru rnams kyis sa phyogs brgyan par byed cing / dus tshigs thams cad kyi me tog
55b7(mdo sde): gi dpal rnams phyogasu rgyas par byed la/ lo ma kha 'bus pa rtsa dmar ba rnams kyis/ shing sa la zung / nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od zer ser po dza hong kar 'dug pa bzhin du byas nas/ mchod pa snga ma'i nyas
55b8(mdo sde): 'gyur bas lhag po'i mchod pa dag khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ snga ma bzhin du shing sa la zung gi drung du 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ char pa 'bebs pa'i lha gang ga
56a1(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed/ sprin chen po dang / chu snar rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing glog 'gru ba'i gseb nas/ rma bya'i 'grin pa ltar mdog sngo ba'i char gyi rgyun 'bab la/ 'brug sma la nas
56a2(mdo sde): sgrogs pa'i sprin dang ldan pas/ char zim bu bsil ba dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te// zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ re thag chad de/ de bzhin
56a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la zhen pa'i me gsad pa'i phyir nam mkha' nyid la 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ spos kyo glang po sgra gcan dang / lus btang mdog dang / sbrang rtsi'i mdogasel dang / 
56a4(mdo sde): 'dod dgu'i spos ldan la sogs pa/ spos kyi glang po gang+gA klung nyi shu'i bye ma snyed theg pa chen po 'dod pa sha stag gis ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir/ gangs kyi
56a5(mdo sde): sman dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / sdong bu shing rta chen po'i phang mo tsam/ sha stag dang / dgon pa chen po dag nas pad+ma dang / ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / rtsa ba dang / 
56a6(mdo sde): 'bras bu dang / rdo gu tha dad pa du ma dag sna'i thor tos phyung zhing phyung zhing khyer te/ rlung gi shugs pas kyang ches 'gyogs pa dang / shin tu rings par dbyar gyi 'brug sgra bzhin du sgrogs shing lhags
56a7(mdo sde): nas/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma bcer ba'i seng ge'i khri'i lda ldi dag bshams te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ zhal zas ma bzhes pas re chad de/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang
56a8(mdo sde): de'i tshe/ seng ge seng ge sgra sgrogs shes bya ba la sogs pa/ seng ge gang+ga'i klung sume cu'i bye ma snyed/ sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa sha stag gis/ seng ge'i rtsal chen pos spos
56b1(mdo sde): kyi glang po che rnams dang 'dra bar/ me tog 'bras bu rnams khyer te/ rings par lhags nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ byangang ba dang / khrung khrung dang / ngur ba dang / ka dam pa/ 
56b2(mdo sde): dang / zal mo dang / gzhad dang / khu byugs dang / ba le ka dang / ka la bing ka dang / shang shang te'u la sogs pas kyang / spos kyi glang po che rnams dang / 'dra bar me tog 'bras bu khyer te/ rang rang
56b3(mdo sde): gi skad phyung nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ si'i steng na/ ba dang / ma he mo dang / ram mo yod do cog gis kyang / nu ma 'o mas bkang ste/ shin tu rings par lhags
56b4(mdo sde): nas/ shings la zung gi drung nas phyogs gshong zhig mthong nas der rang rang gi nu ma 'o mas gang ba de dag las/ 'o ma ngagaseg ma dang / bye ma dang / ba tshas ma 'bags shing / 
56b5(mdo sde): pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba med pa dag gzags te/ 'o ma de dgaganang na/ sbrang bu dag bsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ drang srong bzod par smra ba
56b6(mdo sde): la sogs pa/ gling bzhi na gnas pa'i drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ theg pa chen po 'dod pa sha stag la gang ga'i klung dkrigs kyi bye ba snyed/ rang rang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis/ yam sreg
56b7(mdo sde): shing dang zhal zas dag khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ 'od srung chen po la sogs pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun kha cig
56b8(mdo sde): dang gnas brtan kun dga' bo la sogs pa ma gtog por/ yul phyogs no gnas pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong mdza snyed med pa de dag thams cad kyang ma lus par der lhags so// gzhan yang
57a1(mdo sde): de che/ ra rab la sogs pa na pa'i rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi ba mtshams kya ga ga gras med pa'i byem snyed kyang nang ljon pa dang / khra shing mang po nyamatshan
57a2(mdo sde): grim ma byed pa dang / drag zang yag grib mche ba dang / drag kha nas 'bab pa'i chus gang ba dang / rman gshong rdo gu dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu gang ba dag kyang / der ljags so// lha'i bu mthu ba
57a3(mdo sde): tshe'i mdun ma chen po dag kyang ri rab dang bcas te/ mchod pa'i phyir lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ lha'i bu mthu bo che/ 
57a4(mdo sde): 'od chen po/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i nang na gnas pa dang / da chu klung chen po dag gi nang na gnas pa/ gang+gA'i klung dgrangs med pa'i bye ma snyed / mchod pa sdam pas ches
57a5(mdo sde): nyis 'gyur gyis mdzes pa'i mchod pa sngon du btang nas/ mi'i 'od kyis mar me'i 'od zil gyis mnan pa bzhin du rang rang gi 'od kyi nyi ma'i 'od zil gyis mnan te/ nyi ma 'char
57a6(mdo sde): ka'i 'od kyis/ shing mya ngan 'tshang gi lo ma thams cad/ dmar lam mer byed pa bzhin du/ rang rang gi 'od kyis/ chu klung gser ldan gyi chu thams cad dmar lam mer snang bar byas nas/ bcom
57a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ grong khyer ku shi nas shing sa la zung gi drung gi bar skabs kyi bar snang la/ kha zangs ri'i dbang po'i rtse mo lta bu/ 
57a8(mdo sde): ngang nga'i thal gong ltar dkar ba sha stag gis/ 'khrigs par gyur to// sa gzhi ni skyed mos tshal dang / rdzing bu'i chu pad+mas mdzes par byas pa dag gis gang bar 'dug ste// byang gi sgra mi snyan/ 
57b1(mdo sde): gyi skyed mas tshal bas kyang lhag par mdzes so// gcig tu dga' nga'i tshal dang / shing rta sna tshogs can dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ sa phyogs de dag de ltar dga' dga' 'dug kyang / lha dang lha ma yin
57b2(mdo sde): dang mi de dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir shin tu ngu'o// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams rang rang gi 'khor la 'di skad ces 'dzer to// 
57b3(mdo sde): grogs po ltos/ grogs po dag ltos/ lha dang lha ma yin dang mi rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las khyad du 'phags la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma
57b4(mdo sde): 'bul ba la brtson gyis/ grogs po dag bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ so so nas mchod par bya'o// 
57b5(mdo sde): zhal zas kyi tha ma yang dbul bar bya'o// gal te bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas tha ma bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes par gyur na/ de las bdag cag gis sbyin pa'i
57b6(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa chen po thob par 'gyuraro zhes de dag gis de skad ces smras nas/ g.yog 'khor mang po grangs med pa dang bcas pas mchod pa lnga ma'i nyis 'gyur gyi mchod pa dang / zhal zas mang po
57b7(mdo sde): dag khyer ro// me tog mang po dag kyang khyer te/ 'di lta ste/ man dar ba rnams dang / man da ra ba chen po rnams dang / ka ke ru ka rnams dang / ka ke ru ka chen po rnams dang / 
57b8(mdo sde): man dzu sha ka rnams dang / man dzu sha ka chen po rnams dang / san tan ga rnams dang / san tanag chen po rnams dang / 'od can rnams dang / 'od can chen po rnams dang / kun tu 'od can/ 
58a1(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'od mtha' yas pa rnams dang / mdzes sdug rnams dang / mdzes sdug chen po rnams dang / dga' byed rnams dang / dga' byed chen po rnams dang / dra/ 
58a2(mdo sde): mchog rnams dang / dri mchog chen po rnams dang / spos kyi ngad ldang rnams dang / spos kyi ngad ldang chen po rnams dang / kun tu dad ldang rnams dang / kun tu ngad ldang chen po rnams dang / mtha'
58a3(mdo sde): yas ngad ldang rnams dang / mtha' yas ngad ljang chen po rnams dang / lha rdzas kyi mdab ma rnams dang / klu shing gi me tog rnams dang / yongs 'dus brtol rnams dang / de lta bu gzhan dag
58a4(mdo sde): kyang khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ nyi ma'i gzi byin gyis srin bu me khyer gyi 'od zil gyis mnan pa bzhin du rang rang gi gzi byin gyis thams cad kyi
58a5(mdo sde): 'od zil gyis mnan te/ zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi
58a6(mdo sde): 'khor dang bcas pas/ mchod pa snga ma de'i nyis 'gyur de'i rkyen tu 'tsham pa de na yod pa'i me tog gi sna grangs du ma yid du 'ong ba rnams dang / yid du 'ong ba chen po rnams dang / dri bsung zhim po
58a7(mdo sde): khyer ro// khang bzangs chen po rdo thal gyi mdog ltar dkar ba/ them skas kyi rim pa dang ldan pa/ skar khung gi phreng ba du ma/ pug ron shug rtse ba dang ldan pa dag kyang sprul nas/ bcom
58a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
58b1(mdo sde): ces gas pa te// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag na theg pa chen po'i mdo sde can srung ba lags na/ bdag cag la thugs rtse ba'i slad du/ bdag cag gas phul ba'i nal bas bzhes su gsapa/ 
58b2(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol kyang / zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'phags pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa theg pa chen po'i mdo las// 
58b3(mdo sde): bam po gnyis pa/ de'i rjes la mthar gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha yi ros drug po rnams kyis steng gi bar snang la mchod pa dang / 'od snga ma las khyad du 'phags nas/ bcom ldan
58b4(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ de dag gi mchod pa'i nang na/ gdu gas phal ba gang yin pa de yang / kho ra khor yug tu gling bzhi pa'i khyon tsam mo// ba dan phal ba gang yin pa de
58b5(mdo sde): yang / rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i mthar thug ste/ shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho nas/ nub phyogs kyi rgya mtshor thug te/ rlung / gis bskyod dam/ rlung gis phyar na/ ba dan de dag las
58b6(mdo sde): bi wang gi sgra snyan pa khong nas 'khyig pa lta bur snyan pa dag 'byung ste/ de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung
58b7(mdo sde): nas/ re thag chad de/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa rnams ma gtogs par/ gong ma gong ma'i sems can gzhan gang yin pa de dag thams cad/ bcom
58b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ mchod pa rgya chen po'i tshogs dang chas te lhags nas snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu
59a1(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa dag gis bskor cing / bdun du bdar te/ rang gi gzi byin gyis lha thams cad kyi gzi byin cil khyi mnan nas/ mchod pa'i tshogs chen po dang chas te/ bcom/ 
59a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi tha dad du dong ngo // de dag gi ba dan phal gang yin pa de yang / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas 'phyang ste/ shing sa la zung gi drung du thug go/ des kyang bcom ldan 'das las zhal zas bzhes
59a3(mdo sde): par gsol ba las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas de'i tshe/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris/ lha ma yin gyi g.yog 'khor dpag tu med pa dang
59a4(mdo sde): bcas pas/ tshangs pa dang / dbang po gnyis ma gtogs dpar/ de'i bar gyi lha yod do cog gi 'od/ rang gi 'od kyis mog mog por byas nas/ de'i rkyen du 'tsham pa'i
59a5(mdo sde): mchod pa'i tshogs dang / rkyen du 'tsham pa'i zhal zas dag dang chas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo // de'i gdugs phal pa yang chu zheng du 'jig rten gyi khams chung
59a6(mdo sde): du khyab pa tsam ste/ des kyang bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas/ langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bdud sdig
59a7(mdo sde): can chung ma grangs med pa'i 'khor dang chas te/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi bar srang phye nas/ de dag la chu dang kha zas la sogs pa/ ci 'dod pa byin te/ de dag la de bzhin
59a8(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran par gyis shig/ sbyin pa'i tha ma la rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig ces smras nas/ de dag la khyod bde bar gyur cig ces kyang
59b1(mdo sde): dbugs phyung ngo // sems can dmyal ba'i grong khyer mtshon chas gang zhing / me chen po 'bar ba rnams su yang / sprin chen po bzhin du/ chu chen po phab nas sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyis/ 
59b2(mdo sde): sngon ma myong ba'i bde ba dang ldan pa'i 'du shes skyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus/ bdud kyi sems kyi gnas skabs de lta bur gyur to// de'i 'khor gang yin pa de dag gis kyang / gzhu
59b3(mdo sde): dang rol gri dang / tho ba dang / dgra sta dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / mtshon kam pa na dang / lcags kyi ber ga dang / lcags mda' dang / sha ta ga ni dang / mda' dang / 'phang
59b4(mdo sde): mdung dang / mdung rtse gcig pa la sogs pa/ mtshon dacha rnams yongs su spangs te/ chos lhur len par gyur to// de'i mchod pa yang lha snga ma rnams la med pa de
59b5(mdo sde): lta bur gyur te/ de'i gdugs phal pa'i chu zheng du yang / 'jig rten gyi khams par ma'i khyon tsam mo// de ltar de mthu chen po dang ldan zhing / rang gi chus rnams kyis rnga
59b6(mdo sde): yab kyis g.yo ba bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'did ce gsol to// bcom ldan
59b7(mdo sde): 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / 'khor dang bcas pas bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes su gsol// bcom ldan 'das bdag gra da slan chad theg pa chen po'i slad du
59b8(mdo sde): dam paca' bar 'tshal to// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung / 'dzags pa'i slad du'am/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'tshal pa'i srang du'am/ thob du ba'i slad du'am/ gzhin
60a1(mdo sde): gyis bgyid du stsal pa'am/ gzhan gyi yid bsrung ba'i slad du yang rung ste/ theg pa chen po brjod par bgyid na/ de'i don du 'jigs pa dang ma dga' ba thams cad bsam/ 
60a2(mdo sde): pa'i gsang sngags bshad par 'tshal lo// tad ya thA/ thag ke/ Ta Ta ra thag ke/ ro ru re/ ma hA ro ru re/ A la mA la/ tA la satwa/ chos smra ba 'khrul pa dang / 'jigs pas gnod par gyur pas
60a3(mdo sde): rnams chos kyi tshul la spobs pa bskyed par bgyi ba dang / mu stegs pa rnams myos par bgyi ba dang / dam pa'i chos bsrung ba dang / bdag dang gzhan srung ba'i slad du/ bdag gis rang gi dam
60a4(mdo sde): tshig gis smras pa'i gsang sngags 'di glang po che'i 'jigs dpa'am/ nags khung gi 'jigs pa 'am/ chu klung gi 'jigs pa 'am/ me'i 'jigs pa rnams kyi nang du/ bsrung
60a5(mdo sde): ba'i gzung sngags kyi don du brjod pa gang lags de dag ni brjod/ pa tsam gyis/ ji ltar ru sbal rang gi lus bsrungs pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis g.yo dang sgyu ma mchis par/ 
60a6(mdo sde): de dag 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi/ stobs dang ldan par bgyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da zhal zas 'di bzhes par gsol zhes bskul to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
60a7(mdo sde): kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sdig can khyod kha zas kyi phyir gsol ba ma 'debs shig/ gsang sngags kyi tshig ni sems can la phan pa'i phyir/ chos kyi sbyin par 'gyur
60a8(mdo sde): bas na/ bzhes par byare/ zang zing gi sbyin pa ni/ de lta ma yin gyis/ sdig can khyod gsol ba ma 'debs shig ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to// lan
60b1(mdo sde): gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du yang / bdud dang bdud kyi bu mo rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa las/ ma bzhes te/ re thag chad nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas
60b2(mdo sde): de'i tshe/ lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po lha'i bu dpag tu med pa/ mthu dpag tu med pa dag gis/ mdun du bdar te/ rang gi 'od kyis tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po dang lha ma yin dang / bdud kyi
60b3(mdo sde): 'od rnams snag cha'i gong bu bzhin du 'od mi gsal bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa rgya chen ba nyis sus gyur pas lhag pa dag khyer nas/ der song ste de'i mchod pa rnams kyi nang na/ gdugs pa la pha
60b4(mdo sde): gang yin pa de yang / chu zheng du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i'ajig rten gyi khams khyab par 'dug ste/ mchod pa de da lta bu sngon du btang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phyin te/ 
60b5(mdo sde): lan du ma bskor ba byas nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
60b6(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la bdag mchod pa bgyid pa ni/ sbrang bu mchod pa bgyid pa dang 'dra ste/ bdag sbrang bu dang 'dra bas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyid pa'i rngog la thog gis kyang / bcom
60b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ zhal zas kyi tha ma gsol bar ci gnang / zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab kyang / lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das cang mi
60b8(mdo sde): gsung bar gyur te/ re zag chad nas langs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa/ gtams
61a1(mdo sde): phrag dkrigs kyi bye bsnyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid 'phrog sgra snyan mu thug ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
61a2(mdo sde): rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des sras kyi thu bo/ nyan thos lus chen mtha' yas la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song la/ de na
61a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba ring por mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de'i don du 'jig
61a4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'di nas zhal zas zhim po phan pa dag khyer te/ sod shig/ mchod pa chen po dag kyang khyer te song la/ de la 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das
61a5(mdo sde): kyis zhal zas 'di gsol te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad du gsol zhes gyis shig/ khyod kyi the tsom dang / yid gnyis ci dang ci yod pa de dang de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs
61a6(mdo sde): pa de kho na la legs par zhus shig dang / des khyod la lung bstan par 'gyur ro// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas des/ legs
61a7(mdo sde): se legs so// zhes gsol nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bskor ba byas nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen po grangs med
61a8(mdo sde): pas bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so// de nas de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ 'gul
61b1(mdo sde): rab tu 'gul/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ 'khor rab tu 'khor/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'u rung/ shig shig rab tu shig shig/ mer mer rab tu mer mer/ ldem ldem rab tu ldem ldem mo// 
61b2(mdo sde): de la sogs pa byas te/ sa chen po rab tu g.yos so// de nas 'khor de dag gi nang na/ tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / 'jig rten skyong dang / lha ma yin dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs
61b3(mdo sde): balha rnams kyis sa gzhi de lta bur gyur pa mthong nas/ spyi bung zhes byas te/ 'jigs shing / kha dang rkog ma skams nas 'bros par chas te/ rang rang gi 'od kyang mi mthong zhing 'od nyams par gyur to// 
61b4(mdo sde): de nas 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa langs te/ lha'i tshogs de dag la 'di skad ces smra so// grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig/ shar
61b5(mdo sde): phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung grangs med pa/ gtams phrag dkrigs kyi bye ma'i rdul phra rab grangs med pa snyed pa na/ 'dzag rten gyi khams yid
61b6(mdo sde): 'phrog sgra snyan mu thug ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba/ da ltar bzhugs la 'tsho zhing bzhes te/ 
61b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa des/ rang gi sras kyi thu bo nyan thos la bos te bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song la/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
61b8(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba yongs su mya ngan las 'dar bar 'gyur gyis/ de dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la/ zhal zas kyi tha ma phul la/ khyod kyi the tsom dang
62a1(mdo sde): yid gnyis ci yod pa de dag kyang legs par zhus shig dang / des khyod la lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub
62a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas 'dir btang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas bskor cing / mdun du bdar nas/ 'dir 'ongs pa de'i gzi brjid kyis/ khyed kyi
62a3(mdo sde): 'od nyams par gyur to// de 'ong ba la rjes su yi rang bar gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pas/ bdag cag gi de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa mdzad pa la yang ltos shig/ 
62a4(mdo sde): ces byas so// de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis me long gi ngos la bdag gi gzugs mthong ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thag ring po nas bzhugs pa'i de bzhin
62a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa de dang 'jig rten gyi khams de mthong ngo // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ 'khor de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// ji ltar khyod kyis 'jig rten
62a6(mdo sde): gyi khams 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'di mthong ba de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag kyang ltos shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa
62a7(mdo sde): rnams ni 'di ltar bdag nyid chem yin te/ rang rang gi gnas na bzhugs bzhin du yang khyod la zhal ston par mdzad do// 'khor de dag gis smras pa/ kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar bdag nyid
62a8(mdo sde): che ba yang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba lta kyi hud ces zla zhing 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa'
62b1(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa dag gis bskor ba yang mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi baspur bun+de re nas/ pad+ma chen po byung ngo // pad+ma chen po re re la yang grong khyer bdun khri brgyad stong bdun lnga
62b2(mdo sde): brgyad stong yod la/ grong khyer de dag kyang / yul yangs pa can gyi thag dru tsam sha stag ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rab dang / 'obs bdun rim gyis bskor la/ shing ta la 'phreng ba bdun
62b3(mdo sde): rim gyis mdzes par byas pa sha stag ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang ldan zhing dga' dga' ltar 'dug la/ re ba de dag kyang 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi bgam chen po sha stag gis
62b4(mdo sde): bskor te/ bag ma thams cad kyi bar bar na yang shing ljon pa gzhon sha can 'bras bu dang / me tog dang ldan pa snga mang po dag yod do// shing ljon pa de dag gi yan
62b5(mdo sde): lag rlung gis bskyod pa las kyang / sil snyan dga' bar byed pa'i sgra bstan cing chags su rung ba 'byung ba/ sna lnga lnga sgrogs te/ sgrad de dag gis/ sems can de dag
62b6(mdo sde): rje zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// 'obs de dag thams cad kyang / chu bsil zhing shel bzhin du dang ba dag gis gang bar 'dug ste/ de dag gi nang kho ra khor yug du/ sems can de dag
62b7(mdo sde): rin po che'i gru dag gis dga' zhing rgyu bar byed do// chu de dag kyang pad+ma dang / ud pa la dang / ku mu ta shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam stag gis brgyan to// 'obs kyi kho ra khor yug kyang bskyed mos
62b8(mdo sde): tshal gyi 'phreng bas mdzes par byas te/ bskyed mos 'tshal re re la yang / rdzing bu thag gru dpag tshad phyed pa lnga lnga yod do// rdzing bu'i chu de dag kyang pad+ma dang / ud pa la dang / ku mud kha
63a1(mdo sde): dog sna tshogs dri zhim po shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam sha stag gis khebs par 'dug la/ shing ljon pa me tog rgyas pa'i 'phreng bas mdzes par byas so// bskyed mos tshal khor
63a2(mdo sde): khor yug na yang / ngang ngur dang / thal mo dang / khrung khrung shug dag gis pad+ma'i ze 'bru myang bar byed do// khor khor yug gi bskyed mos tshal de dang de dag no yang / khang khyim dag yod la/ khang
63a3(mdo sde): pa re re la yang / chu zheng dpag tshad bzhi bzhi yod do// rtsigs pa ni gser dang / dngul dang bai DUR+Ya dang / shel las byas/ sa gzhi ni ke ke ru las grub ste/ nor bu'i 'jon tshar gyis spel
63a4(mdo sde): cing / snang bar byas pa'i mu tig gi do shal sbyangs pa dang ldan pa/ gser rta babs chen po dang / skar khung dang / dra bau dag gis brgyan pa'i khang bzangs mthon po/ sa gser gyi
63a5(mdo sde): bye ma bdal ba dong ldan pa sha stag go// rdzing bu rnams kyang 'dul ba'i lam/ gser gyi them skas them pa btso brgyad dang ldan pa dang / mtha' thog du gser gyi chu shing gi
63a6(mdo sde): phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i tsan den gyi bsung can gyi chu dang ldan pa sha stag go// grong khyer chen po de dag re re'i nang na yang rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang
63a7(mdo sde): bud med kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa/ dpag tu med pa dag gis bskor cing / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan ste/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// sems can gzhan dag kyang de dang
63a8(mdo sde): 'dra ste/ sa phyogs ka tsa lin 'da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab la/ me tog gi sil ma gtor ba/ gzhan dag na rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// grong khyer chen
63b1(mdo sde): pade dag na theg pa chen po'i sgra ma gtogs par theg pa gzhan gyi sgra med do// pad+ma chen po de dag la yang seng ge'i khri chen po/ rkang pa gser dang / dngul dang / beDUR+Ya dang / shel las byas pa/ ka ma
63b2(mdo sde): ka'i ras kyis g.yogs pa/ che ba la 'os pa 'jig rten gsum na phul du bya ba sha stag gis dkrigs te/ seng ge'i khri de dag la rgyal po de dag 'khod cing / sems can gzhan dag theg pa
63b3(mdo sde): chen po'i mdo sde rnams slobs par byed de/ rgyal po de dag gi mdun na la la ni yi ge 'dri/ la la ni klog/ la la ni kha ton slob bo// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus mtha' yas
63b4(mdo sde): kyis ba spu'i khung bu nas skye ba'i pad+ma dag la 'khod pa'i sems can de dag/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i dga' ba dang ldan yang de dag yongs su spangs nas/ mya ngan gyis
63b5(mdo sde): gdungs te/ smre sngags 'don cing kyi hud kyi hud ces bla zhing 'khod do// nyis 'gyur du mchod pa'i tshogs 'bul bar byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen
63b6(mdo sde): mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pas bskor te/ de lta bu'i 'byor pa'i rnam pa dag ston cing / mchod pa'i tshogs chen po dang / zhal zas rgya che ba dag khyer te 'ongs nas/ zhal
63b7(mdo sde): zas de dag dang / pad+ma de dag gi dri bsrung tshor ba gang yin pa de dag kyang / nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong
63b8(mdo sde): bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mthar yas kyi lus kyi tshad kyang / nam mkha' dang mnyam par 'dug ste/ sus kyang mthong bar mi nus so// de nas byang chub
64a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mthar yas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bang du song ste/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bral mo sbyar te 'di skad ces
64a2(mdo sde): gsol to// bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur te/ lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol kyang / bcom
64a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de langs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs logs nas
64a4(mdo sde): kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus da chen mtha' yas shes bya ba 'khor gyi tshogs chen po de dang ldan pa sha stag lhags te/ de dag gi pad+ma dang
64a5(mdo sde): grong khyer gyi tshad kyang snga ma snga ma las nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyuragyo che ba dang / 'byor pa nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyi che ba sha stag dang chas te/ de dag der lhags nas/ bcom
64a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la pad+ma dag gis mchod pa byas te/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// shing sa la zung gi drung grub pa'i gnas de nyid na/ dkyil 'khor sum cu rtsa gnyis chang khyon
64a7(mdo sde): gyis bzhi la/ sems can mi 'khod pa'i sgo skabs ci yang med do// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de ltar lu che ba rang rang gi g.yog 'khor dag dang bcas pa
64a8(mdo sde): de rnams kyang / kha cig ni sa phyogs smyung bu'i rtse mo'i khyon tsam la 'khod do// kha cig ni khab kyi rtse me'i khyon tsam la 'khod do// kha cig ni rdul phra rab kyi khyon tsam la bag yangs su 'khod do// 
64b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyis khams rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khod pa gang yin pa de dag kyang / thabs de lta bur lhags te 'khod do// 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can yang / tshe dang / 
64b2(mdo sde): ldan pa 'od srung dang / gnas brtan kun dga' bo dang / rgyal po ma skyes dgra rnams ma gtogs pa/ der ma 'ongs pa su yang med de// tha na mig gdug pa dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / sdig pa
64b3(mdo sde): dang snga ma la sogs pa/ las mi zad pa bcu drug byed pa yan chad kyang der lhags so// sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / lha ma yin rtag tu khon gyibasam pa can thams cad kyang ldog pa'i las spangs nas/ 
64b4(mdo sde): gcig la gcig pu dang / ma dang / sring mo dang / 'dra b.rasems par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa'i sems can thams cad
64b5(mdo sde): kyang gcig la gcig pu cig pa la ba ba bzhin du byams par byed de/ 'dod chen po ni ma gtogs so// mi mjed/ kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
64b6(mdo sde): mthus/ bong ba dang / rdo dang / gseg ma dang / rngu ba dang / tsher ma med par gyur te/ shing ljon pa rin po che'i khri shing gis dkris pa/ gnyen zhing reg na 'jam pa dag dang ldan zhing 'jig rten gyi kham
64b7(mdo sde): bde ba can dang 'dra bar gyur to// sems can der lhags pa thams cad kyis kyang / de na 'khod bzhin du/ ji ltar me long la rang gi gzugs bstan snang ba bzhin du/ rdul phra rabs kyi rdul
64b8(mdo sde): snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byor pa dang ldan pa gzhan dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / 
65a1(mdo sde): dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod kha dang / shel gyi kha dog lta bu dang / me lce lta bu dag byung ba yin pa de dag gis/ bya ba thams cad byas te/ phyir logs nas bcom
65a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das nyid kyi zhal du bzhugs te/ mi snang bar gyur to// 'khor thams cad kyi 'od kyang des zil gyis non par gyur to// de nas lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'od zer de
65a3(mdo sde): dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du mi snang bar gyur pa mthong nas/ 'jigs shing skyi bung zhes byas te/ rgyu med par bco ldan 'das kyi 'od zer rnams phyir log nas mi snang bar 'gyur ba'i mi rigs na gor
65a4(mdo sde): ma chag par phyogs bcu dag tu bya ba rnams zin nas/ da na gdon mi za bar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang
65a5(mdo sde): las zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ kye ma sems can thams/ cad la tshad med pa bzhi spangs sam/ ci smyung bar bzhug/ sa pa chad dam/ kye ma ci nyi ma dang zla ba nub bam/ ci dam
65a6(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi gru bying ngam/ kyi hud kyi hud ces blangs zhing 'khod do// de nas de dag rang rang gis yan lag rnams smras par byas pa'i khrag gis sa gzhi 'dam du gyur to// chu klung gser ldan kyang khrag
65a7(mdo sde): tu 'bab par gyur to// de nas 'khor de dag gi nang na/ grong khyer ku shi ba/ mgar ba'i bu// dge bsnyen skul byed ces bya ba de mgar ba'i bu bco lnga thabs gcig tu langs te/ rang rang gi
65a8(mdo sde): spyod lam bcos nas/ 'jig rten dag la bltas te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yos pa'i lha ngas btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar/ 
65b1(mdo sde): babatud nas/ mtsham ma thub pa bzhin du zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag na sems can thams cad nges par bsgral pa'i slad du/ 
65b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la/ zhal zas kyi tha ma 'bul bar 'tshal te/ bdag ni mgon ma
65b3(mdo sde): mchis pa lags/ rtsa lag ma mchis pa lags skyabs ma mchis pa lags/ phongs te re ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bdag gi phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes te/ yongasu mya ngan
65b4(mdo sde): las 'da' bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/ khyim bdag gam/ bram ze shin tu dbul dpo 'ga' zhig/ gzhan gyi yul du mchis la/ bdag nyid
65b5(mdo sde): spro ba skyed de/ mthar gyis zhing blas brtsams nas/ des rmon glang rmo sbyin pa zong gshol dang sbyar ba dag gis zhing la rdo dang rngu ba dang / tshe ma ma mchis par bgyis te/ re ba chen po bskyed
65b6(mdo sde): nas/ sprin chen po las char 'bab sdod cing mchis pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lus kyi zhing la nyes pa gsum dang / zhi dang bral ba'i yid dang / ngag gi rmon glang dang / shes pa'i thong gshes
65b7(mdo sde): gyis/ nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rdo dang / rngu ba dang / tshe ma ma mchis par bgyis nas khyod kyi chos kyi sprin chen po las chos kyi char 'bab pa la sdod cing mchis te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas
65b8(mdo sde): par spyan 'dren na/ bdag gi dbul ba gsal ba dang / sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du/ bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes su gsol// bdag ni mgon ma mchis pa/ skyabs ma mchis
66a1(mdo sde): pa lags na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la sgra can zin bzhin du gzigs par gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/ rgyal ba gang zag bla na med pas/ 
66a2(mdo sde): mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skul byed de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyod kyi zhal zas tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po bzhes par
66a3(mdo sde): mdzad do// de nas lha dang mi dang lha ma yin de dag gis/ skul byed kyis phul ba'i zhal zas tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas bzhes so zhes
66a4(mdo sde): thos nas/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos thob ste/ leg/ so legaso zhes skad chen po phyung nas/ mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces smras// kye ma mgar ba'i bu skul byed
66a5(mdo sde): khyod skyid de ba/ khyod kyi mi lus thob pa ni phan thogs par gyur to// legs par thob bo// skul byed 'jig rten na/ u dum pa ra'i me tog shin tu mdzes pa rnyed par dka'o// de bos
66a6(mdo sde): kyang ches de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba rnyed par dka'o// de bas kyang dad pa rnyed pa shin tu dka'o// de bas kyang ches chos thos pa rnyed par dka'o// de bas kyang ches de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma dbul
66a7(mdo sde): brnyed par dka'o// de bas na zhal zas kyi tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par/ mgar ba'i bu skul byed khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dper na ston zla 'bring po'i nya la sprin med pa'i tshe/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
66a8(mdo sde): dri ma med pa mdzes pa mthong ba na/ zla ba 'ba' shog mngon du snang ba de bzhin du/ khyed kyis phul ba'i zhal zas kyi tha ma/ de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes pas na khyod 'ba' shig sems can thams cad la
66b1(mdo sde): mngon du snang ngo // khyod la yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal lo// skul byed khyod ni mi'i lus byed bzhin du/ lha yi yang lha yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras sgra can zin dang 'dra'o// zhes byas nas/ tshigasu/ 
66b2(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// khyod ni mi ma yin te lha mchog yin// mi mchog gtso bo khyad par 'phags pa ste// de phyir khyod la gsol pa 'di skad 'debs// ston pa yongasu mya ngan 'da' bar chas// bdag
66b3(mdo sde): cag kun la brtsebs skul byed khyod// skye bo rnams la yun du phan pa'i phyir// 'dir ni ston pa dpag med mgon po la// bzhugs shing rgyun tu bdud rtsi ston ces gsol// sred las rnam grol mya ngan 'ad
66b4(mdo sde): bzhed la// gal te khyod kyis de ring ma gsol na// bdag cag/ thams cad ma rung shes par gyis// de las phan phyir mgon la gsol ba thob// de nas la la zhig pha ma gnyis shi ba la
66b5(mdo sde): phyir sos te gson por 'dug pa mthong na/ mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ba de kho na bzhin du/ mgar ba'i bu skul byed de mchog tu dga' bar gyur nas/ lag pa brkyang ste/ bcom
66b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas langs te/ tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kye ma dang bdag rnyed pa legs par rnyed// mo'i 'jig rten skyes pa 'bras bu yod// dan rnyed las srog la 'bral mi
66b7(mdo sde): 'gyur// mi bzad dmyal bar yang ni ltung mi 'gyur// deng 'dir rnyed pa chen po rnyed pa 'di// gser gyi phung po bas kyang lhag pa yin// dpa' bo bde gshegs mgon dang phrad pas na// phyin chad bdag ni dud 'gros
66b8(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med// sangs rgyas la ni dad pa gting zug pa// deng rnyed u dum pa ra'i me tog bzhin// rab 'jigs yi dgas 'gro ba yongs spangs shing // lha min skye ba'i sa bon mi bzod bcom// de
67a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs 'byung dkon dang de phrad ba// khab kyi rje mor yungs 'bru chags pa bzhin// de la pha rol phyin mchog sbyin dul bas// rtag tu lha yi 'gro bar 'bar bar gyur// chu
67a2(mdo sde): gnas pad+ma chus mi chags pa ltar// drang srong chen po 'jig rten chos rnams kyis// chags med phrad pas srid rtsi'i sa bon kun// drungs byung bdag ni 'khor ba'i mtsho chen rgal// rgya mtsho'i nang gi ru sbal
67a3(mdo sde): zhar ba'i 'grin// gnya' shing dmig tu chud dka' 'dra' ba las// bde gshegs deng phrad de la sbyin pa phul// de nas bdag gis nyon mongs gsog kun bcom// lha rnams kyis ni zhal zas bzangs
67a4(mdo sde): po dag/ phul yang bde gshegs ma bzhes bdag las ni// e ran de'i me tog 'dra ba zhes des// bdag ni 'dzag rten rab mchog dal yon can// tshangs pa brgya byin la sogs
67a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di// thams cad lhags te gus par bdag la mchod khyu mchog gnas son pa gang yin 'di// skye ba 'di nyid la ni bdag gis thob// de nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan
67a6(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// mgon khyod mya ngan 'da' ba mthong nas ni// 'jig rten 'di kun sdug bsngal gzir bar gyur// dbang med kyi hud ces ni skad char bla// 'di dag ma dor rtag tu sras bzhin
67a7(mdo sde): gzigs// lhun po'i gser gyi rtse mo rab mtho ba// mtsho chen dbus na mdzes par gnas pa ltar// chos kyi mnga' bdag khyod ni chos ston cing // dge 'dun dbus su mdzes par bzhugasu gsol/ 
67a8(mdo sde): ji ltar nyi ma gza can shar ba na// 'od zer dag gis sprin srab sel ba ltar/ drang srong chen po ye shes sgron chen gyis// skye bo mang po'i mya ngan dang bsal mdzod// sems can 'di dag dung mos mig spangs
67b1(mdo sde): shing // sdug bsngal gcig pu'i rgya mtsho'i tshang du zhugs// de phyir dad pa rnyed dkara' bskyed mdzad cing // 'di rnams sdug bsngal tshod la yung bzhugs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skul byed la bka' stsal/ 
67b2(mdo sde): pa/ skul byed de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni u dum pa ri'i me tog bzhin du shin tu rnyed par dka'o// dad pa yang rnyed par dka'o// chos thos pa yang rnyed par dka'o// de bzhin
67b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe/ zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yang rnyed par dka'o// skul byed gzhan yang khyod ma du mya ngan ma byed par// bdag gis de
67b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa thob bo snyam du dga' ba bskyed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs su
67b5(mdo sde): gsol zhes de skad du khyod gsol ba ma 'debs shig/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi de kho na nyid la rtogs shig/ rma rtag pa nyid la 'jug par gyis shig/ 'du byed rnams kyi rang
67b6(mdo sde): bzhin shes par gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas/ tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// tshe ni shin tu ring yang 'jigs par 'gyur// 'dir ni thams cad nges par 'chi bar 'gyur// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten
67b7(mdo sde): 'jigs pa'i chos can yin// 'byor pa thams cad rgud par gzhol bar 'gyur// rtag tu lang tshe rga bas nges par 'joms// gzugs bzang nad med nad kyi 'jigs par 'gyur// srog ni 'chi bas rtsa nas 'byin/ 
67b8(mdo sde): par byed// 'jig rten kun na rtag pa ci yang med// dbang phyug mi rtag cha yang mi rtag ste// kye ba'i sdug bsngal 'khor lor rtag tu 'khor// 'jig rten gsum na brtan po su yang med// srid pa dag na 'gro kun
68a1(mdo sde): gsog tu 'dug/ srid pa 'jigs pa'i chos can rab g.yo ba/ 'di dag na ni bde ba ci yang med// rga dang 'chi dang nad dang rgud rnams kyi// 'dzags pas rtag tu kun nas gtse bar byed/ 
68a2(mdo sde): srid pa mtha' med mi brtan snying po med// thams cad dgra dang 'khur bar shes par gyis// de na 'khor zhing nyon mongs dra ba yis// 'jig rten dkris te dar gyi srin bu bzhin// 'jig rten phan ther zug
68a3(mdo sde): gnod pa'i gzhi// rtag tu 'bras ltar sdug bsngal 'brel ba gang // mi gtsang lus dang 'dod pa de dag la// phan 'dod sdug bsngal bsal 'dod su zhig dga'// mi rtag 'dod pa rnams la chags pa med// 
68a4(mdo sde): tshul bzhin rtog pas 'dod chags 'bral bar 'gyur// de nas yang dag mthong na 'dod chags dral// de dag spangs bcwa dang grol ba nyid du 'gyur// nga ni srid pa'i chu chen legs par rgal/ 
68a5(mdo sde): nga ni sdug bsngal rnams 'das bde bar zhugs// de phyir ngas ni mtha' yas spros med pa// chags pa kun bsngal thar pa thob par gyur// nga la rga dang na dang 'chi ba med// nga la rtag tu
68a6(mdo sde): tshe yang zad pa med// nga ni me ltar 'bar te 'gro 'gyur gyis// khyod kyis nga ni med 'gyur ma sems shig/ de bzhin gshegs nyid lhun po 'dra bar ltos// nga dang yang dag mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// bde
68a7(mdo sde): mchog de ni nga yi chos nyid de// rgyal rnams spyod yul yin gyis khyod ma du// de nas bco ldan 'das la mgar ba'i bu skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ni de lags so// de ni/ 
68a8(mdo sde): de lags te/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni bdag gis kyang bsam gyis me khyab lags na/ sbrang bu dang 'dra ba'i sems can theg pa dman pa gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kye ma bdag
68b1(mdo sde): deng du/ byang chub sems dpa' mi mchog skal pa chen po dang ldan pa/ mchod par 'os pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa dang / zag pa zad pa rnams dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur to// bcom ldan
68b2(mdo sde): 'das dper gsol na/ gsar du bsnyen par rdzogs pa gzhon nu yang / rab tu byung ba de nyid kyi nyin par nas/ dge 'dun nang na dge 'dun 'grang zhing / yang dag par 'dus par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bdag
68b3(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi grangs su gtogs shing / yang dag par 'dus lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni/ de bzhin gsheg
68b4(mdo sde): pa yun tu bzhugs par 'tshal gyi/ kho zas tshig pa bzhin du mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs pa na mi 'tshal lags so// / de nas de'i tshe/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ mgar
68b5(mdo sde): ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces smras so// skul byed khyod 'di skad du/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa yun tu bzhu gas par 'tshal gyi/ kha zas tshig pa bzhin du mya ngan las
68b6(mdo sde): 'da' bar gshegs pa ni mi 'tshal lo// zhes de skad ma zer cig 'du byed kyi rang bzhin blta bar bya mod/ de ltar lta ba gang yin pa de ni/ stong pa nyid sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dam pa'i
68b7(mdo sde): chos 'dod pas ni de ltar brlab par bya'o// skul byed kyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'jam dpal 'o na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i yang lha yi mchog tu gyur/ gal te 'du byed du gyur na/ lha'i yang ltar 'os pa ma
68b8(mdo sde): yin no// 'du byed rnams ni chu bur lta bur shes shing / shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin du 'khor ba yin no// lha rnams ni mchog tu tshe ring zhes grags la/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni lo brgya yang ma thub ste/ de
69a1(mdo sde): bas na de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i yang ltar nges pa ma yin no// dper na mal la zhig grong dpon byed las/ de mthar gyis dbang phyug chen por gyur nas/ blon po chen po'i dbang phyug
69a2(mdo sde): las kyang 'das te/ rang gi dbang phyug gi 'bras bu chos kyis rnyed pa la longs spyod pa las/ de'i phyir yang bsod nams zad cing / dbang phyug las nyams par gyur na/ gzhan gyis bkol zhing brnyas par
69a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngul por gyur pa'i phyir ro// de dang 'dra bar/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed du gyur tu zin na/ 'chi ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir/ lha yi yang ltar 'os pa ma yin no// 
69a4(mdo sde): btsun pa 'jam dpal de bas na/ lha'i yang lha de bzhin gshegs/ pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ de ltar 'du byed dang 'dra bar ma lta shig/ 'jam dang la gzhan
69a5(mdo sde): yang ci khyod shes de bzhin gshegs pa la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin du rtog par byed dam/ 'on te ma shes pas rtog par byed/ gal te de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed dang 'dra ba ni// 
69a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gsum po dag na/ chos kyi dbang phyug brnyes pa/ lha'i yang lha mdzad pa'i 'os ma yin no// dper na rgyal po'i dbang po la la zhig la/ gyang stong gi mchog tu gyur pa'i gyad cig yod la/ de gyang
69a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i phyir/ gyang stong thob ces bya ba'i ming thob ste/ de la gyad zla med pa'i phyir bla nas/ dbang thang chen po 'grub na/ ci gyad stong thub pa de'i ming de thos na skad grags pa de mi bden pa yin nam
69a8(mdo sde): 'on te yon tan yod na ni/ yon tan can gyi ming thob pa yin no// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang / phung po'i bdud dang / lha'i bu'i bdud dang / rang bzhin gyis bdud kyi
69b1(mdo sde): gyang thams cad bcom pas na/ gyang stong thub bzhin du/ yang dag pa'i yon tan gyi sgo nas/ 'jig rten gsum po dag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes
69b2(mdo sde): bya ba yin gyis/ btsun pa 'jam dpal khyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'du byed dang 'dra bar yongs su ma rtogs shig/ dper na la la zhig phrug cing nor mang ba'i rigasu skye ba blangs la/ tshe thung bar 'gyur/ 
69b3(mdo sde): bzhig ste/ de skar mkhan dag gis mthong nas/ khye'u 'di ni che thung ngo zhes bstan te/ de'i ba mas de skad thos na/ 'di ni bdag cag gi khyim du phan par 'gyur ba ma yin no snyam nas/ grangs su yang ma
69b4(mdo sde): rtsi ning de la byams par mi byed do// de ltar skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ lha 'am/ tshangs pa yang rung ste/ gang tshe thung ba de la khyad du gsod par 'gyur na/ gal te de bzhin
69b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa chos 'ba' shig la yang dag par gzhol ba nyid/ 'du byed du 'gyur du zin na/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi brnyas par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad kyi nang na ni/ phyir ltung
69b6(mdo sde): ba med cing zad pa med pa la/ thar pa zhes bshad na/ gal te de ltar gyur na don med par 'gyur gyis/ btsun pa 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed du gyur ces de skad ma gsung shig/ dper na bud/ 
69b7(mdo sde): med gzhon nu dbul mo bkren pa/ mgon med pa/ nad kyis thebs pa/ sbrum pas nyen pa zhig/ mgon med khang pa zhig tu song ba las/ bud med de bu byung nas/ de na snga nas gnas pa gzhan dag gis
69b8(mdo sde): de de'i nang nas bskrad de// nyon mongs mde/ bu btsas ma thag tu byis pa khe mar khyer nas/ lo legs pa'i yul zhig tu chas te song ba las/ lam du sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / 
70a1(mdo sde): tshan dang / sdig sbrul gyi gnod pas nyen par gyur te/ gang+gA krung chen po rgal bar 'dod pa las/ des rgal ma nus te/ khye'u de khyer bzhin du/ gang+gA nang du shi nas/ de/ 
70a2(mdo sde): bu de la byams pa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par gyis/ lus dang bral te/ shi ba'i 'og tu/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ byams pa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par ji lta bu zhig gis skyes she na/ bdag
70a3(mdo sde): ni shaM yong bla'o/ khye'u 'di nyin med par thar bar bya'o// snyam pa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par gyis skyes pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa 'jam dpal skyes bu dam pa/ dam pa'i chos 'byung bar 'dod pas/ 
70a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed du gyur par blta bar mi bya zhing / 'du shes kyang bsgyur bar mo bya'o// gal te de lta bu'i mgo lus la med na yang / bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis
70a5(mdo sde): mi khyab bo snyam du/ yang dag pa'i lta ba can du bya'o// sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gdam ngag bstan pas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas pa yin no zhes
70a6(mdo sde): bstan par bya'o// dam pa'i chos 'byin par byed pas ni/ ji ltar bud med gzhon nu dbul mos/ gang ga'i klung las bu bsgral ba'i phyir/ rang gi srog dang bsngos te/ 'bad pa de bzhin du bya'o// 
70a7(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos 'byung ba'i thabs bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dus ma byas pa'o// snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas par mthong na/ bdag nyid kyi don du
70a8(mdo sde): bya ba'i thar pa'i don rtogs par 'gyur ro// btsun pa 'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig lam du 'gro bas dub par gyur te/ khyim gyi nang du nyal ba las/ de'i tshe khyim de thog thag nas me chen por 'bar te/ mi
70b1(mdo sde): de mes tshig pan/ de ni srog med zin no snyam nas/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / ldan pas/ bdag nyid gos kyi dam du bkris te/ sems dran pa dang ldan pa bzhin du sha nas/ de ngo tsha shes
70b2(mdo sde): shing khrel yod par sems pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bus/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rgyal srid ni lan brgyad cu byas/ tshangs pa'i rgyal srid ni lan 'bum byas/ mi'i 'dzag rten du yang 'khor los
70b3(mdo sde): sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lan du ma byas te/ ngan song rnams su yang mo skye la/ lan mang du bde ba cig nas gcig tu brgyud pa 'ba' shig thob pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal khyod skyes bu dam pa de ltar mdzes
70b4(mdo sde): par gyis shig/ ngo tsha shes par gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi thabs la 'jug pa spyod du ma zhugs shig/ dge slong tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa
70b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas pa yin no// zhes pa bas na mu stegs par gyur te shi yang dra'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas
70b6(mdo sde): yin bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas yin zhes zer ba gang yin pa de dag ni brdzun du smra ba yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas yin no zhes zer ba rnams ni/ rang gi khyim dang 'dra
70b7(mdo sde): bar/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dus byas dang 'dra bar ma lta shig/ da phyin chad 'khor bar rgyu ba na/ mi shes pa las bzlas
70b8(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'dus ma byas pa'o snyam par shes pa 'bar shig rtogs par gyis shig/ de ltar byas btong bsgom pa de'i 'bras bus khyod myur ba kho nar/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du/ mtshan
71a1(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces smras so// legs so legs so// tshe ring bar
71a2(mdo sde): gyur cig/ rigs kyi bus ni de ltar bya ba yin no// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang / ther zug dang / 'dus ma byas pa dang / brtan par shes so// da ltar khyod kyis 'di kho na ltar
71a3(mdo sde): 'dus byas khong rlag tu gtad pa'i sgo nas shes pa las na khyod kyang ring po mi thogs par de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas nyid kyis kyang de ltar 'u bu cag gnyis kyis khyad du
71a4(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i bsngags pa brjod do zhes phyis bsngags par 'gyur / skul byed de bzhin gshegs pa'i gshos bskur cig/ sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang na ni bskur te sbyin pa mchog yin no/ 
71a5(mdo sde): de la bskur te/ sbyin zhes bya ba ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ thams cad kyi sa bon las myu gu 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir/ gang gi tshe dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen
71a6(mdo sde): nam/ dge bsnyen ma yang rung ste/ don 'ga' zhig gi phyir lam du zhugs nas/ dub par gyur pa de dag la ci yod pa dang / de'i rkyen du 'tsham pa dang / brtags pa'i sbyin pa byed pa ni/ bskur te
71a7(mdo sde): sbyin pa zhes bya'o// skul byed de bzhin du khyod kyis ci yod pa las zhal zas kyi tha ma mang yang rung nyung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyed par yod kyang rung / khyed
71a8(mdo sde): par med kyang rung ste/ 'drim du chug shig/ bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'dar bar gshegs su nye'o// de nas skul byed kyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'jam dpal khyod kha zas la chags
71b1(mdo sde): sam tsan/ zhal zas mang yang rung nyung yang rung drims shig ces bdag gi gzhan 'debs par byed/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lo drug gi bar du dkar ba spyod pa mdzad mdzad na/ tsad skad cag tsam yang
71b2(mdo sde): bzhes mi spyod dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku yin te/ zhal zas kyi sku ma yin na/ ci bcom ldan 'das zhal zas gsol lam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal
71b3(mdo sde): skul byed kyis ji skad smras pa de ni de bzhin no// skul byed legs so legs so// khyod ni theg pa chen po la shes rab che ba'o// khyod ni theg pa chen po la shed bye ba'o// 'jam dpal gyis kyang 'ang
71b4(mdo sde): skad ces smras so// gal te de ltar bzhed par gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sku tshe ring bar shog shig/ skul byed kyis smras pa/ ci bdag 'ba' shig la bcom ldan 'das
71b5(mdo sde): mnyes sam/ 'on te sems can thams cad la yang mnyes/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ tsa bcom ldan 'das lnga/ khyod dang bdag dang sems can thams cad la yang mi mnyes sam/ 
71b6(mdo sde): skul byed kyis smras pa/ de skad ma zer cig/ gang la mgu ba yod pa de la ni phyin ci log gi 'du shes yod de/ 'u bu cag ni de la spyod do// de bzhin gsheg pa la ni mnyes pa 'am/ dgyes pa med
71b7(mdo sde): 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ ba be'u la bams pa'i phyir rtsa zos shing zo shing / grong nyid du 'ong ba de lta bu'i byams pa dang ldan pa ma yin gyis/ sems can thams cad la yang sgra can zin
71b8(mdo sde): dang 'dra bar gzigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi shes rab kyi sul na de lta bu yin no// btsun pa 'jam dpal dper no/ rta cang shis dang sbyar ba'i shing rta rgyugs pa'i zla la/ bong bu'i shing rta rgyug pa ma
72a1(mdo sde): srid pa de bzhin du/ 'u bu cag bong du'i shing rta dang 'dra ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang / 'dri ba dang / dgongs pa'i tshig dang / mnyam du 'gro bar nus re skan/ 
72a2(mdo sde): dper na nam mkha' lding dpag tshad du mar 'gro ba nam mkha' la gnas pas/ chu'i nang na nya dang ru sbal 'khod pa rnams me long gis ngos la rang gi gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin du gsal bar mthong yang / 
72a3(mdo sde): byis pa rnams kyis na mig mi gsal ba'i phyir/ de'i mig gi rtsal brjod par mi nus pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang de dang 'dra'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ skul byed de ni de bzhin
72a4(mdo sde): te/ bdag gis ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lus la phog dgo/ de nas 'jam dpal gyis de brgal bar zad do// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'od zer rnam pa sna
72a5(mdo sde): tshogs bkye nas/ de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lus la phog go/ de nas 'jam dpal gyis de rtog sa/ mgar ba'i bu skul byed la smras pa/ skul byed de bzhin
72a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar rings kyis/ dus su bcom ldan 'das la bshos 'drim du chug shig/ ma thogs shig/ rgyu med par bcom ldan 'das zhal nas/ 'od zer rnams 'byung
72a7(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas skul byed cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skul byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skul byed nga yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gror nye dge slong gi
72a8(mdo sde): dge 'dun la dus su zas 'drim du chug ces lan gnyis lan gsum du bka' stsal to// de nas skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das mi bzhugs na ni/ 'jig rten
72b1(mdo sde): stong par 'gyur ro// bdag cag thams cad kyis ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skul byed la 'di skad ces bkar stsal to// skul byed ma du shig/ de ltar
72b2(mdo sde): lus la rma ma 'byin cig/ mi'i lus chu shing bzhin du snying po med par rtogs shig/ smig rgyu dang / dbu ba rdos pa dang / sgyu ma dang / rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod dang / klog lta bur khong du chud par
72b3(mdo sde): gyis shig/ 'dus byas ni nyes pa grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas yin no// snyam du shes par gyis shig/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin la ltos shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la skul byed kyis 'di skad ces
72b4(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dang sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du bzhugasu mi gnang na/ bdag ce'i slad du mi ngu
72b5(mdo sde): lags/ 'jig rten stongs kyi ma mchis so// de nas bcu ma ldan 'das kyis skul byed la 'di skad bka' stsal to// nga ni khyod la snying rtse ba dang / sems can thams cad la stong
72b6(mdo sde): brtse ba'i phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed/ 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi chos nyid do// 'du byed thams cad mi rtag go zhes bya ba'i tshigasu bcad par
72b7(mdo sde): khong du chud par gyis shig/ chos thams cad ni 'du byed dang / 'dres pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o// snyam du stogs shig/ chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o snyam du spyod cig/ mi brtan pa/ 
72b8(mdo sde): bdad po/ byin ci log pa'i snyam du sams shig/ lus 'di ni nyis dmigs mapa mas pa dang ldan par snyam du shes par gyis shig/ 'did na dbul ba dang 'dra ba ltos pa/ mdu shig/ yam
73a1(mdo sde): chad cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la skul byed kyis 'di skad ce gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin du 'jal lags na/ ha cang sdug bsngal chen po mi bzod lags so// 
73a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das thabs kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad pa ni/ bdag blo ba rangs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skul byed legs legs so// rigs kyi bus nga'i
73a3(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa/ thabs de ltar blta bar bya'o// skul byed sangs rgyas gshegs pa ni/ ba gzhad gzas la 'gro ba lta bur shes par gyis shig/ skul byed tshe ring ba dang / tshe ring ba ma yin pa'i rtags
73a4(mdo sde): shes par gyis shig/ skul byed chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i chos de can no// de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad la thab das kyis chos can la/ de rnams kyis kyang gos par mi 'gyur/ 
73a5(mdo sde): bde ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rang bzhin no// skul byed khyod srid pa'i rgya mtsho la nges par rgal bar bya ba'i phyir/ zhal zas bskur te 'on cig/ lha dang lha ma yin
73a6(mdo sde): dang mi rnams kyis kyang ngal rang rang gi mchod pa byas nas/ mi g.yo ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig/ khyod kyis snod du gyur pa la dus su sbyin par gyis shig/ ma thogs shig/ smod du gyur pa dang
73a7(mdo sde): nga dang de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni don tha dad po ma yin no// de nas skul byed kyis kyang sems can thams cad la nges par bsgral ba'i phyir/ mgo smad de mchi ma blags nas/ gsol pa/ legs
73a8(mdo sde): legs so// legaso legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du bdag gis bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ ji ltar blta ba de ni/ 
73b1(mdo sde): bdag cag snang bu dang 'dra ba rnams kyi yul yang ma lags/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yul kyang ma lags so zhes gsol to// de nas mya ngan byed cing du bzhin du/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas
73b2(mdo sde): bas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te/ mchod pa chen po'i las byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas len tu song ngo // 
73b3(mdo sde): 'dags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa reg pa chen po'i ma las// bam po gsum pa// de nas do ches chen po gsos rabatu g.yas/ 'gul
73b4(mdo sde): tu gum/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ 'khor gtu'akhor/ 'u ru rab tu ru / shig shag rabaH/ shig shig/ med med rag tu mer med/ ldem rnam
73b5(mdo sde): rab tu sdom ldem mo// de la sogs pa byas te/ madz+dza/ pa nad kyis brtul pa'i gnang pas thebs pa bzhin du/ sa chen pa'ang rgya mtsho dag can pa'i mthas gtugs pa/ tshangs
73b6(mdo sde): pa' 'jig rten man chad thog cag tu rab tu goyos so// de nas lha dang lha ma yin dang mi de dag thams cad mag rmongs te/ 'dzag shang spyi dung zhes byas nas/ du bzhin du/ tshig mthun par
73b7(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa'adi dag gsol to// mgon po khyod la bdag cag rnams/ mgo bas phyag 'tshal gsol ba 'debs/ rgyal ba khyi mchog khyod dang na// bral na bdag cag mgon med
73b8(mdo sde): 'gyur /  deng khyang ma ngan 'dara' 'gyur 'ad bsams na// bdag cag sdug bsngal shin to gtang bab byed // thub pa bdag cag ma ni stor bar 'gyur// ba gzhon du ma khyer be 'u la chags pa/ 
74a1(mdo sde): bzhin// mgon med dbul po'i man la la zhig/ nad kyis thebs la sman pa med pa dang / rang dgar byed cing kha zas gnod pa rnams// za ba ji ltar mchi bar 'gyur ba ban/ 
74a2(mdo sde): skye bo 'di dag nyon mongs nad kyis thebs// khyod med khyod kyi chos kyi gsos med pas// lta ba'i nyes pa byed 'drar 'chi bar 'gyur// de bas phan phyir 'jig rten ma dor cig/ ji ltar grong khyer rgyal
74a3(mdo sde): dang bral ba dang // dbul po rnams la mu ge byung ba dang // ji ltar dgon par skom gyis gdungs pa bzhin// khyod 'das 'og tu bdag cag de 'drar 'gyur// sems can gces khyod mya ngan 'da' bzhed
74a4(mdo sde): bas/ sa gzhi rab tu g.yos shing phyugs kyang 'tshal// mtsho chen po dag kyang rnam par 'khrugs// bdag cagakun kyang sdug cing bsngal bar 'gyur// drang srong chen po deng khyod
74a5(mdo sde): mya ngan las// 'das na nyi ma 'angs lo ltung yang dag/ rgya mtsho/ chen po dag kyang skam par 'gyur// bdag cag kun kya ding du 'gum lags grang // ji ltar stobs ldan mas na sgo
74a6(mdo sde): gseb nas// glang chen khyer te nang du 'dzul bgyid pa// shin tu nyon mongs 'gyur ba de bzhin du// bdag cag thams cad rab tu nyon mongs gyur// ji ltar bu cig 'gum par mi 'chal bzhin/ 
74a7(mdo sde): mya ngan khyod 'da' bdag cag de mi 'tshal// gal te khyod ni mya ngan 'da' ba las// mi bzhed bdag cag thams cad phongs par 'gyur// khyod ni mya ngan 'das lam gshegs mthong bas// dud
74a8(mdo sde): 'gro mang po'ang g.yar ngan cher bgyid na// bdag cag ji ltar g.yar ngan mi 'tshal lags// bdag cag mchil ma bzhin du ma dor cig/ nyi ma 'char kar rang gi 'od gsol bas// mun nag rnam par
74b1(mdo sde): bcom pa de bzhin du// 'phrul can khyod kyis sdug bsngal mun bsal te// dge 'dun dbus su ri rab bzhin du bzhugs// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na// rgyal po la la zhig gi bu sdug cing phangs/ 
74b2(mdo sde): pa zhig mchis la// des de chos lugs kyi bstan bcos bslabs nas/ 'di sod cig ces bka' stsal pa de bzhin du/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i sras rnams
74b3(mdo sde): kyang / yang dag pa'i lta ba bskyed nas/ bkum gyis mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i bu ji lta ba de bzhin du/ bdag cag mi 'gum par/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du yun ring du bzhugs su
74b4(mdo sde): gsol// ji ltal zhig gzhung gis rtsod pa'i bstan bcos la bstan pa na/ skrag par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ khyod kyis skrag par ma mdzad cig/ de kho na nyid mkhyen bzhin du/ 
74b5(mdo sde): bdag cag sems can dmyal bar mchis par ma mdzad cig/ dam pa'i chos bdud rtsi'i bcud kyis tshim par mdzad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du bzhugasu gsol// ji ltar
74b6(mdo sde): rgyal po'i brtson rar gnod pa'i las rnams kyis/ dang por nyon mongs pa na/ la la zhig gis khyod kyi na tsha ji lta bu zhig myong zhes smras na/ des de la smras pa de ni de bzhin te/ gang gi tshe bdag
74b7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba las thar par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ mya ngan las 'das pa yin te/ bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyuraro zhes mtsha ma de bzhin du/ bdag cag thams cad kyang khyod bzhugs na/ rgyal po'i
74b8(mdo sde): btson ra nas thar pa bzhin du/ mya ngan las 'das pa lags na/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du bzhug su gsol// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/ sman pa tshe'i rig byed yan
75a1(mdo sde): lag brgyad pa la mkhas pas/ bdag gi bul ni rgyud phyi ma slob par bgyid kyi/ slob ma la ni bdag dang mnyams par 'gyur du dogs nas/ slob par mi bgyid pa de bzhin du/ 
75a2(mdo sde): chos kyi rgyal po sman pa chen po ser sna mi mnga' ba khyod kyis theg pa chen po'i rgyud phyi ma la de ltar mi mdzad par/ bcom ldan 'das yun ring du bzhugs su gsol// de bzhin du shing rta'i rig byed la mkhas
75a3(mdo sde): pas/ bdag gi bu la ni rgyud phyi ma sgra grag par phog pa'i dpyad thams cad slob par bgyid kyi/ slob ma la ni slob par mi bgyid pa dang / rig pa'i gnas gzhan dag la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro// bcom
75a4(mdo sde): 'das dper gsol na/ byis pa 'am/ rgan po 'am nad pa la dal zhig/ lam bzang po las gol te/ lam ngan dbar mchis na/ shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin
75a5(mdo sde): du/ bcom ldan 'das sems can lam ngan par mchis pa rnam sa/ lus dang bral ba'i 'og tu sems can dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur lags na/ bcom
75a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das lam ston pa yun ring du bzhugs su gsol// ya mtshan can dgu cu rtsa drug dang / tshigasu bcad pa bzhi cu rtsa lnga la yang de bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
75a7(mdo sde): kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong khyod lha dang mi rnams ltar/ byis pa'i smre sngags 'don pa dag ma byed par brtson 'grus brtsams shig/ de nas lha dang lha ma yin dang mi rnams
75a8(mdo sde): kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung / blo gros dang / dran pa dang / de kho na nyid du 'gro ba thos nas/ ji lta bu gcig pa shi nas dur khrod du bor ba bzhin du de dag sdug bsngal bar gyur to// de nas bcom
75b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis/ de dag la tshig su bcad de bka' stsal/ khyod rnams nges par bder gyur cig/ mya ngan ma byed ma du shig/ 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos// thams cad mi smra 'khod par gyis// bag
75b2(mdo sde): med par ni ma gnas par// bag yod par la dga' bar gyis// khyed stong pa dang / stong pa ma yin pa 'am/ rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa 'am/ skyabs dang skyabs ma yin pa dang / 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba 'am/ 
75b3(mdo sde): rten dang rten ma yin pa 'am/ ther zug dang ther zug ma yin pa 'am/ brtan pa dang brtan pa ma yin pa'am/ sems can dang sems can med pa'am/ yang dag pa'am/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'am/ bden
75b4(mdo sde): pa dang bden pa ma yin pa'am/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang / ma ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'am/ gsang ba dang gsang ba ma yin pa'am/ gnyis dang gnyi su med pa'am/ de bzhin
75b5(mdo sde): du chos rnam pa du ma dag som nyi'am/ yid gnyis sam/  chom zab ci dang ci yod pa/ de dang de dag bzhugs shig dang / thams cad gcad par bya'o// bdud rtsi'i mchog kyang khyed
75b6(mdo sde): la bstan par bya ste/ de'i 'og tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o// dge slong dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba brnyed par dka'o// mi lus thob pa rnyed par dka'o// dayo ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka'o// 
75b7(mdo sde): bzod pa dang / tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa ma zhig pa ma ral pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka'o// 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa thob pa ni/ gser gyi bye ma dang / u dum pa ra'i me tog bzhin du rnyed par dka'o// 
75b8(mdo sde): dge slong dag 'di lta ste/ sa ni thams cad kyi sgo nas sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yin te/ de bzhin du nga'i chos brtan pa rnam pa sna tshogs gsang ba/ thar pa'i grong khyer gyi bdud rtsi'i zas kyang de dang 'dra bar lta
76a1(mdo sde): bar bya'o// sems can thams cad dang nga'i sras/ dge slong thams cad la dam pa'i chos mang po brtan por bzhag go/ gzhan yang sems can la phan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin
76a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i yon tan che ba nyid bsgrags te/ yi ge 'bru gcig pa'i thig le'i gtam yang bzhag nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o// de nas dge slong de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa
76a3(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes thos nas/ mi dga' bar gyur te/ skyi bung zhes byas nas/ mig mchi mas gang bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
76a4(mdo sde): 'das la lan mang du bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis sdug bsngal ba dang / mi rtag pa dang / bdag med pa dang // 
76a5(mdo sde): rjes thams cad kyi nang na glang po che'i rjes ches mchog yin par brtan to// zhes gsungs te/ de ltar mi rtag pa'i 'du shes bsten cing bsgoms te mang du bgyid pas/ 'dod
76a6(mdo sde): pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur// gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur// gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/ ma rig pa thams cad zad
76a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal thams cad ma lus par yang dag par chad par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/ ston gyi dus su zhing pas smos btab ste/ rtsa ba 'dzings pa
76a8(mdo sde): thams cad sel bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa'i 'du shes brten cing bsgom te/ mang du bgyis pas/ 'oda'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags
76b1(mdo sde): thams cad zad par 'gyuraro// gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/ ma rig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal thams cad ma lus par yang dag par zad par 'gyur ro// 
76b2(mdo sde): zhing las thams cad kyi nang na ni ston gyi zhing blas mchog tu bstan to// zhes bya ba la sogs pa/ glang po che'i rjes lta bu'i mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol
76b3(mdo sde): na rgyal po 'chi ba'i tshe/ bdag gi brtson rar gsal te/ sems can rnams brtson ra'i gnod pas nyon mongs pa las thar par bgyis nas/ de'i 'og tu 'tsho bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom
76b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das khyod kyis kyang / sems can mi shes pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi brtson rang brubs pa rnams kyi mi shes pa'i 'ching ba rnams bcad nas de'i 'og tu yongs su mya ngan las 'dar bar
76b5(mdo sde): gshegasu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang dper gsol/ na/ sems can 'byung po dang / sha za'i gdon gyis brlams pa las sman chen po dang phrad na 'byung po dang sha za'i
76b6(mdo sde): gdon rnams kyis thebs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ba bzhin du/ khyod dang mngal na nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad/ mi shes po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'byung po dang sha bar gdon rnams las yongs
76b7(mdo sde): su thar par 'gyur la/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa nyid khong du chud par bgyid logs so// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/ glang ba tshe'i dul sbyong gi mkhan pas/ spos kyi glang ba che nags pa chen
76b8(mdo sde): bas btsangs palas/ glang ba ches zhags pa de bcad de dros pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang / bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag gi lon pa dang / drag dag dang / dan ben dang / se
77a1(mdo sde): sna dang / g.ye zhags pa chen po bcad nas/ glang po che'i 'dul sbyong gi mkhan po/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lag tu 'ongs nas/ sems can thams cad las dang nyon mongs pa'i
77a2(mdo sde): glang po lnga bcu rtsa bdun yongs su bsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/ gang ba'i rims kyi theg pa sman pa chen po'i thad du mchis na/ sdug bsngal las thar par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ 
77a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang / nyon mongs pa dang / log par lta ba dang / log pa'i 'tshe ba nyes dmigs mtha' yas pa'i grangs pa'i rims nad can gyi lus dang ldan pa las/ sman pa chen
77a4(mdo sde): po bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis nas/ sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par thar par gyur te/ mi g.yo ba'i bde ba yang thob lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang
77a5(mdo sde): dper gsol na/ mi zhig gis 'bras skye mas 'tshal to// ra ro bar gyur nas/ bdag nyid kyis kyang bdag nyid ma 'tshal te// chos kyang ma 'tshal/ chos ma lags pa yang ma 'tshal/ 
77a6(mdo sde): 'di ni bdag gi ma'o// 'di ni bdag gi sring mo'o// 'di ni bdag gi bu mo'o// snyam du yang ma 'tshal lo// snad cing bla ste/ phyi sa dang gcin gyis rang gi lus kun bsgos shing mchis pa las/ de'i
77a7(mdo sde): 'og tu bdag nyid sangs te/ gzhi ci las gyur pa la mkhas par gyur nas/ chang ni tsar yang mi rung ngo snyam du sems te/ bdag ni sdig pa thams cad las thar to snyam nas/ chang 'thung ba cir yang mi
77a8(mdo sde): rung bar shas cher bsgoms te/ spong bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshe ba'i 'jig rten 'di ni/ zlos gar mkhan bzhin du/ thog ma ma mchis pa nas/ 'khor ba na 'khor zhing yongasu
77b1(mdo sde): 'khyam pa na/ 'don bdag gi ma'o// 'di ni bdag gi sring me'o// 'di ni bdag gi bu mo'o snyam du mtshal nas/ ma dang sring mo dang bu mo rnams dang / lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i 'du shes spyod par bgyid de
77b2(mdo sde): 'bras skyes kyis ra ro bar gyur pa de bzhin du sdug bsngal rnyed par 'gyur la/ de nas ngo tsha shes pa'i mi dag 'bras skyems kyis ra ro ba las sangs pa bzhin du/ cir yang mi rung bar shas cher sgoms
77b3(mdo sde): nas/ sdug bsngal las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang e ran da la ni snying po ma mchis mi srid pa bzhin du/ lus 'di la yang / bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang / 
77b4(mdo sde): gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po mchis mi srid de/ de lta bur bdag cag gis bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms te/ mang du bgyis
77b5(mdo sde): lags so// dper gsol na/ phub ma skon pa bye ma snyed bor ba ni cir yang mi gces pa de bzhin du/ lus 'di yang bdag ma mchis so// dper gsol na/ kha sral gyis me
77b6(mdo sde): tog la dri gda' ba ma mchis pa de bzhin du/ lus 'di la yang bdag ma mchis te/ de ltar bdag gis bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms te/ mang du bgyis lags so// bcom ldan 'das
77b7(mdo sde): kyis kyang / dge slong dag chos thams cad ni bdag med pa ste/ de ltar bsgoms shig dang / de ltar bsgoms pa rnams kyis bdag tu 'dzin pa spong bar 'gyur ro// bdag tu 'dzin pa yongs su/ 
77b8(mdo sde): spangs nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad bdag ma mchis pa'i slad du/ bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms te/ 
78a1(mdo sde): mang du bgyis lags so// gzhan yang ji ltar nam mkha' la bya'i rjes gda' ba na ma srid pa de bzhin du/ bdag ma mtshas pa'i 'du shes bsgoms na lta ba'i rnam pa tha
78a2(mdo sde): cad dang bral bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsgo ba de ltar bsgom pa khyod kyi shes sam/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal dang / 
78a3(mdo sde): mi rtag pa dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes de ma lags par bsgoms na ni/ ji ltar mir ro zhing 'kham pas/ lha khang dang / spo dang / sa gzhi dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / shing dang / ri rnams
78a4(mdo sde): mi 'khor bzhin du 'khor bar mthong ba de bzhin du/ gang dag/ dgis sdug bsngal dang / mi rtag pa dang / bdag med dpa'i 'du shes ma bsgoms pa'i sems can 'jig rten pa
78a5(mdo sde): de dag ni/ ra ro ba 'dra bar lta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'ad sa bdag cag gis ni yang dag par bsgoms lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ni/ 
78a6(mdo sde): dpe 'di'i don de ngas bshad par bya'o// khyed kyis tshig su bcad pa'i don 'di la/ don ni 'di'o// yi ge ni 'di'o// zhes gsal bar mi shes te/ ji ltar mi ra ro bas/ lha khang dang / spo dang / 
78a7(mdo sde): sa gzhi dang / nyi ma dang / zla bo dang / shing dang / ri rnams mi 'khor bzhin du/ 'khor bar mthong ba de bzhin du/ 'du shes phyin ci log du mas zin cing / kun tu rmongs pa rnams bdag go/ 
78a8(mdo sde): snyam pa dang / rtag go snyam pa dang / bde'o snyam pa dang / sdug go snyam pa'i 'du shes kun tu spyod do// de la bdag ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i don to// rtag ces bya ba ni chos
78b1(mdo sde): kyi sku zhes bya ba'i don to// bde zhes pa na mya ngan las 'das pa zhes byaba'i don to// sdug ces bya ba na chos kyi tshig bla dgas so// dge slong dag khyed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni sdug
78b2(mdo sde): bsngal dang / mi rtag pa dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes bsgoms lagaso zhes/ rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal gyis dregs par ma byed cig/ de ltar rnam pa gsum bsgom par gyur na ni/ nga'i
78b3(mdo sde): bstan pa la/ khyed kyis bsgom pa rnam pa gsum bsgoms pa de/ bsgom pa don med par 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal shes par bya ba sgom pa rnam pa gsum ni/ khyad par dang / khyad par gyi
78b4(mdo sde): yang khyad par ro// sdug bsngal la bde'o snyam du 'du shes pa ni/ phyin ci log pa'o// bde ba la sdug bsngal lo/  snyam du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o// mi rtag pa la
78b5(mdo sde): rtag go snyam du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o// rtag pa la/ mi rtag pa'o snyam du 'du shes pa ni byon ci log pa'o// bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o// 
78b6(mdo sde): bdag yod pa la bdag med par 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o// mi sdug pa la sdug go snyam du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o// sdug pa la mi sdug go snyam du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa ste/ phyin
78b7(mdo sde): ci log bzhi po 'di dag yang dag par ma shes par khyed kyis bsgom par bya ba bsgoms te/ mang du byas so// khyod kyis bde ba la sdug bsngal bar bsgoms so// rtag pa la mi rtag pa dang / bdag
78b8(mdo sde): yod pa la bdag med pa dang / sdug pa la mi sdug par bsgoms so// 'jig rten rnams la yang bde ba dang / bdag dang / rtag pa dang / sdug pa rnams yod do// 'jig rten las 'das pa
79a1(mdo sde): rnams la yang / bde ba dang / bdag dang / rtag pa dang / sdug pa rnams yod do// 'di la phan tshun ma mthun pa yod do// yi ge zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
79a2(mdo sde): go/ don ces bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'du shes bzhi la sogs pa phyin tsa log
79a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas lugs su bzhag pa rnams ni/ bdag cag gis yun ring mo zhig nas/ mthong yang mthong / bsgoms kyang bsgoms lags na/ da ji ltar 'tshal ba bka' stsal du gsol/ 
79a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par yang bzhug su gsol// de bzhin gshegs pas ci dang ji skad du bka' stsal pa/ de dang de bzhin du bdag cag
79a5(mdo sde): gis bgyi bar 'tshal lo// gal te de bzhin gshegs/ pa bzhugasu mi gnang na/ bdag cag kyang sbrul gdugs/ pa dang / khyim cig gi nang du lhan cig tu mchis par mi 'tshal te/ 
79a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs na/ tshangs par spyod cing mchis pa'i rngo mi thog gis/ khyod nyid kyi slad bzhin du bdag cag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das
79a7(mdo sde): kyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong khyed de skad ma zer cig/ dge slong dag ngas 'od srung gi lag tu bstan pa gtad par bya ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar/ dge
