236a5(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas sangs rgyas bcomaldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur bsti dang / na tu phrad dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// de tsa
236a6(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad de/ snying rje chen po'i smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo// gal te mngon
236a7(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can ri dang / shang shong dang gyo me dang gsog ma dang / tsher ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnas su sems can dag kyang nyon mongs
236a8(mdo sde): pa dang bcas pa/ mtshams med pa lnga dang / mi dge ba bcu rdzogs par spyod pa'i gnas der mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ phan pa dang bde ba'i don tu sdug bsngal thams
236b1(mdo sde): cad yongs su bcad de bde ba thams cad dang yongasu ldan par byas nas/ chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces smon
236b2(mdo sde): lam btab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas/ khyod rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid
236b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar gnas par bya'o// zhes bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' di dag thams cad kyi tshig 'thun par
236b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bzhin du bgyi'o// zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dang 'bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
236b5(mdo sde): snyed kyis yongs su bskor te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der song ngo // de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du byin par 'jig rten gyi khams de
236b6(mdo sde): dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'od zer chen pos kun tu snang bar gyur// steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis me tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po yang char bzhin du phab bo// 'od
236b7(mdo sde): zer chen pos snang bar byas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang g.yos so// de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi rol mo tshad med pa brgya stong
236b8(mdo sde): snyed kyang steng gi bar snang las ma dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'adi dag bya rgod spungs pa'i rig la bder de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas zhabs la mgo
237a1(mdo sde): bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis nub phyogs logs
237a2(mdo sde): su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dag pa'i gnas shes bya ba snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams de na sangs
237a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mtshan gnyi zla mar me'i 'od ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
237a4(mdo sde): mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na me da pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can zhes bya ba na bzhugs te
237a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang shin tu mnyam zhing gzhi bai DUR+Ya las byas na/ gser brtsoms thig re 'ur bres pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing skyed pa shing de dag kyang mda' rgyang gang
237a6(mdo sde): tsam du mtho ba/ me tog dang 'bras bu dang / yal ga dang 'dab mas shin tu brgyan pa/ rlung mi drag pas bskyod pas sgra ston pa 'byung ba sgra de dag so so'i skye bos thos pas mi ngoms
237a7(mdo sde): pa skabs skabs na chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang khrus kyi rdzing bu yod la/ yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang zhing rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye mas bdal ba/ rdzing gi ngos bzhin
237a8(mdo sde): bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog pad+ma dang / pun da ri ka dang / pa ri sha ka dang / de ma yin pa me tog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam
237b1(mdo sde): chu'i steng yongs su khebs te/ chu'i nang na yang bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyang shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin to// rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de/ de na sems
237b2(mdo sde): can mang po 'dod dgur rtse zhing longs spyod do// rin po che'i shing gi bar bar na/ seng ge'i khri mtho khyad dpag tshad gcig pa bshams nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/ 
237b3(mdo sde): rdzas kyi na bzas khri'i steng du rim par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'thul ba/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi chal par bkram pa'i khri de la/ de bzhin gshegs pa gnyi zla mar me'i 'od skyil mo krung
237b4(mdo sde): bcas shing bzhugs pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' datshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed mdun du bdar te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la
237b5(mdo sde): so so nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od bzang po kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang
237b6(mdo sde): dkar por bcas pa dang ldan pa/ rab tu gsal/ dper mi bzod pa 'di shar phyogs logs su 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang bar gyur te/ gang la 'od kyi reg pa thams cad lus dang
237b7(mdo sde): sems bde bar gyur pa/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol// de la bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu legs par nyon
237b8(mdo sde): la shin tu yid la legs par zung shog dang / khyed la dgrol bar bshad par bya'o// 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag la khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na/ 
238a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
238a2(mdo sde): ba dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba
238a3(mdo sde): 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor nas/ 'khor mang po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa chen po drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde ston cing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir
238a4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi log par lta ba'i zug rngu rtsad nas 'don pa'i phyir/ sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir
238a5(mdo sde): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg/ ba gcig lam la dgod pa'i phyir/ byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang
238a6(mdo sde): chub cing / sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi drin ci ba dran par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las sgrol ba'i phyir so sam
238a7(mdo sde): skye bo dag pha ma la sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no// de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang ston par gyur pa/ stong
238a8(mdo sde): phrag bcu snyed stan las langs te/ bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
238b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag rnams mi mjed kyi 'dzag rten gyi khams der mtshanang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa dang / bkur sti bgyi ba dang / thabs mkhas pa
238b2(mdo sde): chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsapa pa'i mdo sde dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dang 'di dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rig
238b3(mdo sde): kyi bu dag khyed mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der byin nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur sti bya ba dang / shin tu drang dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir na/ 
238b4(mdo sde): na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa bye/ ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad do/ snying rje chen po'i smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo// gal te/ 
238b5(mdo sde): mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sdig ba can ri dang shang shong dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnas su sems can nyon mongs pa dang / 
238b6(mdo sde): bcu mtshams med pa lnga dang / mi dge ba bcu rdzogs pa'i gnas der mngon par sangs rgyas te/ phan pa dang bde ba'i don tu sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcad de/ bde ba thams cad
238b7(mdo sde): dang ldan par byas nas/ chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs shing lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des thog
238b8(mdo sde): ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas/ khyed rnams 'jig rten der byin nas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar gnas
239a1(mdo sde): par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas
239a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der song ste/ de
239a3(mdo sde): dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du phyin par/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'od zer chen po yang kun tu snang bar gyur/ steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis me
239a4(mdo sde): tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po yang char bzhin dbab bo// 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing rdzu 'phru/ la gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
239a5(mdo sde): kyang g.yos so// de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi rol mo tshad med pa brgya stong snyed kyang steng gi bar snang la ma dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag bya
239a6(mdo sde): rgod spungs pa'i ri la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i
239a7(mdo sde): tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od zer gyis byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig lnga brgya 'das pa'i pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang phyug
239a8(mdo sde): grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams de na sangs rgyas pad+mo leb rgan gyi 'od ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
239b1(mdo sde): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
239b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang shin tu mnyam zhing gzhi bai DUR+Ya las byas pa/ gser btsems thig re 'ur bres pa rin po che sna bdun gyi
239b3(mdo sde): shing bskyed pa shing de dag kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam du mtho ba/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / yal ga dang / mdab mas shin tu brgyan pa/ rlung mi drag pas bskyod na sgra snyan pa
239b4(mdo sde): 'byung ba/ sgra de yang so sor skye bos thos na mi ngoms pa skabs skabs na chu mig dang / mche'u dang / khrus kyi rdzingadabu yod pa yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang
239b5(mdo sde): zhing rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye ma bdal brdzing gi ngos ban bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog pad+ma dang / bun du ka dang / pa raM sha ka dang de ma yin pa'i me tog sngon
239b6(mdo sde): pa dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam chu'i steng yongs su khebs te chu'i nang na bya sna tshogs yang shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin to// rdzing de'i nang
239b7(mdo sde): na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i grwa yod de/ den sems can mang po 'dod dgu rtse zhing longs spyod do// rin po che'i shing de dag gi bar bar na / seng ge'i khri mtho khyad dpag tshad gcig
239b8(mdo sde): babashams nas/ rin pa che sna bdun gyis brgyan te/ lha rdzas byin pazas khro'i steng du rim par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'phrul ba/ lA rdzas kyi ma tog gis tshol par bkram pa tshwan
240a1(mdo sde): thog na/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo leb rgan gyi 'od chags pa/ dkyil mo bkrung bcas shing bzhugs pa la byang chub sems dpa' chad med pa bye ba brgya
240a2(mdo sde): stong snyed mdun du dang te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis/ 
240a3(mdo sde): 'od bzang po kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang dkar po ldan pa rab tu gsal ba dper mi bzod pa 'di lnga phyogs legs nas 'khor mang po 'di dag la sdang bar gyur te/ 
240a4(mdo sde): gang la 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad lus dang sems pa de bar 'gyur ba/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol// de la bcom
240a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / khyed la dgrol zhing bshad par bya'o// 'di ni lho phyogs
240a6(mdo sde): logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs
240a7(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba blan
240a8(mdo sde): med pa ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor nas 'khor mang po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa chen po drin lan bas
240b1(mdo sde): pa'i mdo sde ston cing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi zug rngubartsad nas 'do ba'i phyir/ sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag
240b2(mdo sde): byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg pa gcig la dgod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po
240b3(mdo sde): rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing / sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyis drin ci ba dran par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal/ 
240b4(mdo sde): gyi rgya mtsho las sgrol ba'i phyir/ skye bo dag pha ma la/ sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no// de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub
240b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang ston par gyur pa stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs par gyur nas bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
240b6(mdo sde): lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag rnams mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi
240b7(mdo sde): zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde dam pa nyan cing mchi bar
240b8(mdo sde): byin gyi brlab tu gsol// de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dge khyed mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der byin
241a1(mdo sde): nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur bsta bya ba dang / kun tu byu dgarapa'i 'du shes bskyed par byar// deci byar zhen// sangs/ 
241a2(mdo sde): rgyas shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig go bar du shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad pas/ stong rje chen po'i smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo// gal te mngon par sangs rgyas
241a3(mdo sde): pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can ri dang / shang shong dang / gyo mo dang / gsegs ma dang / tsher ma las sogs pa yod pa'i gnas su sems can dag kyang nyon mongs
241a4(mdo sde): pa dang bcas pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mi dge ba bcu rdzogs par spyad pa'i gnas der mngon par sangs rgyas tephan pa dang bde ba'i don tu sdug bsngal
241a5(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su bcad de/ bde ba thams cad dang / ldan par byas nas/ chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs shing lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig
241a6(mdo sde): ces smon lam btab bo// sangs rgyas des thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas/ khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der byin nas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang
241a7(mdo sde): ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar sems dpar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang // byang chub sems de dag thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bzhin
241a8(mdo sde): du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
241b1(mdo sde): gangan bder song ste du mam na du khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos te 'od zer chen po yang kun tu snang bar gyur/ steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis me tog man da ra ba dang / man
241b2(mdo sde): dar ba chen po yang char bzhin du bab po// 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang g.yos so// de ma yin pa
241b3(mdo sde): gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi rol mo tshad med pa brgya stong snyed kyang / steng gi bar snang lam dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang byargod spangs pa'i rig la ba der de
241b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas zhab/ sa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas la/ lan gsum bskor ba byis nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 
241b5(mdo sde): de bzhin du phyogs mtshams bzhi dang / steng dang 'og gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu nas lhag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyis so so nas 'khor brgya
241b6(mdo sde): stong grangs med pa dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/ mchod pa dang / bkur bsti byas/ mchod pa byas nas/ thams cad kyis mgrin gcig
241b7(mdo sde): tu tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la yongs su bstod do// de ltar sangs rgyas la stong nas kyang phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
241b8(mdo sde): khams yang yongs su dag par gyur te/ ri khrad khrod dang / ri chen po dang / chung ngu dang / zang po dang / chu klung dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing dang / steng ka dang / sha
242a1(mdo sde): shong dang / ngam grog dag med cing / de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'od kyis snang bar byas pas/ sangs rgyas gang na ba der lhags nas dga'
242a2(mdo sde): zhing mgu ba'i sems kyis thal mo sbyar ba btud nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ mig mi 'dzum par chags pa'i yid kyis lta zhing 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer phyir 'dus
242a3(mdo sde): bar mdzad de/ 'od zer de dag gis sku la lan bdun bskor nas dbu'i spyi gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de ltar gyur pa kun dga' bos mthong nas/ 'khor mang po thams cad
242a4(mdo sde): the tshom skyes par sems kyis rab tu shes pas de bzhin garags pa'i mdzad pa thabs mkhas pa mngon par bstan pa dang // byis ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo dag gi shes rab kyi mig dbye ba
242a5(mdo sde): dang / so so'i skye bo thams cad sred pa'i chu klung las rgal zhing pha rol tu phyin pas bde ba la dgod pa dang / so so na/ skye bo dag pa ma dang slob dpon dang bla ma'i drin lci ba dran zhing shes
242a6(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir bstan las langs nas gos tshags su bcos nas phyogs gcig tu byas te/ pus mo sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
242a7(mdo sde): ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun dga' bos sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'bring na mchis na 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong ste/ 'di la nges par dgongs pa ni mnga' na
242a8(mdo sde): 'khor mang po'i the tsom gyi dra ba bcad pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan tu gsol// sangs rgyas kyis bshad du gsol// thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas
242b1(mdo sde): dran lan bas pa pa'i mad las/ gling gna'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gcig ga/ de'i tshe de dus na 'khor mang ba 'dus pa der rin pa che sna bdun
242b2(mdo sde): las byas pa'i pad mo'i sdong po dngul las byas/ 'dab ma ni gser las byas/ gzhi ni rin po che shel las byas pa/ mu tig gi dra bas kun tu brgyan pa gcig de nyid nas byung bar gyur to// 
242b3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa las bzhengs nas/ pad mo de la skyil mo krung bcas nas bzhugs so// de la bzhugs ma thag tu yongs su dag pa'i sku mngon par bstan/ 
242b4(mdo sde): to/ sku de las lam rgyud lnga'i lus kyi tshegs bstan lus kyi tshogs re re la yang gzugs tha dad pa rnams khri/ brgyad stong snyed bstan to// gzugs rnam pa de re re yang
242b5(mdo sde): sku'i tshogs bstan/ rdul phra rab kyi sku'i tshogs brgya stong snyed bstan/ sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi sku'i tshogs snyed bstan to// gang ga'i
242b6(mdo sde): klu bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi sku'i tshogs de dag ra re la yang gling bzhi'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs bstan rdul phra rab kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re raM la yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
242b7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshegs bstan to// rdul phra rab kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang phyogs bcur phyogs re rer yangasangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
242b8(mdo sde): gi rdul phra rab kyi sku'i tshogs bstan nasanam mkha'i dbyings kyis bkrus pa chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa snyed kyi sems can gyi lus kyi tshogs mngon
243a1(mdo sde): par bstod // de bzhin gshegs pas de snyed kyi lus kyi tshogs mngon par bstan nas/ kun dga' bo dang phyogs nas 'dus shing tshogs pa'i byang chub sems/ 
243a2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag deng de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag pa'i
243a3(mdo sde): tshig gang yin pa de bka' stsal par bya'o// chos la tshig tu bzod pa med mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas thabs mkhas pa'i dbang gis mtshan ma dang ming med pa'i chos la ming dang mtshan
243a4(mdo sde): mar bstan par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gsheg/ das pas ni thog mar skyes shing 'khor bar 'khor ba'i tshe/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi lus kyi tshogs rnam
243a5(mdo sde): pa tha dad pa de dag thams cad rdzogs par myong ste/ de ltar lus kyi tshogs de dag kun myong bas na/ sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha mar ma gyur pa
243a6(mdo sde): med de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sems can gyi pha mar ma gyur pa med de/ pha mar gyur pa thams cad kyi phyir rgyun tu shin tu spyad dka' ba yang spyad/ shin tu gtang dka' ba'i
243a7(mdo sde): yan lag gi dam pa mgo dang / mig dang / glad rgyas dang / yul dang / grong khyer dang / chung ma dang / bu po dang / ban glang dang / rta dang / rin
243a8(mdo sde): po che sna bdun gyi shing rta dang / theg pa dang / gos dang zas dang skom dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad gang yang ma btang ba med do// 
243b1(mdo sde): shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang / sbyin pa byas dang / mang du thos pa dang / bsam gtan bsgoms pa dang shes rab spyod pa nas spyod
243b2(mdo sde): pa dka' ba zad spyad de/ skyo ba dang ngal ba med cing rgyun mi chad par brtson 'grus su 'bad pa yang pha ma la srid zhu bya ba dang / drin shes pa dang / drin lan bsab pa dang / sems can
243b3(mdo sde): thams cad myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam yongasu rdzogs par bya ba dang / de ltar na sems can
243b4(mdo sde): thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin chen po yod par shes par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang / rtag
243b5(mdo sde): par shin tu thabs mkhas pas/ khams gsum ba'i srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar du/ mnyam
243b6(mdo sde): snyoms pa'i byams pa bsgoms shig/ btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i thabs mkhas pa spyod de/ sems can thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / chos stong pa nyid dang / 
243b7(mdo sde): phung po lnga stong pa nyid du rtog shing phyir mi nur ba dang / mi 'byung ba dang / mi rgod pa stong pa nyid du yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid la thabs mkhas pas bsgom par bya ba dang / theg pa gsum
243b8(mdo sde): mi spong zhing chub par slob pa'i thabs mkhas pas/ shin tu zab mo'i spyod yul dam pa spyad pa la thabs mkhas par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi mtshan nyid la shin tu gsal bar rtogs te
244a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thog ma dang tha ma'i bar du gcig ma yin par rtog shing chud pas/ so so'i skye bo dag ni myos shing bslad pas gdung ba gsum gyis
244a2(mdo sde): yongs su gdungs te/ sdug bsngal gyi mtshor nub par gyur to// phyin ci log bzhis bsgrib pas zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos la phyin ci log tu gyur to// mi bde bar kun tu rtog pas bdag
244a3(mdo sde): med pa la bdag tu lta/ mi rtag pa la rtag par lta mi bde ba la bde bar lta/ mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar lta zhing / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi bas gzer te/ 
244a4(mdo sde): skad cig tu mi rtag pas bsgribs pa lnga dang / kun na das klag pa bcus kun tu klags te/ srid pa gsum da du 'khor zhing skye shi thog ma dang / tha ma med pa myong bar
244a5(mdo sde): gyur to// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas ci dang / cir 'phrod pa bzhin sde gnod gsum dang / mdo sde dgu nas mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi bar du rnam par phye zhing bstan te/ 
244a6(mdo sde): so so'i 'dod pa bzhin mdo sde mang po gsungs so// tshig la chags pa kha cig bdag ni 'di kho nas chog ste mya ngan las 'das pa thob ces 'dzin pa yang yod do// de yang de bzhin gsheg
244a7(mdo sde): pa'i sngon gyi thugs rje chen po'i smon lam gyi shugs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na las 'thun pa thams cad bsdus so// de ltar las 'thun pa kun 'dus pas/ 'khor mang
244a8(mdo sde): de'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dam pa'i chos mdo sde gsungs par dgongs te/ gzugs brnyan gyi chos nam du yang rgyun mi 'cha cing / so so'i skye bo thams cad bde ba chen po thob par mdzad do// de/ 
244b1(mdo sde): bas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'dul zhing ston pa yang dus las mi yol bar gshegs dus las mi yol bar mya ngan las 'da'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kha cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
244b2(mdo sde): snang mdzad ces bya ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba// bla/ 
244b3(mdo sde): na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes grags so// skabs kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gnas su gshegs nas lha rnams kyi ston pa mdzad do// skabs/ 
244b4(mdo sde): kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gnas nas babs te/ 'jam/ bu'i gling du sku tshe lo brgyad cur bzhugs par yang ston to// / de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 
244b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// la sa rnam par smin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// se mas can yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// bsam gtan
244b6(mdo sde): gyi ting nge 'dzin yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// klu'i mthu yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 'di na sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi
244b7(mdo sde): thugs la dgongs pa shes par 'dod na/ sems can dbang po zhan pa tha ma'i bar du yang kun shes pa mdzad do// sems can thams cad las gang yang sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod na/ 
244b8(mdo sde): de ma thag tu mthong bar mdzad do// gal te mthong bar mi mdzad na/ mig sngar bab kyang mi mthong ngo // de bas na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa yod
245a1(mdo sde): kyang mthong bar mi nus so// de ma yin pa gzhan yang sangs rgyas 'od zer chen po bskyed nas/ srid pa'i rtse mo man chad mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal
245a2(mdo sde): ba yan chad rnag sa nga cag 'dul ba'i skal pa dang ldan pa na mthong bar 'gyur/ gang bskal pa dang mi ldan pa ni mig sngar bab kyang mi mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa skabs kha
245a3(mdo sde): cig tu ni ched du skul ba mdzad/ skabs cig tu ni cang mi gsung bas na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ shin tu dpag par dka' ba/ shin tu shes
245a4(mdo sde): shing rtogs par dka' na/ ji ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la spyod pa dka' ba shin tu zab mo dra ba sprob sa par gyur/ khyod kyis zhus pa 'di ni yang dag par
245a5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la byams shing snying brtse ba yin te/ ngan 'gro gsum gyi lam bkag nas/ lha dang mi lam btad pa yin no// kun dga' bo ngas da khyod
245a6(mdo sde): la pha ma la sri zhu bya ba'i spyod dka' ba'i mdo tsam zhig bstan par byas legs par nyon la yid la zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa'
245a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams dang 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sngon byung bskal pa tshad med pa mtha' yas grangs med pa 'das pa'i pha rol na/ yul
245a8(mdo sde): bar na ser sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs shes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 
245b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ 'jig rten gyi gtso bo/ lha dang ma'i ston pa 'jig rten du byung ngo // sangs rgyas de'i sku tsher
245b2(mdo sde): tshad kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur bzhugs so// dam pa'i chos kyang bskal pa chung ngu'i nyi shur gnas so// gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur gnas so// gzugs
245b3(mdo sde): brnyan la chos spyod pa'i tshe/ mi'i rgyal po ra tsa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ yul ba ra na ser la dbang sbyar ro// rgyal po de la btsun mo ni nyi khri yod/ blon po ni bzhi stong / 
245b4(mdo sde): snyed yod do// bal gyi glang po che yang lnga brgya yod// rgyal phran drug cu la dbang / grong khyer brgyad brgya de zhig yod/ rgyal po de la bu gsum yod de/ gsum
245b5(mdo sde): car yang rgyal phran re re byed do// de'i tshe de'i dus na yul ba ra na sa'i rgyal po de mkhas pa'i sher ba dang ldan/ ste/ rtag tu yang dam pa'i chos kyis yul gyi srid
245b6(mdo sde): 'dzin pas/ gang yang stams las chad ces bya ba med do// rgyal po'i bsod nams dang yon tan gyi mthus char chu dus las mi yol te/ lo tog rgyun tu legs pas/ de
245b7(mdo sde): nas gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang bde bskyed do// de'i tshe na bar na se'i rgyal po de la blon po chen po sgra gcan zhes bya ba zhig yod do// blon po sgra gcan rgyal po li 'khus nas/ dmag
245b8(mdo sde): rnam bzhi bshams pa la 'di lta ste/ ban glang gi tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs bshams nas/ ba ra na se'i rgyal po la
246a1(mdo sde): brgal nas/ rgyal ba'i srog bcad dad// de ltar rgyal po bas nas kyang dmag gi tshogs rnam pa bani bkye nas/ mtha' rgyal bran burab kyang bsad do// de nas
246a2(mdo sde): rgyal bu 'bring po yang phab nas/ mtha'i rgyal phran rgyal bu tha chung kyi thog tu dmag drang bshams so// rgyal bu tha chung de ngo mtshar du gzugs byad bzang la 'phags par mdzes shing rang bzhin
246a3(mdo sde): gyis dge ba dul ba/ 'dzum zhing smra ba/ smra'o cog kyang phan pa'i don du smra zhing 'gyur gyi gnod pa med pa rtag tu drang po'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'dzin te/ log pas mi 'tsho bas
246a4(mdo sde): yul mi rnams kyang bde skyid la dar ba/ longs spyod dang nor ni rin po cher ldan pa/ bang mdzod gang ba/ rgyal po de'i yon tan la kun gyis sngags shing bstod pa/ 
246a5(mdo sde): bar snang gi lha dang 'jig rten gyi lha thams cad kyis kyang dag 'a zhing bkur ba/ de'i tshe na rgyal po de la rgyal bu su sha de ba zhes bya ba gcig pu zhig yod de/ shin tu yid
246a6(mdo sde): gzhungs shing gsal ba/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ lus kyi mdog gser du 'dug pa/ gnas bdun mnyam par gang ba/ skyes bu mtshan rdzogs
246a7(mdo sde): par ldan pa/ lo bdun lon pa zhig yod pa de la yab rgyal po yang shin tu byams shing sdug par sems so// de'i tshe na pho brang srung ba'i lha zhig rgyal po de la 'di skad ces smras so// 
246a8(mdo sde): rgyal po mkhyen tam blon po sgra gcan 'khus nas yul srid phrogs te/ rgyal po yab kyang bkrongs dmag gi tshogs bzhi yang bkye nas/ rgyal po gcen gnyis kyang srog gi dbang
246b1(mdo sde): bo dang bral te/ dmag gi tshogs rnams ring po ma thogs par 'dir phyin na/ rgyal po ca byor srog skyabs shing gung du mi 'gro/ de'i chen rgyal po des de skad ces smras pa thos nas
246b2(mdo sde): lus kyi ba spu kun zing zhes byed de/ lus kyang 'dar nas yi mug cing mya ngan gyis sems gdungs te/ sa la 'gre zhing rgyal bar gyur nas ring zhig lon pa dang / cung zad sangs te/ ngal
246b3(mdo sde): gyis nam mkha' lha la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar smra ba'i skad ni yod la gzugs ni mi snang ba khyod ci yin/ smras pa'i tshig 'di yang dag par bden nam lhas smras pa/ bdag
246b4(mdo sde): ni rgyal po'i pho brang srung ba'i lha yin te/ rgyal po khyod shes pa dang ldan zhing bsod nams dang yon tan bcas/ pas/ drang po'i chos kyi yul srid 'dzin te/ de bas
246b5(mdo sde): na bdag gis sngar smras pa yin te/ sdug bsngal gyis nya na mongs par ma gyur par myur du byol zhing 'gro ba'i rigs so// de nas rgyal po de pho brang du zhugs nas/ da ni bdag
246b6(mdo sde): yul gzhan zhig tu 'gro dgos so snyam du bsams so// yang 'di snyam du bsams so// yul pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam gnyis yod do// lam nye bar zhugs na ni zhag bdun
246b7(mdo sde): gyis pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur/ lam ring por zhugs na ni zhag bcu bzhis phyin par 'gyur bas/ ci nas lam nye bar 'gro'o snyam bsams nas zhag bdun gyi rgyags dang chas te po
246b8(mdo sde): brang gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / phyir pho brang gi nang du log nas/ rgyal bu su sha de ba pang du blangs te/ mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing sngangs pa ltar langs nas phyir yang 'dug go/ 
247a1(mdo sde): de'i tshe na btsun mos de ltar mi bde zhing skrag pa ltar gyur pa mthong nas rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyal po chen po ci'i slad du 'jigs skrag pa lta
247a2(mdo sde): bu'i gzugs ston cing sku la yang rdul gyi gos pa lta bu sgra yang 'dzings te/ dbugs kyang mi bde ste yul stor la thug pa 'am/ mdza' sdug pa dang bye ba'am/ dgra sdang ba dang phrad pa lta bu dang // 
247a3(mdo sde): bkra mi shis pa'i mtshan ma dag gda' ba 'di ci lags bstan du gsol rgyal pos smras pa/ kho bo ci nyes pa khyod kyis shes pa ma yin gyis ma smra shig/ btsun mos gsol pa/ bdag dang
247a4(mdo sde): rgyal por lus gzugs gnyis kyang sems gcig ste/ dper na bya'i 'dab ma gnyis sam/ lus kyi rkang pa ga nyis sam/ mgo'i mig gnyis sam/ de dang 'dra na ci'i slad
247a5(mdo sde): du bdag la gsang ste mi gsung / rgyal pos btsun mo la smra/ sa pa/ khyod la mi shes sam blon po sgra gcan ngan se/ mas skyes nas/ rgyal po la 'khus te/ yab rgyal
247a6(mdo sde): po yang dkrongs te/ gcen rgyal bu yang srog gi bar chad byas nas/ de lta dmigs dang chas te nga la rgol du 'ongs pas kho bo yul gzhan du 'byol du 'gro zhes smras nas/ rgyal bu dge don
247a7(mdo sde): bang du blangs te lam du zhugs so// de nas btsun mo yang rgyal po'i phyir 'brangs te song ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po mya ngan gyis non te yid 'khrugs nas/ zhag bcu bzhi'i lam du zhugs
247a8(mdo sde): pas lam yang nor te/ lam de yang bgrod dka' zhing rtsang rtsub pa chu tsam yang med de/ zhag du ma zhig song ba las rgyags kyang chad do// thog ma gsang ste rgyal po gcig pu 'gro bar
247b1(mdo sde): byas nas// zhag bdun gyi rgyags las kyang ma brdungs pa las lam yang nang / mi gsum gyis kyang zos te/ zhag bcu bzhi lam du zhugs pas/ dadung lam rang zhig yod pa las rgyag
247b2(mdo sde): chad nas don rgyal po dang btsun mos skad byung nas ngus so// kyi hud kyi hud re sdug thog ma bcas nas da tsam gyi bar du 'di 'dra ba ma myong ba de 'dir myong bar gyur te/ da 'dir sdug cing phongs
247b3(mdo sde): so zhes zer te lag pas mgo la brdabs so// sa la 'gre zhing lus la rdul gyis gos nas/ tshig 'di skad du smre sngags 'don to// bdag cag gis tshe snga ma la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las
247b4(mdo sde): ci zhig byas/ 'on te pha ma dang dgra bcom pa bsad dam/ 'on te dam pa'i chos la bkur ba btab bam/ 'on/ te 'thun pa'i dge 'dun gyi dben bgyis sam/ 'on te
247b5(mdo sde): rngon pa dang nye ba byas sam 'on te srang dang bre bcos te pha rol la phrog rlom byas sam/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi nor la spyod spyod dam/ ci byas na 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal
247b6(mdo sde): myong bar gyur tsi gu/ de skad smre zhing chung zad bstir dgras slebs na/ srog gi bar chad nges par 'byung / lam du zhugs nas 'gror ni bkres pa dang skom pas nyen nas srog la bab
247b7(mdo sde): tu cha'o// rgyal po dang btsun mo de lta bu'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen te skad phyung ste ngus pa dang / sa la 'gyel nas brgyal bar gyur to// de nas ring zhig lon pa dang sangs nas 'di snyam du
247b8(mdo sde): gsum char lhan cig tu nar 'chi bar 'gyur gyis/ btsun mo bsad la bdag dang du'i srog thar par bya'o snyam bsams nas/ ral gyi phyung ste btsun mo gsad par bshams pa dang
248a1(mdo sde): rgyal bu dge don gyis rgyal po'i lag pa nas bzung ste/ da lta ci zhig mdzad dgongs shes gsol to// yab rgyal pos mig nas mchims gang bzhin du rgyal du
248a2(mdo sde): la'adi skad ces smras so// khyod kyi ma btsun mo dam pa bsad la khyod kyi srog gso snyam mo// gal te ma bsad kyang rang 'chi bar 'gyur te/ kho bo ni 'chi 'am gson yang rung na/ bu khyod
248a3(mdo sde): kyi srog gas pa'i phyir/ khyod kyi ma btsun mo dam pa bsad snyam mo// de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te btsun mo bsad par gyur na de'o
248a4(mdo sde): la bdag mi 'tshal te/ gang na yang ma'i sha la bu za ba mi srid dpas bdag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur na/ yab rgyal po ci'i slad du bdag bkum ste pha ma'i srog thar bar mi
248a5(mdo sde): mdzad yab rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos nas mdo/ la khams te 'gyel nas sa la 'gre zhing rgyal bu la 'dzi skad ces smras so// khyod kho bo'i mig dang 'dran su zhig
248a6(mdo sde): rang gi mig phyung ste za bar byed/ kho bo ni shaM yang bla bas bu mi gsod do// bu bsad de sha za mi nus so// de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis yang yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol
248a7(mdo sde): to/ gal te yab yum gyis bdag bkum na sha khrag kyang ring po mi thog par rul sums nas dgongs pa ma mchis par 'gyur te/ bdag gi gsol ba gcig cig ma gnang na byams
248a8(mdo sde): pa'i yab yum ma lags pas/ bdag gi yid dang mi 'gal bar mdzad du gsol// de nas yab rgyal pos sras rgyal bu la khyod kyi yid dang mi 'gal bar bya bas/ ci gsol
248b1(mdo sde): ba'i rnams myur du smros shig ces bsgo ba dang / rgyal bu dge don gyis yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// yab yum gyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du nyin re zhing bdag
248b2(mdo sde): gis lus las sha rgya ma gsum gsum bcad de/ cha gnyis ni yab yum la dbul/ cha gcig ni bdag rang 'tshal na/ lus srog gzungs su 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal pos
248b3(mdo sde): kyang rgyal bus gsol ba bzhin du gnang nasanyin gcig bzhin sha rgya ma gsum gsum bcad de/ cha gnyis ni rgyal po dang btsun mo za/ cha gcig ni rgyal bu rang za ste/ lus
248b4(mdo sde): dang srog gi zungs byas nas/ lam du zhugs te song ba las zhag gnyis kyis yul pha rol ma slebs par rgya rdal bu'i lus kyi sha zad de/ rus pa'i tshig dang chu ba tsam
248b5(mdo sde): zhig 'brel te/ srog gi lhag ma tsam zhog lus nas sa/ la 'gyel to// de nas rgyal po dang btsun mos rgyal bu bang du blangs nas/ skad chen po phyung na tshe nges
248b6(mdo sde): btab te/ 'di skad ces smras so// nged gnyis kyis ma rig par khyod kyi sha zos te/ khyod 'di lta bu'i na tsha'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur la/ lam yang da dung ring bas khyod kyi
248b7(mdo sde): sha ni zad de/ da ni lhan cig tu gnas 'dir ro bzhag go/ de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis skad chung ngus yab rgyal po la 'di skad gsol lo// da ni 'di nas pha rol tu zhag cig tsam gyi lam
248b8(mdo sde): las ma lus te/ bdag ni g.yo zhing bskyod mi nus pas srog 'dir 'dor ro// rgyal po dang btsun mo mo ma rabs ngan pa ltar lhan cig tu gnas 'dir ro gzhag go ma gsung shig/ 
249a1(mdo sde): bdag la byams shing thugs brtse bar dgongs na bdag gis bsams pa dang mi 'gal bar mdzad du gsol// da dung yang bdag gi rus pa'i gseb na sha tsi yod pa ma lus par
249a2(mdo sde): btogs la yul pha rol tu gshegs su gsol// de nas rgyal pos yang rgyal bus gsol pa bzhin du/ tshigs dang rus pa'i gseb na sha ci yod pa btogs nas cha gsum du bgos te/ 
249a3(mdo sde): gnyis ni rgyal po dang btsun mos zos/ cha gcig ni rgyal bus zos te/ rgyal po dang btsun mo yang lam du zhugs nas dong ngo // rgyal bu dge don langs nas 'greng bzhin rgyal po dang
249a4(mdo sde): btsun mo song ba la lta'o// rgyal po dang btsun mo gnyis skad chung nas ngu bzhin song nas/ rgyal bu dge ngo dan gyi mig gis mi sod kyi bar du rgyal po dang btsun mo la chags
249a5(mdo sde): pa'i sems kyis mig mi 'dzum par lta lta nas ring zhig lon pa dang / phyir sa la 'gyel to// sha dang khrag gi dri bro/ sa phyogs bcu nas sbrang ma dang sha sbrang mang po 'dus nas/ rgyal
249a6(mdo sde): bu yog pa tsam du lus la za zhing 'jugs te/ sdug bsngal gyis gdungs so// de'i tshe na rgyal bu de srog gi lhag ma tsam zhig ma chad de/ skad phyung nas 'di skad ces smon lam
249a7(mdo sde): btab bo// bdag gi sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las rnams ni 'das byang zhing zad par gyur cig/ deng slan chad mi bgyid do// bdag gi lus pha ma la phul te/ sbyin pa byas pas
249a8(mdo sde): bdag gipam sngam pas lhag pa'i sod rnams bcug cig dang sngon te/ bde ba rgal ba dang / bad ba sa dpadang / dz+wal ma ngan pa ma rmo ba dang / lhas bsru nga ngo / 
249b1(mdo sde): bkur ba dang / zhal mchu dang / rkun po dang / ngagra dang rku lnga byed pa med cing / dus thams cad du bkra shis par shog shig/ bdag gi lus lhag ma tsam sha khrag sbrang ma la byin
249b2(mdo sde): bas thams cad du 'drangs shing tshim par gyur te/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas su grub par shog shig/ sangs rgyas su grub nas chos kyi sku thob nas kyang / chos kyi skus thams
249b3(mdo sde): cad kyi bkres skom pa'i mu ge dang / skye shir 'khor ba'i nad lci ba sel bar shog shig/ rgyal bus de skad smon lam btab pa na/ gnam sa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos nyi ma
249b4(mdo sde): yang 'od mi gsal bar gyur/ gcan zan dang ri dgas rnams kyang skrag nas kun tu rgyug/ rgya mtsho yang rab tu da'akhrugs ri rab kyang 'gul zhing ldeg/ sum cu rtsa
249b5(mdo sde): gsum gnam gyi bar du yang rab tu g.yos so// de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang pos 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang / dang / 'dzam bu'i gling dag tu babs nas/ rgyal bu don
249b6(mdo sde): grub bsdig pa'i phyir/ seng ge dang / stag dang / 'phar sprang las sogs pa'i lus su sprul nas mig dgad kha gdangs/ spu bsgreng nas skad chen po'i nga ro phyung ste/ rgyal/ 
249b7(mdo sde): bu la mchong ba bzhin bsdigs so// de'i tshe rgyal bu don grub kyis gcan zan khro bo de dag mthong nas kyang skad mi che bas 'di skad ces smras so// khyed rnams kho bo za 'dod na ci bder ze
249b8(mdo sde): cig/ 'di 'dra ba'i mthu rtsal gyis bsdigs ci dgos shes bsgo'o// de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos smras pa/ bdag cag ni seng ge 'am gcan bla ma yin te/ brgya byin lha'i
250a1(mdo sde): dbang po yin te/ khyod bag ma ning sang du 'ongs so// de'i tshe rgyal bus brgya byin lha'i dbang po mthong nas shin tu dga' mgur rangs par yang gyur to// de nas
250a2(mdo sde): brgya byin gyis rgyal bu la smras pa/ khyod kyis shin tu gtang dka' ba btang ste lus kyi sha khrag gis pha ma la bstabs pa 'dir bsod nams kyis khyod bdud kyi rgyal po 'dod dam/ 'on te
250a3(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'dod dam/ lha'i dbang po'am/ mi'i rgyal po 'am/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'dod/ rgyal bus smras pa/ bdag ni bdud kyi rgyal po 'am/ tshangs pa 'am/ 
250a4(mdo sde): lha'i rgyal po'am/ mi'i rgyal po 'am/ 'khor lo// sa sbyar ba'i rgyal po gang yang mi 'dod de/ sems can thams cad rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir/ bla na
250a5(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod do// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ khyod ni shin tu yang gti mu gcan zhig yin pa 'dra/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
250a6(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub ni yun ring po nas shin tu dka' bas bsgrubs pas bzod 'grub ce'o// khyod kyis shin tu bsdug bsngal ba bzod dam/ rgyal bus smras pa/ gal te lcags kyi
250a7(mdo sde): 'khor la 'bar ba bdag gi spyi bo'i steng na rgyun tu 'khor yang sdug bsngal de tsam gyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 
250a8(mdo sde): khyod kyis smras pa stong pa 'dil su zhig yid ched par 'gyur// de nas rgyal bus dam bcas nas smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo// gal te bdag gi smra ba'i tshig brdzun te lha'i dbang
250b1(mdo sde): bopo bslus par gyur na/ bdag gi lus kyi rma 'di nam du yang 'tsho bar ma gyur cig/ gal te smra ba'i tshig bden na bdag gi lus kyang sor chud cing khrag kyang 'o mar gyur cig ces smras ma thag
250b2(mdo sde): tu/ lus kyi rma yang sang ma kho na bzhin sor chud de/ khrag kyang 'o mar gyur nas rgyal bu'i byad gzugs kyang snga ma bas lhag par bzang zhing sdug pa dang mdzes par gyur te/ langs nas
250b3(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khyod logs so// shin tu legs so// shin tu dpa' ba'i brtson 'grus kyis gdon mi za bar
250b4(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub thob par 'gyuradar ro// ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa na thog mar bdag
250b5(mdo sde): gi don mdzad par gyur cig ces smras nas/ brgya byi na lha'i dbang po yang nam mkha'i phyogs de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal po dang btsun mo yang rgyal
250b6(mdo sde): po pha rol po'i drung du byin nas/ rgyal po des kyang rgyong ma nas bsu nas dgos pa'i yo byad yid bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe rgyal po dang btsun mo ngas rgyal bus lus kyi sha khrag
250b7(mdo sde): gis pa ma la ji ltar bstabs pa rgyal po de la zhib du brjod pa dang / rgyal po des ji ltar brjod po de dag thos nasargyal bu des lus kyi sha khrag gis pha ma la stabs pas sri zhu
250b8(mdo sde): cher byas pa'i drin lan bsabs nas dmag rnam bzhi bshams nas rgyal po de dang yul bA ra na ser dmag drangs so// de'i rgyal po de dmag rnam bzhi dang chas nas lam du zhug
251a1(mdo sde): te/ rgyal bu dang bral ba'i gnas su phyin pa dang / 'di snyam du bdag gi bu ni gdon mi za bar 'di nyid du shi na/ bu'i rus pa tsam bsdus te phyir bdag gi yul du
251a2(mdo sde): bkur ro snyam du sems nas/ skad phyung nas ngu zhing bu'i rus bu sdud du song song ba la/ rgyang ma nas bdag gi bu'i lus kyi rma yang sos nas/ snga ma bas bzang zhing mdzes te drung du 'ongaso// 
251a3(mdo sde): de nas rgyal pos pang du blangs te/ khyod da dung gson nam zhes smras pa dang / rgyal bus ji ltar gyur pa yab rgyal po dang btsun mo la smras so// rgyal po dang btsun mo rab tu dga' ste/ 
251a4(mdo sde): thams cad pan glang la zhon nas/ phyir bdag gi yul du phyin pa dang / rgyal bu de'i bsod nams de'i ma thus bdag gi yul yang phyir thob nas/ rgyal bu don
251a5(mdo sde): grub rgyal por dbang bskur te rgyal por bcug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyi kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ deche de'i dus na yab rgyal por gyur pa de gzhan yin snyam du khyod
251a6(mdo sde): sems na/ de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe de'i dus na yab rgyal po de ni da ltar nga'i yab zas gtsang ma zhes bya bar gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na yum du gyur pa de ni gzhon
251a7(mdo sde): yin pa snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi lnga'o// de ni da ltar der sum lha mdzes zhes bya ba yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu don grub ces bya bar gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam du
251a8(mdo sde): khyod sems na// de de ltar mi blta'o// de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu de ni da ltar shAkya thub po zhes bya ba yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na brgya byin lha'i dbang por gyur pa ltar kun shes ko'u 'dzin
251b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyi pa ma la sri zhu byed pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag nyi shu snyed kyi 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang
251b2(mdo sde): bde ba'i don la mkhas pa'i tshig gi spobs pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bcu gnyis kyis mi skye bo'i chos la chos kyi bzod pa thob bo// gzhan yang phyogs bcu nas
251b3(mdo sde): 'dus pa'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rdul phra rab snyed kyis theg pa gnyis kyi sems spangs te/ theg pa gcig gis mthar byin par gyur to// dge snyen dang / dge snyen ma rdul
251b4(mdo sde): phra rab snyed kyis 'bras bu dang po nas theg pa gnyis kyi 'dra/ sa bu'i bar du thob par gyur to// lha dang mi brgya ste/ nga snyed ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
251b5(mdo sde): bskyed do// de ma yin pa lha dang / klu dang yi dgas dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma lags
251b6(mdo sde): pa la sogs pa mang po'i rnams la la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems bskyed par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi kun dga'
251b7(mdo sde): bo la bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dag gis sems can thams cad don du pha ma la sri zhu bya ba'i phyir/ lus kyis sha khrag gis kyang pha ma la bstabs shing shin tu spyad dka'
251b8(mdo sde): ba spyod pa ni 'di lta bu yin no// 'khor mang po thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas/ so so nas phan pa dang bde ba'i don rnyed do// dga' rangs nas mgo bos phyag
252a1(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas nas phyir dong ngo // thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las/ sr-i zhu'i le'u zhes
252a2(mdo sde): bya ste gnyis so// / bam po gnyis pa// de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po'i nang na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
252a3(mdo sde): skar ma mang po zil gyis mnan pa lta bu 'am/ klu 'khyil pa'i 'ja' tshon ltar 'tsher zhing gsal ba la lta ni mig mi chags pa bzhin nam/ bsams na yid 'khrug pa tsam du 'od zer lham me ljang
252a4(mdo sde): der bzhugs te/ dper mi bzod pa ni srin bu me khyer gyi 'od nyi ma shar ma thag tu mi snang ba 'am/ gnyi zla 'od zer brgya stong snyed yod kyang / brgya byin gyi drung na sol
252a5(mdo sde): pung lta bu 'am/ brgya byin la 'od gsal ba yod kyangatshangs pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi drung na gyo mo 'am/ gseg ma lta bu'am mtshan mo dang / nor bu rin po che'i 'od du
252a6(mdo sde): bskrun pa tsam 'am/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po'i 'od zer dam pa brgya stong snyed yod pa'i 'od thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi drung na sol ba'i phung po ltar gyur to// 
252a7(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer mdog gang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu snang bar gyur to// de dag na gnas pa'i sems can dag la 'od zer nges
252a8(mdo sde): reg na dmus long ni mig gis gzugs mthong bar 'gyur/ lus sgur po ni lus rangs par 'gyur/ dbang po nyams pa ni dbang po tshang zhing yan lag dang nying lag dang ldan
252b1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// myos pa rnams ni dran pa phyir rnyed par 'gyur/ mdor na ji tsam du yid du mi 'ong ba thams cad dang bral te 'dod pa bzhin thob par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil
252b2(mdo sde): 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun cu snyed stan las langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong bskor ba byas
252b3(mdo sde): nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ thams cad kyis skad 'thun par tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pa byas pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub
252b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sem des dpa' rtog med dbyangs dang / byang chub sam sa dpa' bde ba 'ba' shog sems dang / byang chub sems dpa'
252b5(mdo sde): dri ma med par grags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshad med dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' gtsug pud
252b6(mdo sde): 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa'i seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig rol dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtog pa spong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes
252b7(mdo sde): brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dge gnas blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu mtshan med dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gos 'od zer dang / byang chub
252b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' khro bo blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu srung 'gyur dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad po brtsan dang / byang chub sems dpa' me tog 'phags dang / 
253a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bde dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i shes rab las dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngo 'phral 'chang dang / byang
253a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bsam du med dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa sbyin dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen las dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i me tog gnas dang / 
253a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' shin tu sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpag med chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags pa'i yid dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtseg/ 
253a4(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang phyug sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu dang / byang/ nga chub sems dpa' stobs bcu 'chang dang / byang chub sems
253a5(mdo sde): dpa' 'phags pa chen pos skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba rol dang / byang chub sems dpa' de na gnas
253a6(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' grangs med lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu lci ba'i sdong po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgyu las 'phags
253a7(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu 'gro dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid 'phags dang / byang chub sems dpa' sde chen khams dang / byang chub sems dpa' ris skyob
253a8(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gsum 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngo 'phral yod dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags pa brjod dang / byang chub sems
253b1(mdo sde): dpa' gnyis gsal dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge brgyan dang / byang chub sems dang 'dus tshong rgyal po dang byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
253b2(mdo sde): srid mngon ston dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'od rgyang gsal dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i ri dang / byang chub sems dpa' srid len byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba
253b3(mdo sde): byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan mchog dang / byang chub sems dpa' dga' mgu rangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtan dang / byang chub sems
253b4(mdo sde): dpa' 'gribs med dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags lnga don dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med da dang / byang chub sems dpa' ma chags lha dang / byang
253b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sgron ma chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa 'dam pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thobs// 
253b6(mdo sde): chen stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa' mun nag bstsal dang / byang chub sems dpa' mnyam med phyogs la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan
253b7(mdo sde): sngar yi dam 'di skad bcas so// bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi chos bsrung zhing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun
253b8(mdo sde): tu rgyas par bgyi zhing rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dam pa bsam gyis mo khyab pa mthong nas/ 'od zer de dag/ 
254a1(mdo sde): las sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang thos par 'gyur/ chos de dag thos nas sems kyi sgrib pa dang bral te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa/ 
254a2(mdo sde): thams cad byang nas/ lha'i rin po che gser ltar sems rnam par dag par 'gyur bas/ thams cad gsal bar snang bar gyur phyir ro// bdag gis phan pa dang bde ba'i yon tan
254a3(mdo sde): 'di lta bu dag dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa la ston pa chen por 'du shes skyes// byams pa'i pha lta bu'i 'du shes skyes nas/ rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin dran te/ sangs rgyas
254a4(mdo sde): kyi bka' drin shes par bgyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dam pa'i chos thos par ring po mi thogs par byang chub kyi snying po 'dug cing dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor
254a5(mdo sde): lo bskor te/ sems can thams cad sgrol bar 'gyur// de dag kyang chos thos pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de nas
254a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun bcu po 'di dag yun ring po nas bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba
254a7(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul phra rab snyed kyi sngon rol na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma brgya stong snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab snyed bkur byas te/ 
254a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas de dag las rtag tu tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing / rgyal ba de dag la mi skyo ba'i sems kyis mnyes par byas nas/ byams pas bdag gis lus bsrungs te/ sangs
254b1(mdo sde): / rgyas kyi chos 'dzin cing / snying rje chen pos rgyun tu phyogs bcur thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed do// sems can gang zhig tha ma shi kar byang chub sems dpa' de dag
254b2(mdo sde): la gcig gi ming ngam/ gnyis sam/ gsum sam/ bzhi 'am/ bdun bcu'i bar du rdzogs par thos te/ de la srog phyogs skyabs su song na/ tshe 'phos ma thag tu gang na sangs
254b3(mdo sde): rgyas bzhugs pa'i 'dzag rten gyi khams su pad+mo las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing / 'dod chags dang yongs su bral ba dang mngal gyi gnas nas mi skye ba dang / mnam zhing brtsog pa dang bral
254b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ lus yongs su dag cing / lus dri zhim pa dang / thams cad yid du 'ong zhing bkurd bsti byed par 'gyur ro// kun gyi yid du 'ong zhing bkur sti
254b5(mdo sde): byas pas sems rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// sems rab tu dga' bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang
254b6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par 'gyur/ de ltar byams pa dang snying rje'i sems
254b7(mdo sde): bskyed pas/ 'gro ba ma lus pa la btang snyoms su mi gtong ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur/ gzhan yang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i sems dang / bdag dang
254b8(mdo sde): gzhan gyis don byed pa'i sems dang / sgrib pa dang bar chad du 'gyur ba bskul ba'i sems dang / nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa'i sems dang / dge ba'i gshes gnyen la bsnyen cing
255a1(mdo sde): rtag tu bkur sti byed pa'i sems dang / 'dun pa'i yid kyi chos nyan pa'i sems dang / mi brjed par yid la byed cing / don bzang po gzungs su 'dzin pa'i sems
255a2(mdo sde): dang nyung ngu blol don mang du shes pa'i sems dang / mang du thos la don mi shes pa mi 'dod pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang dag pa nyid la dad pa'i sems dang / de bzhin nyid
255a3(mdo sde): kyi don bden pa la dad pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i don bden pa la dad pa'i sems skyes pas ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar bstan
255a4(mdo sde): pa bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems skyes pas phyir mi ldog/ dpa'i sems skye bar 'gyur/ de ltar phyir mi ldogadapa'i sems skyes pas/ sems can thams cad la
255a5(mdo sde): mnyam snyoms pa'i gnyen po'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar bdag khams gsum pa'i srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar skye khar mi dga' ba bzhin du gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs med
255a6(mdo sde): pa dang / rkang bzhi dang rkang mangs nas/ grog sbur nas srog chags thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang srog gi bar du stor yang pha rol po'i srog 'phrog
255a7(mdo sde): pa'i las mi byed do// ji ltar bdag la nor rdzas dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / zas dang / skom dang / ban glang dang / shing rta dang / theg pa dang / yul dang / grong khyer dang / 
255a8(mdo sde): chung ma dang / bu dang / lus kyi yan lag gi bar du longs spyod rnam la srung zhing rim gro byed do// gzhan gyis khyer zhing 'phrog pa la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams cad de dang 'dra ste/ de
255b1(mdo sde): bas na byang chub sems dpa' na bdag gi lus dang srog sngor kyang sems can rnams kyi nar dang / gos dang / bas dang / skom dang / longs spyod la 'phrog pa'i sems ma skyed do// ji ltar bdag/ 
255b2(mdo sde): gi gzugs dam pa sring mo 'am/ chung ma 'am/ slas la gzhan gyis mi rig par byed mi 'dod pa bzhin du/ sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa'
255b3(mdo sde): ni bdag gi lus dang srog stor kyang / pha rol po'i gzugs dam pa la 'du shes ngan pa log pa'i sems mi skyed na/ ma rig pa'i chos ngan pa lta ci smos/ ji ltar bdag phra ma dang tshig rtsub po
255b4(mdo sde): 'khrug par 'gyur ba la mi dga' ba bzhin du/ sems can/ rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sem/ sa dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog yal yang brdzun du smra ba dang
255b5(mdo sde): phan tshun 'khrug pa'i tshig mi smra'o// ji ltar bdag rdo dbyugagis rdeg pa dang lcag gis gzhu ba dang / nan la bor ba la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ 
255b6(mdo sde): de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog yal yang rdo dbyug dang / lcag dang / chad pas gcad pa'i las kyi sems can rnam la mi che'o// ji ltar bdag lcags sgrog
255b7(mdo sde): dang / khong sgril dang / mtshon cha dang / bzung ba dang / rtags pa dang / bcing bas bcing ba'i gnod pa rnams la mi dga' ba bzhin du/ sems can kun kyang de dang 'dra ste/ 
255b8(mdo sde): bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang srog yal yang lcags sgrog dang / khong sgrol dang / bzung ba dang / btsang ba la sogs pa'i gnod pas 'che bar mi byed do// ji ltar bdag
256a1(mdo sde): gzhan gyis bsnyas pa dang / dbang dang dag shul byed pa dang / dbang rlom par can byed bsnyems shing ngan du byed pa la mi dga' ba bzhin du/ sems can thams cad
256a2(mdo sde): kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gcig pu'i lus dang srog yal yang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i mi rig pas/ sems can la gnod pa mi byed do// ji ltar
256a3(mdo sde): bdag la pha rol po gzhan gyis bkur sti byed cing mchod dam/ tshig snyan pas bstod na/ bdag bde ba la dga' bzhin du bdag kyang / sems can rnams la gos dang zos dang skom dang / 
256a4(mdo sde): mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi sbyin par byed do// gal te bdag gis las chen po zhig bsgrub bam/ sangs rgyas kyi phyir ram/ chos rgya/ 
256a5(mdo sde): phyir ram/ dge 'dun gyi phyir ram/ don bsgrub pa las blos mi lcogs te/ don bsgrub par ma gyur nas mi dga' zhe nga mya ngan gyis gdungs pa las mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhig gis
256a6(mdo sde): bdag gis bsgrub pa'i don ma grub pas mi dga' zhing mya ngan byed par mthong na bdag la 'di skad zer ro// rigs kyi bu khyod mi dga' ba ma byed cig/ khyod kyi don grub pa'i grogs bya'o// don
256a7(mdo sde): yid bzhin du grub par bya'o zhes zer na/ de la rab tu dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur te/ de bas na bdag gis sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du bsgrub po'i las kyis grogs bya'o// 
256a8(mdo sde): ji ltar bdag la rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / chu'am/ mes gnod par 'gyur ram/ blon po la sogs pas bzung ngam/ btags sam/ btsangs na mi dag 'a nga'i myangon rgyas
256b1(mdo sde): gdungs par gyur pa las mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhig gis bdag de ltar mya ngan gyis gdungs pa mthong na/ snyan pa sgra'i tshig gi bdag la mya ngan ma byed cing / khyod kyi phyir kho bos rgyal po 'am/ 
256b2(mdo sde): blon po chen po la gsol ba btab ste/ gal te na nor gsug sbyin pa 'am/ thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ji nas kyang khyod mi bde ba'i sdug bsngal las thar par bya'o zhes zer na/ bdag
256b3(mdo sde): gis tshig de thos pa tsam gyi sems dga' bar 'gyur te/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni shes par bya ba'i rgyu rtsal dang / bzo'i bar du mthar phyin par brtson 'grus su slob bo// 'di
256b4(mdo sde): lta ste/ shes par bya ba rig pa'i gnas dang / bzo'i ga nas dang / rol mo dang / rtsed mo dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / mig 'phrul gyi sngags dang / sman dang / ban glang
256b5(mdo sde): dang / rta dang / bzhon pa dang / dgra chos dang / dmag dra/ nga ba dang / dpyad la sogs pa la mkhas par slob ste/ de ltar sgyu rtsal ci la yang mkhas par bslabs nas/ 'gro
256b6(mdo sde): ba mang po dang / rgyal po dang / blon po chen po la sogs pa yang bsams pa'i yid dang 'gal bar mi byed/ de ma yin pa gzhan yang longs spyod kyi rkyen gos sam/ nor ram/ zas
256b7(mdo sde): sam bza' ba 'am/ btung ba 'am/ nor bu 'am/ gdu bu 'am/ lus kyi rgyan nam/ gser ram/ dngul lam/ bai DUr+ya 'am/ mno shel lam/ spug gam/ mu tig gam/ 
256b8(mdo sde): a sma gar b+ha'am/ nor bu rin po che'am/ ban glang ngam/ rta 'am/ theg pa 'am/ bran po'am/ las byed pa'i mi'am/ chung ma 'am/ smas kyang yod/ chu mig gam/ khrus
257a1(mdo sde): kyi rdzing bu 'am/ rin po che'i yang tog bzang po 'am/ longs spyod kyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs yod kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de la rlom pa'am/ rgyags pa
257a2(mdo sde): sems med do// de ltar rgyu rul kun la yang mkhas/ rin po che'i bang mdzod brgya stong dang yang ldan/ ban glang dang / rta dang / theg pa yang yod na chung ma bzang mo yang grangs med
257a3(mdo sde): par yod/ yang tog bzang po yang yod/ chu mig dang / khrus kyi rdzing bu la sogs pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod gang yang yod mod kyi de la chags te/ rtag tu 'dod pa nyung ba dang / chog
257a4(mdo sde): shes pa la dga' zhing / bas mtha' dgon pa dang / ri dang tshal dang / shing drung du bsam gau tan la de zhi bar gnas pa la mos so// skye bo mang po dang / smra zhi
257a5(mdo sde): gtam zer yang / sems ni rtag tu gnyen po'i sgor 'jug par byed do// so so'i skye bo dang spyod tshul 'thun pa ltar byed kyang sems can la phan pa'i don tu nor bu rin po che
257a6(mdo sde): gtong bar byed kyi sems can la gnod pa mi phan pa'i don mi byed do// gang dbul ba phongs pa nyam thag par gyur pa dag byang chub sems dpa' la slong du 'ongs na/ de la ci 'dod pa bzhin byang chub sems
257a7(mdo sde): dpa' sbyin par byed do// sems can gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos shing dad de/ byang chub sems dpa' la bsnyen bkur dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rim go dang g.yog byed cing
257a8(mdo sde): rkang pa 'khru ba'i las byed dam/ lus bkru ba dang / mnye ba'i las byed dam/ chag chag dang / phyag dar byed dam/ so shing dang / khrus chus sbyor ram/ mal stan 'dings
257b1(mdo sde): shing / mal gos sprug pa'i las byed dam/ srod dang tho rangs la mar me 'bud dam/ khye sus dang / drol kha zas than pa na dang / pu sha ni dang / khang ne 'bul lam/ 'thung ba'i
257b2(mdo sde): skom yu li shi dang / bu lar sha ka'i 'bras bu'i skom dang / rgun chu dang / kha ra nag po'i chu la sogs pa sbyar sbyar nas/ yo byad de lta bus zhag bdun nam zhag dgu bcu'i bar du
257b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'bul bar byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe/ mchod pa'i yo byad 'bul ba de la dga' ba'i sems med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
257b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni skal pa grangs yun ring po nas song // nyis rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i phyir/ sems can tha ma/ sa cad la skyed 'bri'i sems med pa'i phyir byams pa dang snying
257b5(mdo sde): rje'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyir mnyam snyoms pa'i sems la gnas pa'i phyir ro// de bas na dus kha cig tu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byed de/ rtag tu dge ba
257b6(mdo sde): bcu'i chos kyi sems can gyi don byed do// sems can de dag kyang rgyal po'i yid bzhin du dga' zhing spyod pa'i tshe'i dus byas na yang lha dang ma'i 'jig rten du 'dod pa lnga'i longs spyod
257b7(mdo sde): mchog dam pa dang ldan te/ rigs che zhing mtho bar skye bar 'gyur// bsam pa'i yid bzhin du nyal ba dang ldang ba dang 'gro ba la gnod pa med par 'gyur/ gnas gang du 'gro yang
257b8(mdo sde): bzhon pa'i rta dang theg par ldan pa te skyed mos tshal tu rtsed mo dang / rol mo la rtse zhing longs spyod par 'gyur/ bza' ba dang btung ba dam pa dang dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur yang / 
258a1(mdo sde): ma mi rtag pa brten te rga ba dang na bas gzir te shi bar gyur na/ khyim gyi bu smad mya ngan gyis gdungs te skad phyung nas ngu zhing / la la ni mgo la thal mo rdebs/ la
258a2(mdo sde): la ni rang rang gi skra 'bal te/ mchi ma 'dzag cing sa la 'dre'o// de nas khyogs sam shing rta'i steng du bzhag nas/ dur khrod du skyel te de ltar bskyal nas kyang bu smad dag phyir khyim du
258a3(mdo sde): 'ongs nas mya ngan gyis gdungs te/ la la ni brgyal nas sa la 'gre/ la la ni de'i rkyen gyis nang du gyur/ la la ni mi dran pas myos l-i la ni tshe'i bar chad du shi bar byas te/ 
258a4(mdo sde): de ltar byas kyang gson pa rnams la ni phan pa med/ shi/ ba la ni rab tu gnod do// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas te/ yul
258a5(mdo sde): rgyu zhing song ba las sems can mya ngan gyis gzir ba mthong nas snying brtse ba'i sems skyes te 'di skad zer ro// rgyal po zhes bya ba ni yul sa dbang gi 'gro ba mang
258a6(mdo sde): pa'i dbang sgyur te/ de ltar dge ba bcu'i lam gyis 'gro ba rnams 'dul te/ 'bras bu 'dod pa lnga mchog dam pa thob du zin kyang skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mi rtag pas
258a7(mdo sde): 'jigs pa sa thar par ma gyur na bdag gis drang po'i chos kyis yul gyi srid btsas kyang phan pa'i don med do// de ltar 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i don med na/ 'khor los sgyur
258a8(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po chen po zhes kyang ji skad ces kyang bya/ byams pa chen po pa zhe 'am/ sman pa rgyal po chen bzhi 'am/ 'dren pa'i ston pa chen po zhes bya ba ni yang dag par lam
258b1(mdo sde): du 'dren cing / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam ston te/ 'dus ma byas pa'i rab tu bde bathob par byed do// bdag cag ni mang dang spyod par mi mthun/ dper na ma zhig snyoms pas gdu
258b2(mdo sde): nanas srog la bab pa las/ chu 'dod pa'i phyir phan tshun rgyugs te khron pa skam po cog dang phrad nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te 'di snyam du sems so// da ni bdag gi lus 'di
258b3(mdo sde): 'tshab la phyir sos sa// de ci'i byor nan/ gal te chudang ma prang na/ srog 'di 'tsho ba las ma ring ba las dakhron pa bzang po dang byung nas/ gdan ma za bar chu dang grang ma gtsa
258b4(mdo sde): ma dang brad de/ ngoms shing tshim par 'gyur bas/ sradag 'chi bar 'gyur ro snyam bsam nas/ myur ba myur bar khron pa'i drung du bsnyen to// khron pa'i drung du
258b5(mdo sde): byin nas lus la gyon pa'i gas pung de phyogs gcig tu ste/ nas/ chu 'dod pa 'phyir/ khron da'i nang du nu/ gis so// khrin po'i gtang du phyin nas tshun ming
258b6(mdo sde): sbrul gdug pa dang / smig pa dang / sdig pa dang / srung ba dang sbal pa dang / gyo mo dang de la sogs pa bseg ma dang / shing dang rtswa nyal nyil 'ba' zhig mthong bar gyur to// de'i tshe skom
258b7(mdo sde): bas nyam thag par gyur pa de thog ma re ba bzhin du chu yang ma rnyed la gdug pa mang po gzas nas khron pa de las phyir byung bar gzas kyang khron pa rnyings shing zhig la zab kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam yod de/ 
258b8(mdo sde): de'i nang nas skas sam thag srad dam 'bru ba'i shing tsam yang med de/ mas mchod du bstsal yang nyam thag la stobs zhan pas 'phar mi nus te/ phyir yang zhab su lhung nas
259a1(mdo sde): sbrul gdug pa la sogs pas za zhing 'jib bo// de cung zad cig srog ma chad kyi bar du 'di skad ces zer ro// bdag khron pa 'di'i nang na chu med par sngar shes
259a2(mdo sde): lta khron pa la mig gis lta yang ma'i phod na 'di'i nang du zhugs pa lta mos kyang ci dgos te/ de ni khron pa 'di'i rkyen gyi sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// zhes smre sngags 'don no// 
259a3(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang de ltar so sor skye bo dag gcig shi ba'i 'og tu khyim gang gi bu smad dang gnyen rnams kyi sdug pa dang bye bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa mthong nas 'di skad
259a4(mdo sde): zer ro// bdag gi lus 'di ni khron pa skam po de dang 'dra ste/ khron pa'i ming tsam yod kyi chu ni med pas na/ 'jug pa yod kyang thob pa med pas de lta bu'i lus dang srog
259a5(mdo sde): stor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur to// da ltar bdag/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dbang sgyur zhing rin po che sna bdun dang ldan te/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi 'gro ba
259a6(mdo sde): 'dul zhing drang po'i chos kyi yul gyi srid btsas nas/ skye bo mang po dag lha dang mi'i mtho ris kyi gnas su bkod de/ 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan mchog dam pa la longs spyod du bcug kyang
259a7(mdo sde): de dag skye ba dang / rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang / sdug pa dang bye bral dang dgra sdang ba dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal las thar par mi nus te/ gcig las gcig tu ngu zhing cho de byed pa 'di ni bdag
259a8(mdo sde): gis nyes kyi/ sems can rnams kyis mnyes so// de ji lta zhe na/ bdag la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'gro ba mang po la phan pa'i don tu 'gyur ba med de/ bdag las dge ba'i chos
259b1(mdo sde): 'dod cing rab tu bde ba 'dod kyang sdug bsngal gyi mtsho las rgal mi nus so// de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang 'di snyam du sems so// da ltar bdag gi lus 'di ni dper na shes pa med pa/ 
259b2(mdo sde): gti mug can gyi sbyin bdag dang 'dra'o// de'i tshe dus gzhan zhig na lo bdun gyi bar du char pa ma bab pas/ zan pa chen po byung ste rtsi shing yang skams 'bru yang rab tu dkon par gyur/ 
259b3(mdo sde): mu ge chen po byung ste/ gcig la gcig 'cha' zhing za bar 'gyur/ gcig gi sha khrag la gcig za ste/ la la ni bu'i sha khrag la pha ma za/ la la ni pha ma'i sha la bu za zhing / pha
259b4(mdo sde): ma dang phu nu dang khyo shug dang / bu po dang / bu mo yang gcig gi sha la gtsag za bar gyur to// de'i tshe na sbyin bdag chen po de 'chag ci 'phyan du song song ba las
259b5(mdo sde): sems can mang po dag ltogs nas da rod nyams ste/ rid cing skams la nyams chung la mdog ngan pa dang skra yang 'jing sa nas lus gnas la rke ba dag/ 'phrag pa la mi ro khur
259b6(mdo sde): du khyer te/ kha cig ni mi'i mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / lU tshigs dang / lag ngar dang / phrag pa dang / tshigs pa dang / skal pa dang / baR+Ya dang / rje ngar dang / yan
259b7(mdo sde): lag dang / nying lag gi bar du khyer/ kha cig ni/ nang khrol mchin pa dang / mcher pa dang / glo ba dang / rgyu ma dang / gzhang rnams khyer ba mthong ngo // de lta bu dag mthong
259b8(mdo sde): nas sbyin bdag des de dag mthong nas/ khyed khur du khyer ba 'di dag ci yin zhes dris so// de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gi khur tu khyer ba 'di ci dag ni mi ro'o// mi'i mgo dang / 
260a1(mdo sde): rkang lag dang / brla dang / rje ngar dang / yan lag dang nying lag gi bar du'o// khyed mi'i mgo dang / yan lag dang nying lag gi bar du khyer ba 'di ci dgos
260a2(mdo sde): zhig bya zhes dris pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ khyod mi shes sam/ mu ge chen po byung nas/ 'bru rab tu dkon par gyur te/ mi kun ltogs nas da ltar gcig la gcig za bas bdag
260a3(mdo sde): cag gi khur du khyer ba 'di ni bdag cag ga zas yin no// de'i tshe sbyin bdag chen po des de skad ces smras pa de thos nas spangs te/ spu zing zhes byed nas khams te sa la 'gyel ba las/ chu
260a4(mdo sde): grang mos gdong du gtor nas ring zhig lon pa dang / sam so sor chud nas 'on khyed kyi zas yon na/ 'di dag su'i sha yin dris pa de dag skad chen po phyung ngus ste/ sbyin
260a5(mdo sde): bdag la brjod du mi rung ngo zhes smras te/ e ma'o bad gcag ni sdug go/ e ma'o bdag cag ni sdug go/ kyi hud kyi hud khyod la dang por mi smar mi rung ste/ bdag cag
260a6(mdo sde): khur du khyer ba 'di/ la lon pa'i sha/ la la ni ma'i sha'o// la la ni bu'i sha/ la la ni pu nu'i sha/ la la ni gnyen gshes kyi sha yin no zhes ltogs de dag gis so so nas/ 
260a7(mdo sde): khyim bdag la drang po'i gtam byas nas/ bdag cag ni shin tu ltogs pas gcig la gcig nyid sha za bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe sbyin bdag des dbugs kyi rnangs pa tsam du/ mi ltog/ 
260a8(mdo sde): pa rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// khyed rnams deng phyin chad gcig la gcig nyid sha za bar ma byed cig/ khyed rnams la dgos pa'i yo byad gang yang rung / bgo ba'i gos sam/ 
260b1(mdo sde): bza' ba'am/ gtung ba'am/ nad kyi rkyen skye'am/ yo byad ci dgos pa thams cad sbyin par bya ste/ zhag bdun na khyed rnams kho bar skor shog shig dang / yid bzhin du gos sam/ 
260b2(mdo sde): kha zas sam/ nad kyi rkyen spyi dang ci 'dod pa tshim par bya'o// zhes bsgo ba dang / de dag rab tu dga' rangs nas/ shin tu legaso legs so// ngo mtshar che'o zhes bstod
260b3(mdo sde): pa byas so// de nas sbyin bdag de phyir khyim du 'ongs nas/ chung ma dang bu rnams dang bran khol dang / las byed pa'i mi rnams kyang bsdus te/ dga' ba'i mdangs phyung ste/ 'jam zhing
260b4(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba'i tshig snyan pas/ bu smad dang bran khol da dang las byed pa'i mi rnams la 'di skad ces bsgo'o// khyed rnams shes par gyis shig/ kho bos smras pa'i
260b5(mdo sde): tshig lags par nyon cig/ khyed shes samathan pa rgya/ na pos mu ge byung nas/ mi thams cad ltogs te grang sa med pa cig shi bar gyur to// bdag gi khyim na bang mdzod
260b6(mdo sde): kun gang zhing lud de/ 'bru yang grangs med pa gcig yod pas/ dus las ma yol bar bdag cag bsod nams bya'o zhes/ bu smad kun gyis de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas/ legaso
260b7(mdo sde): legs so// bdag cag gi srog lus sbyin pa byas kyang mi 'phangs/ bang mdzod dang / nor rdzas dang / kha zas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas sbyin bdag kyang rab tu dga' rangs/ 
260b8(mdo sde): nas/ khyed rnams ni yang dag par kho bo'i bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa'i grogs yin pa lta dge'o legs so// khyed rnams kyang so so nas ci dang ci bya ba rnams ci dang ci sgrub pa skol
261a1(mdo sde): bya ba'i rigs pa yang mod la bya/ bsgrub pa'i rigs pa yang myur du bsgrub ste/ da lta zhag bdun na nges par 'byor par bya'o// de'i tshe sbyin bdag des
261a2(mdo sde): so sor bsgo nas/ khyim gyi phyi rol tu byung ste/ gang nas mnyam zhing yang la bde ba'i gnas shog bltas/ mod la sa gzhi dag par nyal nyi las rdo med par byas phyag te/ khri
261a3(mdo sde): stan pa shams so// de ltar mang po'i 'du ba'i gnas sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sa gzhi bshams nas ban glang lnga brgya la kha zas bkal te/ sbyin pa'i sar bskyal nas/ kha zas
261a4(mdo sde): bzhin du spungs/ zho chu ni mtsho bzhin du bskyil/ mtsho dang 'bru mar dang / khur ba la sogs pa/ kha da zas ro brgya dang ldan pa cho mtsho dgu sbyar te/ de ma yin pa
261a5(mdo sde): gzhan yang gos dang gdu bu dang / phreng ba dang / lu sa kyis rgyan sna tshogs pa dang / ban glang dang / rta dang / rin po che sna bdun las sogs te thams cad
261a6(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs par sbyar nas/ zhag bdun lon pa'i skya rengs shar nas/ zhag bdun gyi nyi ma dril rnga gdungs dung bus te/ skad chen pos thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas 'dir 'dus
261a7(mdo sde): shig ces bos so// de'i tshe na thams cad kyis bos pa'i skad thos nas/ 'phags pas byin gyis brlabs pa tsam du dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ thams cad sbyin pa gtong ba'i gnas/ 
261a8(mdo sde): lhags te/ yid bzhin du gos dang mal cha dang zas skom dang lus kyi rgyan sna tshogs pa dang / nad kyi rtsi sman mang po dang / ban glang dang rta dang rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa ci dang / 
261b1(mdo sde): tsa 'dod pa yod bzhin du drangs nas sbyin pa'i rdzas ci yod pa thams cad kyis ma lus par khyer ro// de nas sbyin bdag de dga' nas phyir khyim du 'ongs nas/ chung ma dang bu rnams dga'
261b2(mdo sde): ba bzhin du 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod do// de nas kyang zhag bdun tsam lon pa dang / mi dag na re sbyin bdag des sngar gos dang zas dang skom las sogs pa'i sbyin pa byas na/ kha
261b3(mdo sde): zas zos pa rnams drug langs nas thams cad shi'o zhes zer ro// de ltar shi bar gyur pas thams cad kyis tshig tu brjod de ngo mtshar che'o// ngo mtshar che'o// de ltar sbyin bdag
261b4(mdo sde): chen po des kun la snying brtse ci 'dod pa bzhin du kha zas la sogs pas tshim par byas te/ lus dang srog gson par gyur na/ phyis zhag mang po ma bar du dug langs
261b5(mdo sde): nas thams cad shi'i bar sgrogs par gyur to// de tshe sbyin bdag chen po des de ltar gyur pa des bos nas ma mug cing mi dga' bar gyur te/ chung ma dang bu la sog/ 
261b6(mdo sde): pa la khyed kyis kha zas ji ltar sbyar na/ kha zas kyi nang du dug ma rungs pa ji ltar 'ongs shes dris pa dang / chung ma dang / bu dang bran khol dang / las byed pa'i mi rnams kyi mchod
261b7(mdo sde): nas dug mi srid dug 'di ga las 'ongs zhib du rtogs shig ces smras so// de nas sbyin bdag de khyim gyi zhal ta byed cing mthar gyis song song ba las/ khron pa zhig steng bkab
261b8(mdo sde): cing g.yog pa mthong ngo // khron pa 'di ci'i phyir g.yogs shes dris pa dang / khron pa 'di na khyim bdag 'di khyod bus pa chung ngu'i tshe na/ sbrul gdug pa gsum zhig gso
262a1(mdo sde): gso ba las/ khron pa'ang brkos nas sbrul gdug pa gsum bcug go// khron pa 'don sbrul gdug pa'i khron pa yin no// chu yang gdug pas chu 'di yang
262a2(mdo sde): 'thungs pas na ste 'chi bar 'gyur ro// sbyin bdag des tshig de dag thos nas/ las byed pa dag la khyed de bar kha zas g.yo ba'i tshe/ khron chu 'di las bcus te kha zas ma g.yos
262a3(mdo sde): sam las byed pas smras pa/ kha zas mang du g.yo bas rings nas chu 'ang bcus nas kha zas kyi g.yos byas so zhes bsgo'o// khyim bdag mi dga' ste mtshar che'o// bdag na
262a4(mdo sde): gti mug gcan shes pa'i blo med pa yin pa 'dra ste/ ci phyir sbrul gdug pa gso zhing khron pa gdug pa rko zhes bgyod nas/ chung ma dang bu la bsgo ba/ sbrul gdug
262a5(mdo sde): pa gsum gyi khron pa myur du tshangs shig/ sbrul gdug gsum yang kho bo bdag gis bsreg gi zhes bsgo ba dang / las byed pa'i mi rnams kyis de ma thag tu khron pa de
262a6(mdo sde): yang bsub nas med par byas so// de nas sbyin bdag des sbrul gdug pa'i khron pa de med par byas nas/ phyi rol du 'chag tu song ba las/ sbyin bdag gi kha zas dug can gyi shi
262a7(mdo sde): bar gyur pa dag thams cad tshig 'thun par spyon bdag 'dis bdag cag la kha zas dug can byin nas/ bdag cag sngar shi bar gyur pa yin no// bdag cag gis de ltar shes na// der
262a8(mdo sde): ma seng yang rung zhes 'gyod pa skyes// de bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de yang dge ba bcus sems can btul te/ sems can dag lha dang mi'i mtho ris su skye zhing 'dod pa lnga la
